Nepali (Romanized): Utsah ka sath / Josh ka sath
Kammar ko Pida / Tallo Dhad ko Pida
Aandra ma aune atirikta tantu (Maasu palaunu)
Ma tapailai kasari madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I went to Australian Pathology Labs for my blood test but they asked me to get a prescription from a doctor.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero rakta parikshanko lagi Australian Pathology Labs gaye tara tiniharule malai chikitsak ko ausadi upacharko bibaranpatra lina agraha gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो रक्त परीक्षणको लागि अष्ट्रेलियन प्याथोलोजी ल्याब्स गएँ
column5: तर तिनीहरूले मलाई चिकित्सकको औषधि उपचारको विवरणपत्र लिन आग्रह गरे।

English: It is mandatory in Australia to get a prescription.
Nepali (Romanized): Australiama aushadi upacharko bibaranpatra lina aniwarya cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अष्ट्रेलियामा औषधि उपचारको विवरणपत्र लिन अनिवार्य छ।

English: Okay tell me Aneeta why do you need a blood test report?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha Aneeta ji malai vannu hos tapailai kina rakta parkishyanko pratibedan chahiyeko cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ अनिता जी मलाई भन्नुहोस्
column5: तपाईंलाई किन रक्त परीक्षणको प्रतिवेदन चाहिएको छ?

English: Is there any particular reason for this?
Nepali (Romanized): K yesko kehi khaas/mul karan cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यसको केही खास/मूल कारण छ?

English: I am having a blood test done for the first time here.
Nepali (Romanized): Yeha maile pahilo patak rakta parikshyan gardai chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यहाँ मैले पहिलो पटक रक्त परीक्षण गर्दैछु।

English: I don't understand the medical system here.
I am ready to pay for my blood test then why do I need the prescription?
Nepali (Romanized): Maile afno rakta parikshyan ko paisa tirna tayar bhayeki chu feri malai yo bibaranpatra kina chahincha ra?
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले आफ्नो रक्त परीक्षणको पैसा तिर्न तयार भएकी छु फेरि मलाई यो विवरणपत्र किन चाहिन्छ र?

English: But every country has its rules and policies.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara harek deshko afno niti niyamharu hunchan.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर हरेक देशको आफ्नो नीति नियमहरू हुन्छन्।

English: This is how the system works here.
Now tell me why you need the tests done and before leaving please pay the fee at the reception.
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhaera aba malai vannuhos tapailai kina parikshyan abashek cha ra janu aghi kripaya swaagat kakshyama sulka tirnu hola.
column5: अब मलाई भन्नुहोस् तपाईंलाई किन परीक्षण आवश्यक छ र जानु अघि
column6: कृपया स्वागत कक्षमा शुल्क तिर्नु होला।

English: It is just a regular blood test.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo kewal niyamit rakta parikshan ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो केवल नियमित रक्त परीक्षण हो।

English: Why will I have to pay for its prescription?
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yesko bibaran patrako lagi pani kina paisa tirnu parne hola?
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यसको विवरण पत्रको लागि पनि किन पैसा तिर्नुपर्ने होला?

English: I am not asking for any advice.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile kunai sallaha ta mageko chuina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले कुनै सल्लाह त मागेको छैन।

English: How can I pay for this when I don't even have money for my studies?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga afno padhai ko lagi ta paisa hudaina bhane yesko lagi maile kasari paisa tiru?
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग आफ्नो पढाइको लागि त पैसा हुँदैन भने यसको लागि मैले कसरी पैसा तिरूँ?

English: I am aware that it is very hard for international students.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thaha cha ki yo antarastriya bidarthiharuko lagi dherai kathin cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थाहा छ कि यो अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय विद्यार्थीहरूको लागि धेरै कठिन छ।

English: Do you have any Overseas Health Cover?
Nepali (Romanized): Ke tapaisanga kunai baideshik swastha bima cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंसँग कुनै वैदेशिक स्वास्थ्य बिमा छ?

English: Would that help me in any possible way?
Nepali (Romanized): K yesle malai kunai prakarle madat garnecha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यसले मलाई कुनै प्रकारले मद्दत गर्नेछ?

English: If that is the case I will be really thankful to you.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi teso ho vane ma tapaiko sachikai avari hunechu.
column5: म तपाईंको साँच्चिकै आभारी हुनेछु।

English: For the amount you will pay at the reception we will generate a receipt.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile swaagat kakshyama bhuktani gareko rakamko hamile rasid dinechau.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले स्वागत कक्षमा भुक्तानी गरेको रकमको हामीले रसिद दिनेछौं।

English: You can email the receipt to your health-cover provider.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile tyo rasid afno swastha bima pradaayaklai e-mail garna saknu hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले त्यो रसिद आफ्नो स्वास्थ्य बिमा प्रदायकलाई इमेल गर्न सक्नुहुनेछ।

English: After verifying your details they will reimburse 60% of the amount to your account.
Nepali (Romanized): Bibaranharu pramanikaran garepachi uniharule tapaiko khatama 60% rakam firta garnechan.
Nepali (Devanagari): विवरणहरू प्रमाणीकरण गरेपछि उनीहरूले तपाईंको खातामा ६०% रकम फिर्ता गर्नेछन्।

English: I'll deposit the fee at the reception.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma swagat kakshya ma paisa jamma garidinchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म स्वागत कक्षमा पैसा जम्मा गरिदिन्छु।

English: How long would it take for the prescription?
Nepali (Romanized): Bibaran patra ko lagi kati samaya lagcha hola?
Nepali (Devanagari): विवरण पत्रको लागि कति समय लाग्छ होला?

English: In fact if you want to do your blood test here I can arrange it for you.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma yedi tapaile afno rakta parikshyan yeha garauna chahanu huncha bhane ma tesko lagi prabanda garidina sakchu.
column5: यदि तपाईंले आफ्नो रक्त परीक्षण यहाँ गराउन चाहनुहुन्छ भने
column6: म त्यसको लागि प्रबन्ध गरिदिन सक्छु।

English: Thank you so much doctor for your help.
Nepali (Romanized): Dactar saab tapaiko sahayogka lagi dherai dherai dhanyabaad.
column5: तपाईंको सहयोगका लागि धेरै धेरै धन्यवाद।

English: You may proceed to the next room to get your blood test done.
Nepali (Romanized): Afno rakta parikshyan garauna tapai sangaiko kotha ma jana saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): आफ्नो रक्त परीक्षण गराउन तपाईं सँगैको कोठामा जान सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Could you please tell me your name and date of birth?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai tapaiko naam ra janma miti batauna saknu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई तपाईंको नाम र जन्म मिति बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: My name is Suresh and my date of birth is 29/08/1992.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero naam Suresh ho ra mero janma miti 29 August 1992 ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो नाम सुरेश हो र मेरो जन्म मिति २९ अगस्ट १९९२ हो।

English: How can I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aaja tapailai kasari madat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म आज तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I have been experiencing nausea and headache for the last few days.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pachhillo kehi din bata waakwaaki ra tauko dukhai anubhav gardaichhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म पछिल्लो केही दिन बाट वाकवाकी र टाउको दुखाई अनुभव गर्दैछु।

English: I have tried a few remedies but it didn't get any better.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile kehi aushadi haru liye tara tyo thik bhayena.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले केही औषधिहरू लिएँ तर त्यो ठिक भएन।

English: Okay do you have any other symptoms like loss of appetite fever or stiff neck and have you thrown up at all?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha k aru kehi lakshyan haru dekha pareka chan jastai bhok nalagnu jwaro wa kada ghaati hunu ra ke tapaile banta garnu bhayeko chha?
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ के अरु केही लक्षणहरू देखा परेका छन् जस्तै भोक नलाग्नु
column5: ज्वरो वा कडा घाँटी हुनु र के तपाईंले बान्ता गर्नु भएको छ?

English: Yes I threw up last night and in the morning today.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho maile hijo rati ra aaja bihana banta gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): हो मैले हिजो राती र आज बिहान बान्ता गरें।

English: I have had a severe headache since then.
Nepali (Romanized): Teti bela dekhi malai dherai tauko dukhi raheko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यति बेला देखि मलाई धेरै टाउको दुखिरहेको छ।

English: It feels like someone is squeezing my head really hard.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesto mahasoos hunchha ki kasaile mero tauko bessari thichiraheko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस्तो महसुस हुन्छ कि कसैले मेरो टाउको बेस्सरी थिचिरहेको छ।

English: I also have pain in my neck.
Okay I want you to perform this blood test at pathology.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha pathology ma yo ragat pariksyan garaunuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ प्याथोलोजीमा यो रगत परीक्षण गराउनुहोस्।

English: I'll prescribe you something for nausea for now.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai ahile ko lagi wakwaki ko lagi kehi aushadi tokidinchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई अहिलेको लागि वाकवाकीको लागि केही औषधि तोकिदिन्छु।

English: For the headache take some panadol and get some rest.
Nepali (Romanized): Tauko dukhai ko lagi panadol linuhos ra aaram garnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): टाउको दुखाइको लागि पानाडोल लिनुहोस् र आराम गर्नुहोस्।

English: Doctor do I really need to perform this blood test?
Nepali (Romanized): Doctor saab k maile vastavmai yo rakta pariksyan garnu parchha?
column5: के मैले वास्तवमै यो रक्त परीक्षण गर्नु पर्छ?

English: Well I am pretty sure it's just a Migraine attack but to clear all the doubts I am prescribing you to perform this diagnostic test of meningitis.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma nischit chhu ki yo Migraine aakraman matra ho tara sabai sanka hatauna ko lagi maile tapailai meningitis ko nidanatmak parikshyan tokididaichu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म निश्चित छु कि यो माइग्रेन आक्रमण मात्र हो तर सबै शंका हटाउनको लागि मैले तपाईंलाई मेनिन्जाइटिसको निदानात्मक परीक्षण तोकिदिँदैछु।

English: Alright I'll go to the pathology lab next to your clinic and will provide them with the sample of my blood so as to get the results as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha ma tapaiko chikitshalaya ko chheuko rogbigyan prayogshaala ma janchhu ra uniharulai mero ragat ko namuna pradan garchhu taaki parinaam sakesamma chadai prapta garna saku.
column5: म तपाईंको चिकित्सालयको छेउको रोगविज्ञान प्रयोगशालामा जान्छु र उनीहरूलाई मेरो रगतको नमुना प्रदान गर्छु ताकि परिणाम सकेसम्म चाँडै प्राप्त गर्न सकूँ।

English: Take these medicines for now and come back if the pain persists.
Nepali (Romanized): Ahileko lagi yo aushadhi linuhos ra dukhaai rahirahe feri aaunuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): अहिलेको लागि यो औषधि लिनुहोस् र दुखाइ रहिरहे फेरि आउनुहोस्।

Nepali (Romanized): Aasha chha tapai chadai ramro mahasoos garnu hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): आशा छ तपाईं चाँडै राम्रो महसुस गर्नुहुनेछ।

English: Hello Susana! How are you doing?
I am good but I have a lot of pain in my teeth.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanchai chhu tara mero daat dherai dukhi raheko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म सन्चै छु तर मेरो दाँत धेरै दुखिरहेको छ।

English: Let me check please lie down on this stretcher so that I can look into your mouth and know what is going wrong in there.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai jaanch garna dinus kripaya yo bistarak / stretcher ma paltinuhos taaki ma tapaiko mukh bhitra herna saku ra k gadbad bhairaheko chha bhanera janna saku.
column5: कृपया यो बिस्तारक / स्ट्रेचरमा पल्टिनुहोस् ताकि म तपाईंको मुख भित्र हेर्न सकूँ र के गडबड भइरहेको छ भनेर जान्न सकूँ।

English: Okay is my toothache a matter of concern?
Nepali (Romanized): Hunchha k mero daat ko dukhai chintako bishaya ho?
column5: के मेरो दाँतको दुखाइ चिन्ताको विषय हो?

English: Will I need to get my tooth removed?
Nepali (Romanized): K mero daant nikalnu parna sakcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के मेरो दाँत निकाल्नु पर्न सक्छ?

English: As of now I can't really tell if we have to extract the tooth.
Nepali (Romanized): Ahile nai ta maile tapaiko daant nikalnu parcha ki pardaina bhanera bhanna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): अहिले नै त मैले तपाईंको दाँत निकाल्नु पर्छ कि पर्दैन भनेर भन्न सक्दिन।

English: I will have to take a radiograph in order to see the extent of the caries.
Nepali (Romanized): Kati kuhiyeko cha bhanera thaha pauna maile euta radiograph / chya-rashmi linu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): कति कुहिएको छ भनेर थाहा पाउन मैले एउटा रेडियोग्राफ / क्षयरश्मि लिनुपर्छ।

English: Only then can we determine the treatment.
Nepali (Romanized): Tespaxi matra yesko upachar nirdharan garna sakincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसपछि मात्र यसको उपचार निर्धारण गर्न सकिन्छ।

English: Okay but doctor I brush twice a day.
Nepali (Romanized): Hunchha tara doctor saab ma dinko dui palta daat majchhu.
column5: तर डाक्टर साब म दिनको दुई पल्ट दाँत माझ्छु।

English: How can there be a cavity in my teeth?
Nepali (Romanized): Mero daatma kasari kida lagna sakcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो दाँतमा कसरी किरा लाग्न सक्छ?

English: I have also decreased eating sugary foods.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile guliyo khanaa khana pani kam garisake.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले गुलियो खाना खान पनि कम गरिसकें।

English: Although there's no doubt you brush your teeth twice daily it is the gap between your teeth that makes them more prone to caries.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile dinko dui palta daant majhnu hunchha bhanera kunai sanka chaina yadhapi tapaiko daatharu bich ko duri le garda daant sadna thalcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले दिनको दुई पल्ट दाँत माझ्नु हुन्छ भनेर कुनै शंका छैन यद्यपि तपाईंको दाँतहरु बीचको दुरीले गर्दा दाँत सड्न थाल्छ।

English: That is why we recommend our patients to visit their dentist every 6 months.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesai kaaran hamile hamra biramiharulai afna danta chikitsaklai harek 6-6 mahina ma bhetna sallaha dinchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसै कारण हामीले हाम्रा बिरामीहरूलाई आफ्ना दन्त चिकित्सकलाई हरेक ६-६ महिनामा भेट्न सल्लाह दिन्छौं।

English: You are correct is it too bad?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai sahi hunuhunchha k yo nikai kharab chha?
column5: के यो निकै खराब छ?

English: I was trying for a long time to come and meet you but wasn't able to do so because of a busy schedule.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma dherai samaya dekhi tapailai bhetne prayas gardaithiye tara byasta taalikale garda bhyayina.
Nepali (Devanagari): म धेरै समय देखि तपाईंलाई भेट्ने प्रयास गर्दैथिएँ तर व्यस्त तालिकाले गर्दा भ्याइनँ।

English: No problem well not that bad.
Nepali (Romanized): Kehi chhaina kher teti naramro ta chaina.
column5: खैर त्यति नराम्रो त छैन।

English: Also I would recommend getting oral prophylaxis done as it will make your teeth resistant to caries.
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai ma maukhik prophylaxis garauna sallaha dinchhu kinabhane tyesle tapaiko daat sadna bata bachaucha.
Nepali (Devanagari): साथै म मौखिक प्रोफिलेक्सिस गराउन सल्लाह दिन्छु किनभने त्यसले तपाईंको दाँत सड्नबाट बचाउँछ।

English: Sure I'll do as you say.
But doctor I know that having a tooth extracted is very painful.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara doctor saab malai thaha cha daant nikalnu dherai kastajanak huncha bhanera.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर डाक्टर साब मलाई थाहा छ दाँत निकाल्नु धेरै कष्टजनक हुन्छ भनेर।

English: Actually I can't bear a lot of pain.
Nepali (Romanized): Khasma ma dherai dukhai sahana sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): खासमा म धेरै दुखाइ सहन सक्दिन।

English: And according to what I heard after removing teeth one can have a headache and pain in the ear.
Nepali (Romanized): Ani maile sune anusar daant nikalepaxi tauko ra kaan dukhirahana sakcha re.
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि मैले सुने अनुसार दाँत निकालेपछि टाउको र कान दुखिरहन सक्छ रे।

English: See once the root cause has been identified and corrected I'm sure the pain in the head neck or ear should go away.
Nepali (Romanized): Hernuhos ek choti pramukh karan patta lagayera sachyaye pachhi ma nischit chhu ki tauko ghati ra kaanma hune dukhai niko hunchha.
column5: एक चोटी प्रमुख कारण पत्ता लगाएर सच्याएपछि
column6: म निश्चित छु कि टाउको
column7: घाँटी र कानमा हुने दुखाइ निको हुन्छ।

column5: मैले मेरो अभिकर्तालाई मेरो तर्फबाट सबै आवश्यक काम गर्न आग्रह गरेको थिएँ।

English: I also got an email and I am making payments every month.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile email pani prapta gareko thiye ra ma harek mahina bhuktani gardaichhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले ईमेल पनि प्राप्त गरेको थिएँ र म हरेक महिना भुक्तानी गर्दैछु।

English: Alright could you please open your email and check it?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha k kripaya tapai afno email kholera herna saknu hunchha?
column5: के कृपया तपाईं आफ्नो ईमेल खोलेर हेर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: You may be able to find the policy number there.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile tyaha euta niti number bhetauna saknuhunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले त्यहाँ एउटा नीति नम्बर भेट्टाउन सक्नुहुनेछ।

English: After that we can proceed further.

column5: म हेर्छु।

English: I will forward you the email.
Please hold the call for 2 minutes.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya 2 minute ko lagi call maa rahiranuhos.

column5: म कुरिरहेको छु।

English: Sunil are you still on the line?
Nepali (Romanized): Sunil ji k tapai ajhai line ma hunu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): सुनिल जी के तपाईं अझै लाइनमा हुनुहुन्छ?

English: Alexa thank you for your patience.
Nepali (Romanized): Alexa ji tapaiko dhairyatako lagi dhanyabaad.
column5: तपाईंको धैर्यताको लागि धन्यवाद।

English: I have sent the email to you.
Can you please have a look?
Nepali (Romanized): K kripaya tapai ekchoti heridinu hunchha?

column5: हो मैले पाएँ।

English: I can see that the policy number is given at the top right corner in the email.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma dekhna sakchhu ki niti number email ma mathillo daya kunamaa diyiyeko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म देख्न सक्छु कि नीति नम्बर ईमेलमा माथिल्लो दायाँ कुनामा दिइएको छ।

English: Great Did you find that I was paying for the flood?
Nepali (Romanized): Ramro! Maile badiko bhuktani gareko hoon bhanera paunu bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): राम्रो! मैले बाढीको भुक्तानी गरेको हुँ भनेर पाउनुभयो?

English: And can I claim my insurance?
Nepali (Romanized): Ra k ma mero bima dawi garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): र के म मेरो बिमा दावी गर्न सक्छु?

English: I am worried because of the condition of my house.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero gharko awastha dekhera chintit chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो घरको अवस्था देखेर चिन्तित छु।

English: All the household appliances are soaked in water.
Nepali (Romanized): Sampurna Gharelu upakaranharu paani maa bhijeka chhan.
Nepali (Devanagari): सम्पूर्ण घरेलु उपकरणहरू पानीमा भिजेका छन्।

English: Yes sir I am pulling up the data.
column5: म तथ्यांक निकाल्दैछु।

English: Oh there it is I can see that you made monthly payments and your house is insured for flood coverage.
Nepali (Romanized): Ahh yaha rahechha Ma dekhna sakchhu ki tapaile maashik bhuktani garirahanu bhayeko rahecha ra tapaiko ghar baadi ko lagi bimit gariyeko chha.
column5: म देख्न सक्छु कि तपाईंले मासिक भुक्तानी गरिरहनु भएको रहेछ र तपाईंको घर बाढीको लागि बिमित गरिएको छ।

English: Yes you can claim the insurance.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho tapaile bima dawi garna saknu hunchha.
column5: तपाईंले बिमा दावी गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Listen I would like to get the claimed money as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Sunnuhos maile dawi gareko rakam chito bhanda chito pauna chahanchhu.
column5: मैले दावी गरेको रकम छिटो भन्दा छिटो पाउन चाहन्छु।

English: Is there something you can do?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile kehi garna saknu huncha?

English: Alright well we have a process through which you can fast track your request.
Nepali (Romanized): Hunchha hamisanga euta prakriya chha jasmaa tapaile afno anurodh drut marg bata agadi badauna saknuhunchha.
column5: हामीसँग एउटा प्रक्रिया छ जसमा तपाईंले आफ्नो अनुरोध द्रुत मार्गबाट अगाडि बढाउन सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: You need to go to the website and fill out a form.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai website ma gayera euta pharam bharnu parne hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं वेबसाइटमा गएर एउटा फारम भर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

English: Also you need to give a valid reason for this.
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai tapaile yesko lagi euta jayaj karan pani dinu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): साथै तपाईंले यसको लागि एउटा जायज कारण पनि दिनुपर्छ।

English: Sure I will do as you explained.
Nepali (Romanized): Hunchha ma tapaile barnan garnu bhayeko jastai garchhu.
column5: म तपाईंले वर्णन गर्नुभएको जस्तै गर्छु।

English: What else are the formalities I need to fulfill to get the claim?
Nepali (Romanized): Aru k k aupacharikta haru pura garnu parne hunccha ta maile dawi prapta garna ko lagi?
Nepali (Devanagari): अरु के-के औपचारिकताहरू पुरा गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ त मैले दावी प्राप्त गर्नको लागि?

English: How many days would it take to get the money?
Nepali (Romanized): Ani rakam pauna kati din lagne chha?
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि रकम पाउन कति दिन लाग्ने छ?

English: You need to show evidence such as photos weather report map of the location where you live and eye witnesses.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile kehi pramaanharu jastai tasbirharu mausamko pratibedan tapai basnu hune theganako naksa ra pratyakshya saakchhi dekhaunu parchha.
column5: मौसमको प्रतिवेदन
column6: तपाईं बस्नुहुने ठेगानाको नक्सा र प्रत्यक्ष साक्षी देखाउनुपर्छ।

English: Could you please tell me how much loss you have borne?
Nepali (Romanized): K kripaya tapai batauna saknuhunchha ki tapaile kati ghata behornubhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के कृपया तपाईं बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ कि तपाईंले कति घाटा बेहोर्नुभयो?

English: Okay I will take some photos and attach everything with my form.
Nepali (Romanized): Hunchha Ma kehi tasbirharu linchhu ra aru sabai mero pharamsanga raakhidinchhu.
column5: म केही तस्बिरहरू लिन्छु र अरु सबै मेरो फारमसँग राखिदिन्छु।

English: Actually there was a short circuit when the house was flooded with water and all of the electronic appliances were damaged.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavmaa gharma baadi gayeko belamaa tyaha short circuit bhayeko thiyo ra sabai bidhutiya upakaranharu chyatigrast bhayekachhan.
column5: घरमा बाढी गएको बेलामा त्यहाँ सर्ट सर्किट भएको थियो र सबै विद्युतीय उपकरणहरू क्षतिग्रस्त भएका छन्।

English: Okay I will make a detailed report on the basis of your explanation.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha ma tapaiko bibaranko adhaarma euta bistrit pratibedan banaunechu.
column5: म तपाईंको विवरणको आधारमा एउटा विस्तृत प्रतिवेदन बनाउनेछु।

English: Please give me an idea of the estimated cost of equipment.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya malai upakaranko anumanit lagat bataidinuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया मलाई उपकरणको अनुमानित लागत बताइदिनुहोस्।

English: Ummm... the estimated cost would be around $100
column5: 000 hunuparchha.
column6: उम्... अनुमानित लागत करिब $१००

English: I would have provided the bills for each piece of equipment but you already know I am unable to do so due to the given circumstances.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile pratek upakaranko bill upalabdha garauthiye tara tapailai pahile nai thaha chha diyiyeko paristhitiko karan ma tyo garna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले प्रत्येक उपकरणको बिल उपलब्ध गराउँथे तर तपाईंलाई पहिले नै थाहा छ दिइएको परिस्थितिको कारण म त्यो गर्न सक्दिन।

English: Alright Could you also email the receipts to me and attach with your form?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha K kripaya tapai malai rasidharu afno pharam sanga rakhera pathaidina saknu hunchha?
column5: के कृपया तपाईं मलाई रसिदहरू आफ्नो फारमसँग राखेर पठाइदिन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: I received a call from Australian Taxation Office this morning.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile aja bihana Australiyali Kar Karyala bata phone prapta gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले आज बिहान अष्ट्रेलियाली कर कार्यालयबाट फोन प्राप्त गरें।

English: Hello Hemant What was the call about?
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste Hemant Phone k ko barema thiyo?
column5: फोन के को बारेमा थियो?

English: Could you please share the contact number?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai kripaya samparka number dina saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं कृपया सम्पर्क नम्बर दिन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Kathleen unfortunately I could not attend the call and I received a voice message.
Nepali (Romanized): Kathleen ji durbhagyabas maile phone uthauna sakina ra maile dhwani sandesh prapta gare.
column5: दुर्भाग्यवश मैले फोन उठाउन सकिन र मैले ध्वनि सन्देश प्राप्त गरें।

English: Moreover I am surprised that it was not from an Australian number.
Nepali (Romanized): Yeshbahek malai achamma lagyo ki tyo Australiako number thiyena.
column5: मलाई अचम्म लाग्यो कि त्यो अष्ट्रेलियाको नम्बर थिएन।

English: Thank you for informing us of the call.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamilai yes call ko bare jaankari dinu bhayekoma dhanyabad.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीलाई यस कलको बारेमा जानकारी दिनुभएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: Please note that while the ATO does sometimes contact taxpayers by phone its calls do not show a number ID or an overseas number.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya note garnus hola ATO le kahile kahi kardataharulai telephone marfat samparka gardacha tara tyo call le number ID wa bideshi number dekaudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया नोट गर्नुहोस् होला ATO ले कहिलेकाहीं करदाताहरूलाई टेलिफोन मार्फत सम्पर्क गर्दछ तर त्यो कलले नम्बर ID वा विदेशी नम्बर देखाउँदैन।

English: Anyway what was the voice message about?
Nepali (Romanized): Kher dhwani sandesh k ko barema thiyo?
column5: ध्वनि सन्देश के को बारेमा थियो?

English: It said that you were entitled to pay your taxes.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesma vaniyo ki tapai afno kar bhuktaniko hakdaar hunuhuncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसमा भनियो कि तपाईं आफ्नो कर भुक्तानीको हकदार हुनुहुन्छ।

English: Failing to do so could lead to dire circumstances for you.
Nepali (Romanized): Teso garna asafal vayema tapaile gambhir parinamharu bhognu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसो गर्न असफल भएमा तपाईंले गम्भीर परिणामहरू भोग्नु पर्ने हुन्छ।

English: I also received a message with a link.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile link bhayeko euta sandesh pani prapta gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले लिंक भएको एउटा सन्देश पनि प्राप्त गरें।

English: It is quite rude and unbelievable.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo asadhai abhadra ra abiswosaniya cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो असाध्यै अभद्र र अविश्वसनीय छ।

English: Hemant please be aware that the ATO will never send you an email or SMS asking you to click on a link and also never threatens people.
Nepali (Romanized): Hemant ji kripaya sachet hunuhos ki ATOle tapailai kahilei pani email wa SMS pathayera linkma thichnu bhandaina ra kahilei manishlai dhamki pani didaina.
column5: कृपया सचेत हुनुहोस् कि ATO ले तपाईंलाई कहिल्यै पनि ईमेल वा SMS पठाएर लिंकमा थिच्नु भन्दैन र कहिल्यै मानिसलाई धम्की पनि दिँदैन।

English: Is that so? I did not know that.
Nepali (Romanized): Ye hora? Malai tyo thaha thiyena.
Nepali (Devanagari): ए हो र? मलाई त्यो थाहा थिएन।

English: Many of my friends are getting this call and they are asking to deposit the money in an account.
Nepali (Romanized): Mera dherai sathiharulai yo call airaheko cha ra uniharulai khaatama paisa jamma garnaka lagi sodhirakheka chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरा धेरै साथीहरूलाई यो कल आइरहेको छ र उनीहरूलाई खातामा पैसा जम्मा गर्नका लागि सोधिराखेका छन्।

English: It never requests a payment of a debt via iTunes or Google Play cards prepaid Visa cards cryptocurrency or direct credit to a personal bank account.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesle itunes google play card purvapradat visa card cryptocurrency athawa pratakshya credit marfat byaktigat bank khatama rinko bhuktani garna kahile anurodh gardaina.
column5: गुगल प्ले कार्ड
column6: पूर्वप्रदत्त भिसा कार्ड
column7: क्रिप्टोकरेन्सी अथवा प्रत्यक्ष क्रेडिट मार्फत व्यक्तिगत बैंक खातामा ऋणको भुक्तानी गर्न कहिले अनुरोध गर्दैन।

English: What would have happened if I had listened to them and opened the link.
Nepali (Romanized): K hunthyo hola yedi maile uniharulai suneko vaye ra link kholeko vaye.
Nepali (Devanagari): के हुन्थ्यो होला यदि मैले उनीहरूलाई सुनेको भए र लिंक खोलेको भए।

English: They are intimidating and looting/robbing people.
Nepali (Romanized): Tiniharule manishharulai tarsaairaheka chhan ra lutiraakheka chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): तिनीहरूले मानिसहरूलाई तर्साइरहेका छन् र लुटिराखेका छन्।

English: Hemant these are scam calls and messages.
Nepali (Romanized): Hemant ji yi thagi garna gariyeka call ra sandeshharu hun.
column5: यी ठगी गर्न गरिएका कल र सन्देशहरू हुन्।

English: More than 300 Australians have been scammed and there are complaints about these scam calls and messages almost every day.
Nepali (Romanized): 300 vanda badhi Australiyaliharu thagi ma parekachan ra yi call ra sandeshharuka bare harek din gunaso / ujuriharu aauchhan.
Nepali (Devanagari): ३०० भन्दा बढी अष्ट्रेलियालीहरू ठगीमा परेका छन् र यी कल र सन्देशहरूका बारे हरेक दिन गुनासो / उजुरीहरू आउँछन्।

English: Why don't you start an awareness program to increase taxation related knowledge among the general public?
Nepali (Romanized): Samanya janataka bich kar sambandhi gyan badaunako lagi tapai kina jagarukta karyakam suru garnu hunna?
Nepali (Devanagari): सामान्य जनताका बीच कर सम्बन्धी ज्ञान बढाउनको लागि तपाईं किन जागरूकता कार्यक्रम सुरु गर्नुहुन्न?

English: It would be in the interest of everyone.
We are trying our best to warn the people and tell our customers to check our website for the latest updates.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile sakdo chetawani dine prayas gareka chhau ra hamra grahakharulai hamro websitemaa gayi nabintam adhyavadhikharu hernaka lagi vandachau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले सक्दो चेतावनी दिने प्रयास गरेका छौं र हाम्रा ग्राहकहरूलाई हाम्रो वेबसाइटमा गई नवीनतम अद्यावधिकहरू हेर्नका लागि भन्दछौं।

English: Also know your tax affairs by logging into ATO tax services through mygov.
Nepali (Romanized): Sathai mygov marfat ATO kar sewaharu ma login garera tapaiko kar mamilaharu pani jannuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): साथै mygov मार्फत ATO कर सेवाहरूमा लगइन गरेर तपाईंको कर मामिलाहरू पनि जान्नुहोस्।

English: I'll check and I will try to inform others of these fake calls.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma hernechu ra ma yee nakali callharu ka barema arulai jankari dine prayas garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म हेर्नेछु र म यी नक्कली कलहरूका बारेमा अरुलाई जानकारी दिने प्रयास गर्नेछु।

English: Good afternoon! This is on-duty authorised officer Rosie calling from the ATO office.
Nepali (Romanized): Subha Aparahna Ma ATO karyalaya bata karyarat adhikrit adhikari Rosie boldaichhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ अपराह्न। म ATO कार्यालयबाट कार्यरत अधिकृत
column5: अधिकारी रोसी बोल्दैछु।

Nepali (Romanized): K ma Rakesh ji sanga boldaichhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के म राकेश जी सँग बोल्दैछु?

Nepali (Romanized): Subha-aparahna adhikari jyu Ma Rakesh hoon.
column5: म राकेश हुँ।

English: What happened officer? Have I done anything wrong?
Nepali (Romanized): K bhayo adhikari jiu? K maile kehi galti gare?
Nepali (Devanagari): के भयो अधिकारी ज्यू? के मैले केही गल्ती गरें?

English: Rakesh I can see in our records that according to your income which have been obtained from our usual data sources you have not paid your taxes.
Nepali (Romanized): Rakesh ji ma hamro abhilekhma dekhna sakchu ki hamro niyamit tatyanka shrotharu bata prapta bhayeko tapaiko aya anusaar tapaile afno kar tirnu bhayeko chaina.
column5: म हाम्रो अभिलेखमा देख्न सक्छु कि हाम्रो नियमित तथ्यांक स्रोतहरूबाट प्राप्त भएको तपाईंको आय अनुसार
column6: तपाईंले आफ्नो कर तिर्नुभएको छैन।

English: What are you saying? I am a very responsible citizen and I have always paid my taxes on time.
Nepali (Romanized): K bhandai hunu huncha? Ma ek jimmewar nagarik hu ra maile jahile afno kar samaya mai tirne gareko chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): के भन्दै हुनुहुन्छ? म एक जिम्मेवार नागरिक हुँ र मैले जहिले आफ्नो कर समयमै तिर्ने गरेको छु।

English: How can this be possible? You must have misunderstood officer.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo kasari sambhav huna sakchha? Tapaile galat bujhnu bhayeko hola adhikar jiu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो कसरी सम्भव हुन सक्छ? तपाईंले गलत बुझ्नु भएको होला अधिकार ज्यू।

English: Your full name is Rakesh Chaudhary am I right?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko pura naam Rakesh Chaudhary ho k ma sahi chhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको पूरा नाम राकेश चौधरी हो
column5: के म सही छु?

English: We sent many letters to your house for tax lodgement but did not get any response.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile kar daayar garnako lagi / daakhilako tapaiko gharmaa dherai patraharu pathayeka thiyau tara kehi uttar / pratikriya payenau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले कर दायर गर्नको लागि / दाखिलाको तपाईंको घरमा धेरै पत्रहरू पठाएका थियौं तर केही उत्तर / प्रतिक्रिया पाएनौं।

English: Are you not aware of the serious consequences such as penalties fines and prison sentences?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapailai yeska gambhir parinaamharu jastai danda jariwana ra jail sajayaka bare sachet hunu hunna?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंलाई यसका गम्भीर परिणामहरू जस्तै दण्ड
column5: जरिवाना र जेल सजायका बारे सचेत हुनुहुन्न?

English: Yes I am Rakesh Chaudhary And I am aware of all the rules.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho ma Rakesh Chaudhary nai hun Ani malai sabai niyamharu ko jankari chha.
column5: म राकेश चौधरी नै हुँ। अनि मलाई सबै नियमहरूको जानकारी छ।

English: But I have not received any letters.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara maile kunai patra payeko chhuina.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मैले कुनै पत्र पाएको छैन।

English: Oh god! I just moved to a new house and I forgot to change the address in the ATO department.
Nepali (Romanized): Hey bhagwan! Ma bharkharai naya ghar ma sareko hu ra maile ATO bibhagmaa gharko thegana paribartan garna bhule.
Nepali (Devanagari): हे भगवान! म भर्खरै नयाँ घरमा सरेको हुँ र मैले ATO विभागमा घरको ठेगाना परिवर्तन गर्न भुलें।

English: Alright! Firstly you need to change your address in order to receive the updates from ATO.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha Sarwapratham tapaile ATO bata kunai pani adhyawadhikharu prapta garna afno thegana paribartan garnu parchha.
column5: तपाईंले ATO बाट कुनै पनि अद्यावधिकहरू प्राप्त गर्न आफ्नो ठेगाना परिवर्तन गर्नुपर्छ।

English: It could have a devastating impact on your individual identity and moreover non payment of tax could decrease the revenue of a country.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesle garda tapaiko byaktigat pahichaanma binaskari prabhav parna sakthyo ra thap kar ko bhuktani nagarda deshko rajaswa ghatna sakcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसले गर्दा तपाईंको व्यक्तिगत पहिचानमा विनाशकारी प्रभाव पर्न सक्थ्यो र थप करको भुक्तानी नगर्दा देशको राजस्व घट्न सक्छ।

English: Okay officer I will update my address as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Huncha adhikari jyu ma mero thegana sakesamma chitai adhyawadhik garnechu.
column5: म मेरो ठेगाना सकेसम्म चाँडै अद्यावधिक गर्नेछु।

English: I would like to ask for a favour Is it possible to pay my tax on installments?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapai sanga euta maddat magna chahanchu K yo mero kar kista ma tirna sambhav cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंसँग एउटा मद्दत माग्न चाहन्छु। के यो मेरो कर किस्तामा तिर्न सम्भव छ?

English: Sure you can pay your tax on an instalment plan.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani tapai kista yojanama afno kar tirna saknu huncha.
column5: तपाईं किस्ता योजनामा आफ्नो कर तिर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: You need to go to a tax agent and he will help you with instalment plans.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kar dalalkomaa janu parne huncha ra uhale tapailai kista yojanaharu ma madat garnechhan.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं कर दलालकोमा जानु पर्ने हुन्छ र उहाँले तपाईंलाई किस्ता योजनाहरूमा मद्दत गर्नेछन्।

English: But as you are already late in making the payment you need to pay some penalty.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara tapai bhuktani garna pahile nai dhilo hunu bhayeko le tapaile kehi jariwana tirnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर तपाईं भुक्तानी गर्न पहिले नै ढिलो हुनु भएकोले तपाईंले केही जरिवाना तिर्नु पर्ने हुन्छ।

English: Oh god! Officer there is a valid reason for late payment of the tax.
Nepali (Romanized): Hey bhagwan!! Adhikarijiu ma sanga kar dhila bhuktaniko vaidh karan cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हे भगवान!! अधिकारीज्यू मसँग कर ढिला भुक्तानीको वैध कारण छ।

English: Could you please waive off the penalty?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai kripaya jariwana minaha / maaf garna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं कृपया जरिवाना मिनाहा / माफ गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: As you have always paid tax on time according to our records I will waive off the penalty this time.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro abhilekh anusar tapaile sadhai samayemai kar bhuktani garnu vayeko cha tesaile yespatak ma jariwana minaha / katauti / maaf garidinchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो अभिलेख अनुसार तपाईंले सधैं समयमै कर भुक्तानी गर्नुभएको छ त्यसैले यसपटक म जरिवाना मिनाहा / कटौती / माफ गरिदिन्छु।

English: But do not repeat the mistake.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara yo galti feri nadohoraunu hos.

English: I will go to a tax agent and pay my taxes.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma kar dalal ko ma janechu ra mero kar tirnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म कर दलालकोमा जानेछु र मेरो कर तिर्नेछु।

English: Hello officer I have called you regarding my tax lodgement.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaskar adhikarijiu maile tapailai kar jamma garne sambandhamaa samparka gareko hu.
column5: मैले तपाईंलाई कर जम्मा गर्ने सम्बन्धमा सम्पर्क गरेको हुँ।

English: I have never done this before.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yo pahile kahile gareko chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यो पहिले कहिले गरेको छैन।

Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya tapai malai sahayog garna saknuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया तपाईं मलाई सहयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Definitely I can help you with that.
Nepali (Romanized): Nischit rupma ma tapailai sahayog garna sakchu.
column5: म तपाईंलाई सहयोग गर्न सक्छु।

English: Basically there are two ways you can go about it.
Nepali (Romanized): Mulata: tapai dui wota tarikaharu bata agadi badna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मूलतः तपाईं दुई वटा तरिकाहरूबाट अगाडि बढ्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: One of the ways is that you can do it on your own and the second one is that you can get it done from a tax agent.
Nepali (Romanized): Euta tarika yo ho ki tapai afaile yo garna saknu huncha ra dosro yo ho ki tapai eslai kar dalal / kar abhikarta bata garauna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): एउटा तरिका यो हो कि तपाईं आफैले यो गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ र दोस्रो यो हो कि तपाईं यसलाई कर दलाल / कर अभिकर्ताबाट गराउन सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Okay officer Could you please tell me which one is easier and how long it will take because I want to get my tax return as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha adhikari jiu Kripaya malai bataunuhos ki kun chai sajilo cha ra yesma kati samaya lagnecha kina bhane ma mero kar sakesamma chito firta hos vanne chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ अधिकारी ज्यू। कृपया मलाई बताउनुहोस् कि कुन चाहिँ सजिलो छ र यसमा कति समय लाग्नेछ किनभने म मेरो कर सकेसम्म छिटो फिर्ता होस् भन्ने चाहन्छु।

English: In order to file the tax return yourself you have to create an account on mygov.com.au and then select tax lodgement option under the home button and follow the instructions and fill in the form.
Nepali (Romanized): Afai kar dakhila garnako lagi tapaile mygov.com.au maa khata kholnu parcha ra home buttonko tala kar jammako bikalpa channuhos ani nirdeshanharuko anusaran garnuhos ra faram bharnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): आफै कर दाखिला गर्नको लागि तपाईंले mygov.com.au मा खाता खोल्नु पर्छ र होम बटनको तल कर जम्माको विकल्प छान्नुहोस् अनि निर्देशनहरूको अनुसरण गर्नुहोस् र फारम भर्नुहोस्।

English: Along with this officer tell me the important details I need to fill in that form.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesh sangsangai adhikarijiu maile faram ma bharnu parne mahatwapurna bibaranharu bataunu hos.
column5: मैले फारममा भर्नुपर्ने महत्त्वपूर्ण विवरणहरू बताउनुहोस्।

English: How long will it take? I mean is it an easy process?
Nepali (Romanized): Kati samaya lagnecha? Mero matlab k yo sajilo prakriya ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): कति समय लाग्नेछ? मेरो मतलब के यो सजिलो प्रक्रिया हो?

English: Don't worry It is very easy.
Nepali (Romanized): Chinta nalinuhos Yo ekdam sajilo cha.
column5: यो एकदम सजिलो छ।

English: You just need to fill in all your personal details such as full name address contact number your bank details TFN and your group certificate.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaika sampurna byaktigat bibaranharu jastai pura name thegana samparka number tapaiko bank bibaran TFN ra tapaiko samuha pramaanpatra bharnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंका सम्पूर्ण व्यक्तिगत विवरणहरू जस्तै पूरा नाम
column5: ठेगाना
column6: सम्पर्क नम्बर
column8: TFN र तपाईंको समूह प्रमाणपत्र भर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

English: I have my TFN but I don't know about this group certificate.
Nepali (Romanized): Masanga TFN cha tara malai yesh samuha pramaanpatrako barema thaha chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग TFN छ तर मलाई यस समूह प्रमाणपत्रको बारेमा थाहा छैन।

English: What is this? Where and how can I get it?
Nepali (Romanized): K ho yo? Yo kaha ra kasari prapta garna sakincha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के हो यो? यो कहाँ र कसरी प्राप्त गर्न सकिन्छ?

English: Group certificate means your PAYG payment summary.
Nepali (Romanized): Samuha pramaanpatra tapaiko PAYG bhuktaniko saaraansh ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): समूह प्रमाणपत्र तपाईंको PAYG भुक्तानीको सारांश हो।

English: Every employer provides their employees with PAYG payment summary at the end of every financial year.
Nepali (Romanized): Pratek rojgaardata / niyokta le afna karmachari harulai harek bitiya barshako antyama PAYG bhuktani saransh pradan gardacha.
Nepali (Devanagari): प्रत्येक रोजगारदाता / नियोक्ताले आफ्ना कर्मचारीहरूलाई हरेक वित्तीय वर्षको अन्त्यमा PAYG भुक्तानी सारांश प्रदान गर्दछ।

English: Alright! I will ask my employer about it.
Nepali (Romanized): Thikai cha! Ma yas barema afno haakimlai sodhnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिकै छ! म यसबारेमा आफ्नो हाकिमलाई सोध्नेछु।

English: By the way how long would it take to get the return? I don't want to delay it any more.
Nepali (Romanized): Ah sachi kar firti ko lagi kati samaya lagla? Ma yo thap dhilo garna chahadina.
column5: कर फिर्तीको लागि कति समय लाग्ला? म यो थप ढिलो गर्न चाहदिन।

English: It depends on when the ATO approves your file.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo tapaiko file ATOle kaile swikrit garcha bhanne kura ma nirvar huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो तपाईंको फाइल ATO ले कहिले स्वीकृत गर्छ भन्ने कुरामा निर्भर हुन्छ।

English: It usually takes around 2 weeks time to process the file and then you receive the money in your account
Nepali (Romanized): Samanyetaya file prakriya pura huna lagvag 2 hafta lagcha ani tespaxi tapaile khatama paisa paunu hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सामान्यतया फाइल प्रक्रिया पुरा हुन लगभग २ हप्ता लाग्छ अनि त्यसपछि तपाईंले खातामा पैसा पाउनु हुनेछ।

English: Good morning! How are you doing? I am Kim and I am the manager here. How can I help you?
Nepali (Romanized): Subha prabhat Tapailai kasto chha? Ma Kim hu ra ma aaja yahako prabandhak hu Ma kasari madat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ प्रभात। तपाईंलाई कस्तो छ? म किम हुँ र म आज यहाँको प्रबन्धक हुँ। म कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

column5: धन्यवाद।

English: I want to open an account in your bank.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapaiko bankmaa khata kholna chahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंको बैंकमा खाता खोल्न चाहन्छु।

English: Which account would you like to open: Savings account or Checking account?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kasto khata kholna chaahanu hunchha: Bachat khata wa checking khata?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं कस्तो खाता खोल्न चाहनुहुन्छ: बचत खाता वा चेकिङ खाता?

English: I came here to open a checking account but I have no problem opening a savings account as well.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yaha checking khata kholna aayeko hu tara malai bachat khata kholna pani kehi samasya chhaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यहाँ चेकिङ खाता खोल्न आएको हुँ तर मलाई बचत खाता खोल्न पनि केही समस्या छैन।

English: I want to open both of these accounts.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma ma dubai khataharu kholna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): वास्तवमा म दुबै खाताहरू खोल्न चाहन्छु।

English: Great In order to open these accounts you need to provide a 100 point ID check.
Nepali (Romanized): Uttam Yi khataharu kholnako lagi 100 anka ko ID jaanch dinuparchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): उत्तम। यी खाताहरू खोल्नको लागि १०० अंकको ID जाँच दिनुपर्छ।

English: All the information is provided on this list.
Nepali (Romanized): Sabai jaankari yes suchi ma diyiyeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सबै जानकारी यस सूचीमा दिइएको छ।

English: Sure Please take it and deposit $150 into both the accounts.
Nepali (Romanized): Huncha Kripaya linuhos ra dubai khatama $150 jamma garidinuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): हुन्छ। कृपया लिनुहोस् र दुबै खातामा $१५० जम्मा गरिदिनुहोस्।

English: Can you please tell me how long it would take for this?
Nepali (Romanized): K kripa ya tapai malai batauna saknuhunchha yesko lagi kati samaya lagne chha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के कृपया तपाईं मलाई बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ यसको लागि कति समय लाग्ने छ?

English: Sure Once all the documents are verified it will take up to 48 hours for the account to be active.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Ekchoti kagajaatharu pusti bhaisakepaxi khata sakriya huna 48 ghanta lagnecha.
column5: खाता सक्रिय हुन ४८ घण्टा लाग्नेछ।

English: Is there anything else I can help you with?
Nepali (Romanized): K ma tapailai aru kehi ma madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के म तपाईंलाई अरु केहीमा मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Yes I want to ask if I need to order a cheque what should I do and how long does it take to get it.
Nepali (Romanized): Hajur Ma yo sodhna chahanchu ki yedi maile cheque magaunu paryo bhane k garnu parcha ani tesko lagi kati samaya lagcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): हजुर। म यो सोध्न चाहन्छु कि यदि मैले चेक मगाउनु पर्यो भने के गर्नुपर्छ अनि त्यसको लागि कति समय लाग्छ?

English: To order the check you need to fill out this application form.
Nepali (Romanized): Check magaunako lagi tapaile yo aavedan faram bharnu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): चेक मगाउनको लागि तपाईंले यो आवेदन फारम भर्नुपर्छ।

English: Give it about 5 to 7 business days.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesko lagi 5 dekhi 7 byaparik din lagnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसको लागि ५ देखि ७ व्यापारिक दिन लाग्नेछ।

English: You can either collect it in the bank or receive it in the mail.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile yo bank ma sankalan garna saknuhuncha athawa daak ma prapta garna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले यो बैंकमा संकलन गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ अथवा हुलाकमा प्राप्त गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): Pramanit / Sahi cha bhanera sahi garnu
Nepali (Devanagari): प्रमाणित / सही छ भनेर सही गर्नु

English: Good morning sir. How may I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Subha prabhat mahodaya Ma aaja tapailai kasari madat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ प्रभात महोदय। म आज तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I want to apply for a loan. What do I have to do for that?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma rin linako lagi abedan dina chahanchhu Tesko lagi maile k garnu parcha hola?
Nepali (Devanagari): म ऋण लिनको लागि आवेदन दिन चाहन्छु। त्यसको लागि मैले के गर्नुपर्छ होला?

English: Sure. What kind of a loan are you looking at?
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya tapai kasto prakarko rin herdai hunuhunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य। तपाईं कस्तो प्रकारको ऋण हेर्दै हुनुहुन्छ?

English: I want a loan for a new house.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma naya gharko lagi rin chahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म नयाँ घरको लागि ऋण चाहन्छु।

English: I have some savings but it is not enough to buy a house.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga kehi bachat chha tara tyo ghar kinnako lagi paryapta chhaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग केही बचत छ तर त्यो घर किन्नको लागि पर्याप्त छैन।

English: I am looking for a loan with a minimum interest rate.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile nyunatam byajdar ko rin khojdai chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले न्यूनतम ब्याजदरको ऋण खोज्दै छु।

English: Sure! How much do you want to apply for?
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Tapai katiko lagi abedan dina chahanu huncha?

English: Sure I received a letter which stated that my citizenship ceremony is scheduled for 15th of July but the letter had only my name written on it.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Maile euta patra prapta gare jasma lekhiyeko thiyo ki mero nagarikta samaroha 15 July ko lagi nirdharit gariyeko chha tara tyo patra ma mero matra naam lekhiyeko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य। मैले एउटा पत्र प्राप्त गरें जसमा लेखिएको थियो कि मेरो नागरिकता समारोह १५ जुलाईको लागि निर्धारित गरिएको छ तर त्यो पत्रमा मेरो मात्र नाम लेखिएको थियो।

English: Therefore my question is that won't my family's and my citizenship ceremony take place together?

Nepali (Romanized): Ehh maile bujhay Yo anapekshit ho.

Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको मद्दत गर्नको लागि मलाई तपाईं र तपाईंको परिवारको विस्तृत जानकारी चाहिन्छ।

English: Please tell me your name present address passport number and contact number?

column5: हालको ठेगाना
column6: राहदानी नम्बर र सम्पर्क नम्बर बताउनुहोस्।

column5: रिभरस्टोन
column6: NSW २०६५ हो।

Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो राहदानी नम्बर L76567576 हो र मेरो सम्पर्क नम्बर ०४६७ ३६७ २७६ हो।

English: I have 3 more members in my family except me my wife my 5 year-old daughter and my 1-month-old new-born son.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma bahek mero pariwarma 3 jana aru sadasyaharu chhan mero shrimati meri paanch barse chori ra mero ek mahine nawajaat chora.
Nepali (Devanagari): म बाहेक मेरो परिवारमा ३ जना अरु सदस्यहरू छन्

column6: मेरी पाँच वर्षे छोरी र मेरो एक महिने नवजात छोरा।

English: Thank you for the detailed information.
Yes I can see that you are the only one invited for the ceremony.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho ma dekhna sakchhu ki samarohama tapailai matra aamantrit gariyeko rahechha.
column5: म देख्न सक्छु कि समारोहमा तपाईंलाई मात्र आमन्त्रित गरिएको रहेछ।

English: Did you request the immigration department to hold this ceremony with your whole family?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile adhyagaman bibhaaglai yo samaroha tapaiko sampurna pariwar sangai garna anurodh garnu bhayeko thyo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले अध्यागमन विभागलाई यो समारोह तपाईंको सम्पूर्ण परिवार सँगै गर्न अनुरोध गर्नुभएको थियो?

English: I have requested the department since the beginning.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile bibhagma suru dekhi nai yo anurodh rakheko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले विभागमा सुरु देखि नै यो अनुरोध राखेको थिएँ।

English: I think the officers must have made a mistake.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagchaa adhikariharubata kehi galti bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ अधिकारीहरूबाट केही गल्ती भएको छ।

English: My family has played an emotional and supportive role towards our Australian dream.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro australiyali sapana pura garna mero pariwarle bhawanatmak ra sahayogi bhumika kheleka chhan.
column5: मेरो परिवारले भावनात्मक र सहयोगी भूमिका खेलेका छन्।

English: That's why this day is very important for all of us.
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhayera yo din hamro lagi dherai mahatwopurna chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यही भएर यो दिन हाम्रो लागि धेरै महत्वपूर्ण छ।

English: There might be some confusion and I apologise for this.
Nepali (Romanized): Anyolta bhayeko hunasakchha ra ma yesko lagi maafi chahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): अन्योलता भएको हुनसक्छ र म यसको लागि माफी चाहन्छु।

English: I can arrange all your citizenship ceremonies together.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapai sabai ko nagarikta samaroha sangai garauna prabanda garna sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईं सबैको नागरिकता समारोह सँगै गराउन प्रबन्ध गर्न सक्छु।

English: As you said you have a newborn kid.
Nepali (Romanized): Jasto ki tapaile bhannu bhayo tapaiko ekjana navjaat chora cha.
column5: तपाईंको एकजना नवजात छोरा छ।

English: In order to include him in the ceremony you need to register his details too.
Nepali (Romanized): Unlai yes samaaroh ma samavesh garauna tapaile unko bibaran pani darta garnu parne huncha.
column5: तपाईंले उनको विवरण पनि दर्ता गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

English: His date of birth is 3rd Feb 2020 and we have submitted an application for his passport but his passport has not yet been received.
Nepali (Romanized): Usko janma miti 3 Feb 2020 ho ra hamile usko rahadani ko lagi abedan bujhaisakeka chhau tara usko rahadani ahile samma prapta gareka chhainau.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसको जन्म मिति ३ फेब्रुअरी २०२० हो र हामीले उसको राहदानीको लागि आवेदन बुझाइसकेका छौं तर उसको राहदानी अहिलेसम्म प्राप्त गरेका छैनौं।

English: Great I have registered his details.
Nepali (Romanized): Dherai ramro Maile usko bibaran darta garisake.
column5: मैले उसको विवरण दर्ता गरिसकें।

English: I need you to send his birth certificate via email for verification purposes.
Nepali (Romanized): Pramanikaran prayojanka lagi tapaile usko janma dartako praman patra email marfat pathaidinu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): प्रमाणीकरण प्रयोजनका लागि तपाईंले उसको जन्म दर्ताको प्रमाण पत्र ईमेल मार्फत पठाइदिनुहोस्।

English: Additionally please tell me which date is suitable for all of you to attend the ceremony?
Nepali (Romanized): Thap kripaya malai bataunuhos tapaiharulai samarohama bhag linako lagi kun miti upayukta hunchha?
column5: कृपया मलाई बताउनुहोस् तपाईंहरूलाई समारोहमा भाग लिनको लागि कुन मिति उपयुक्त हुन्छ?

English: I will talk to my family and inform you of the suitable date.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero pariwar sanga kura garnechhu ra tapailai upayukta mitiko jaankari dinechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो परिवारसँग कुरा गर्नेछु र तपाईंलाई उपयुक्त मितिको जानकारी दिनेछु।

English: Perfect! Please call us and let us know about the date at least a week before.
Nepali (Romanized): Uttam! Kripaya hamilai samparka garnuhos ra hamilai miti ko barema sakesamma ek hapta agadi bataunuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): उत्तम! कृपया हामीलाई सम्पर्क गर्नुहोस् र हामीलाई मितिको बारेमा सकेसम्म एक हप्ता अगाडि बताउनुहोस्।

English: We would like to make it special for our citizens as we value their emotions.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami hamra nagarikharu ka lagi yo khaas banauna chahanchhau kinabhane hami uhaharuko bhawanako kadar garchhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी हाम्रा नागरिकहरूका लागि यो खास बनाउन चाहन्छौं किनभने हामी उहाँहरूको भावनाको कदर गर्छौं।

English: Thank you! Have a great day.

column5: शुभ

English: Good Morning! Department of Immigration and Citizenship. How may I help you?
Nepali (Romanized): Subha prabhat Adhyagaman ra Nagarikta Bibhag Ma tapailai kasari maddat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ प्रभात। अध्यागमन र नागरिकता विभाग। म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hello I have some questions regarding my Australian citizenship.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste Mero Australiyali nagarikta sambandhi kehi prasna haru chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते। मेरो अष्ट्रेलियाली नागरिकता सम्बन्धी केही प्रश्नहरू छन्।

English: Ok sure Please tell me a bit about yourself.
Nepali (Romanized): Hunchha nischit rupma Kripaya tapaiko barema kehi batauna hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): हुन्छ निश्चित रूपमा। कृपया तपाईंको बारेमा केही बताउनुहोस्।

English: My name is Prashant and I am a Nepali.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero naam Prashant ho ra ma Nepali hoon.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो नाम प्रशान्त हो र म नेपाली हुँ।

English: Last year in December I got married to a girl who is an Australian citizen.
Nepali (Romanized): Gata barsa December ma maile ek jana keti sanga bihe gare jo Australiyali nagarik ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): गत वर्ष डिसेम्बरमा मैले एक जना केटीसँग बिहे गरें जो अष्ट्रेलियाली नागरिक हो।

English: We were discussing that I should apply for my Australian citizenship.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami chalfal gardai thiyau ki maile mero Australiyali nagarikta ko lagi abedan dinu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी छलफल गर्दै थियौं कि मैले मेरो अष्ट्रेलियाली नागरिकताको लागि आवेदन दिनुपर्छ।

English: But she says that by marrying a citizen I automatically get citizenship.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara uni bhannu hunchha ki nagarik sanga biwaha garera ma swata: nagarikta paunechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर उनी भन्नुहुन्छ कि नागरिकसँग विवाह गरेर म स्वतः नागरिकता पाउनेछु।

English: Unfortunately partners of Australian Citizens do not have an automatic right to an Australian citizenship.
Nepali (Romanized): Durbhagyabas Australiyali nagarikharuka sajhedaarharu sanga Australiyali nagarikta ma swachalit adhikar hudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): दुर्भाग्यवश अष्ट्रेलियाली नागरिकहरूका साझेदारहरूसँग अष्ट्रेलियाली नागरिकतामा स्वचालित अधिकार हुँदैन।

English: They need to apply for the same and satisfy the eligibility criteria in the same way as other adult applicants.
Nepali (Romanized): Uniharule teska lagi abedan dinu parcha ra yogyata maapdanda pura garnu parchha tesari nai jasari anya vayashka awedakharu le garchan.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनीहरूले त्यसका लागि आवेदन दिनुपर्छ र योग्यता मापदण्ड पूरा गर्नुपर्छ
column5: त्यसरी नै जसरी अन्य वयस्क आवेदकहरूले गर्छन्।

English: Alright If I need to get citizenship what requirements do I have to fulfill?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha yadi maile nagarikta linu paryo bhane maile k kasta awashyaktaharu pura garnu parne huncha?
column5: यदि मैले नागरिकता लिनुपर्यो भने मैले के कस्ता आवश्यकताहरू पूरा गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ?

English: You must have been an Australian permanent resident for at least 1 year and lived in Australia for at least 9 out of 12 months.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai australiyali sthayi nibasi bhayeko kamtima 1 barsa bhaeko hunu parcha ra Australiama ti 12 mahina madhye 9 mahina baseko hunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं अष्ट्रेलियाली स्थायी निवासी भएको कम्तिमा १ वर्ष भएको हुनुपर्छ र अष्ट्रेलियामा ती १२ महिना मध्ये ९ महिना बसेको हुनुपर्छ।

English: Additionally you must be a lawful resident in Australia for at least 4 years before you apply.
Nepali (Romanized): Thap aavedan dina aghi tapai Australiako kanuni rupma nibasi bhayeko kamtima 4 barsa hunu parcha.
column5: आवेदन दिन अघि तपाईं अष्ट्रेलियाको कानुनी रूपमा निवासी भएको कम्तिमा ४ वर्ष हुनुपर्छ।

English: Other details are in our website.
Nepali (Romanized): Aru bibaran hamro website ma cha.

English: Well this is not something to be tense about.
Nepali (Romanized): Kher yo chinta ko bishaya hoina.
column5: यो चिन्ताको विषय होइन।

English: I came here around 5 years back.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yaha lagbhag paanch barsa agadi aayeko hun.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यहाँ लगभग पाँच वर्ष अगाडि आएको हुँ।

English: I was a teacher then and I have been living here legally since then.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma teti khera ek shikshak thiye ra ma tes bela dekhi kanuni rup ma basiraheko chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त्यति खेर एक शिक्षक थिएँ र म त्यस बेला देखि कानुनी रूपमा बसिरहेको छु।

English: Ok have you been away from Australia in that period?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha k tapai yes awadhi ma Australia bata bahira janu bhayo?
column5: के तपाईं यस अवधिमा अष्ट्रेलियाबाट बाहिर जानुभयो?

English: I just used to go home for Dashain-Tihar holidays and sometimes I had to go to different countries to hold a seminar.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma kewal Dashain-Tihar ko lagi ghar janthye ra kahile kahi bibhinna desh haru ma gosthi ka lagi janu parthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): म केवल दशैं-तिहारको लागि घर जान्थें र कहिलेकाहीं विभिन्न देशहरूमा गोष्ठीका लागि जानुपर्थ्यो।

Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani tyo pani ganine cha.
column5: त्यो पनि गनिने छ।

English: One more thing Mr. Prashant you'll have to pass the citizenship test in order for your application to get approved.
Nepali (Romanized): Euta arko kura Shriman Prashant tapaiko aabedan swikrit huna ko lagi tapaile nagarikta parikshya utirna garnu parnecha.
column5: तपाईंको आवेदन स्वीकृत हुनको लागि तपाईंले नागरिकता परीक्षा उत्तीर्ण गर्नुपर्नेछ।

English: Can you please enlighten me about the questions that will come?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai auna sakne prashnaharuka barema prakash pardina saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई आउन सक्ने प्रश्नहरूका बारेमा प्रकाश पारिदिन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Is there any book from where I can practise?
Nepali (Romanized): K kunai pustak cha jasbata ma abhyas garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के कुनै पुस्तक छ जसबाट म अभ्यास गर्न सक्छु?

English: Don't worry The exam is not that difficult if you practice.
Nepali (Romanized): Chinta nalinuhos Tapaile abhyas garnu bhayo bhane parikshya teti kathin hudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): चिन्ता नलिनुहोस्। तपाईंले अभ्यास गर्नुभयो भने परीक्षा त्यति कठिन हुँदैन।

English: There is a booklet on our website which you can download for free.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro websitema euta pustika cha jun tapaile nisulka download garna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो वेबसाइटमा एउटा पुस्तिका छ जुन तपाईंले निःशुल्क डाउनलोड गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: It's called Australian Citizenship - Our Common Bond.
Nepali (Romanized): Teslai Australian Citizenship - Our Common Bond bhanincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसलाई "Australian Citizenship - Our Common Bond" भनिन्छ।

English: Thank you I get emotional because to get citizenship here I'll have to give up my Nepali citizenship.
Nepali (Romanized): Dhanyabad Ma yo kurale bhawuk hunchu ki yahako nagarikta paunako lagi maile afno Nepali nagarikta tyagnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): धन्यवाद। म यो कुराले भावुक हुन्छु कि यहाँको नागरिकता पाउनको लागि मैले आफ्नो नेपाली नागरिकता त्याग्नु पर्छ।

English: I spent my childhood in Nepal.
So I'll make a decision only after thinking deeply.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesaile ma yes barema gahan bichar garera matra nirnaye linechhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसैले म यसबारेमा गहन विचार गरेर मात्र निर्णय लिनेछु।

English: Firstly you have to obey Australian Laws.
Nepali (Romanized): Sarwapratham tapaile Australiyali kanunharu palana garnu pardachha.
column5: तपाईंले अष्ट्रेलियाली कानुनहरू पालना गर्नु पर्दछ।

English: Secondly you have to defend Australia if need be.
Nepali (Romanized): Dosro tapaile awashyak parema Australia ko rakshya garnu parnechha.
column5: तपाईंले आवश्यक परेमा अष्ट्रेलियाको रक्षा गर्नु पर्नेछ।

English: Thirdly you have to serve on a jury if called to do so and most importantly you have to vote.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesro tapaile nirnayak ko rup ma sewa dinu parchha yadi bolayiko khandama ra sabai bhanda mahatwopurna tapaile matadan garnu parchha.
column5: तपाईंले निर्णायकको रूपमा सेवा दिनु पर्छ यदि बोलाइएको खण्डमा र सबैभन्दा महत्त्वपूर्ण
column6: तपाईंले मतदान गर्नु पर्छ।

column5: खैर
column6: हम्

English: Good Morning! You have called the Department of Home Affairs.
Nepali (Romanized): Subha-prabhat! Tapaile griha bibhag ma samparka garnu vayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ-प्रभात! तपाईंले गृह विभागमा सम्पर्क गर्नु भएको छ।

English: This is Bella speaking. How can I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Bella boldai chu Ma tapailai aja kasari madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म बेला बोल्दै छु। म तपाईंलाई आज कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hello Bella I am fine. Thank you for asking.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaskar Bella ma thik chu Sodnu vayeko ma dhanyabaad.
column5: म ठीक छु। सोध्नु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: I am Kishan and I would like to know how to apply for a visitor visa for my mother.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Kishan hu ra ma afno amako lagi agantuk praveshaagyako kasari aabedan dine vanera janna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म किशन हुँ र म आफ्नो आमाको लागि आगन्तुक प्रवेशाज्ञाको कसरी आवेदन दिने भनेर जान्न चाहन्छु।

English: Definitely I can help you with that.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani ma tapailai yesma madat garna sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): पक्कै पनि म तपाईंलाई यसमा मद्दत गर्न सक्छु।

English: There are three types of subclass of visitor visas you can apply for: evisitor subclass 651 visitor visa subclass 600 and electronic travel authority visa subclass 601.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile aavedan dina sakne agantuk praveshagyaka upa wargaharu tin prakaarka chan evisitor upa warga 651 agantuk praveshaagya upa warga 600 ra bidhutiya yatra aadhikarik praveshaagya upa warga 601.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले आवेदन दिन सक्ने आगन्तुक प्रवेशाज्ञाका उप वर्गहरू तीन प्रकारका छन्: इभिजिटर (उप वर्ग ६५१)
column5: आगन्तुक प्रवेशाज्ञा (उप वर्ग ६००) र विद्युतीय यात्रा आधिकारिक प्रवेशाज्ञा (उप वर्ग ६०१)।

English: Oh I don't know anything about it.
Nepali (Romanized): Ohho malai esko barema kei tha chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): ओहो मलाई यसको बारेमा केही थाहा छैन।

English: Could you give me some brief information about all of the mentioned subclasses?
Nepali (Romanized): Ke tapai malai ullekhit upa wargaharuko barema sangchipta jankari dina saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई उल्लेखित उप वर्गहरूको बारेमा संक्षिप्त जानकारी दिन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Actually I am a permanent resident of Australia but I recently came here.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma ma Australiako sthai niwasi hu tara ma yeha bharkharai ayeko hu.
column5: म अष्ट्रेलियाको स्थायी निवासी हुँ तर म यहाँ भर्खरै आएको हुँ।

English: Sure evisitor visas are available to a number of European citizens.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani evisitor praveshagya dherai Europeli nagarikharuko lagi upalabda cha.
column5: इभिजिटर प्रवेशाज्ञा धेरै युरोपेली नागरिकहरूको लागि उपलब्ध छ।

English: It allows multiple visits to Australia for tourism or business purposes and it cannot be extended.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesle paryatan wa byaparik prayojanka lagi Australiama bahu bhraman ko anumati dincha ra yeslai lambyaunu mildaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसले पर्यटन वा व्यापारिक प्रयोजनका लागि अष्ट्रेलियामा बहु भ्रमणको अनुमति दिन्छ र यसलाई लम्ब्याउन मिल्दैन।

English: Alright what citizenship does your mother hold?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha tapaiko aamale kun desh ko nagaritkta boknu huncha?
column5: तपाईंको आमाले कुन देशको नागरिकता बोक्नु हुन्छ?

English: I think this visa is not for her.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha ki yo visa uha ko lagi hoina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कि यो भिसा उहाँको लागि होइन।

English: What about the other two options you have mentioned before?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile pahile ullekh garnu vayeko baki dui wota bikalpaharu ka bare bhannu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले पहिले उल्लेख गर्नु भएको बाँकी दुई वटा विकल्पहरूका बारे भन्नु हुन्छ?

English: The other visa is Electronic Travel Authority visa subclass 601.
Nepali (Romanized): Arko bidhutiya yaatra adhikar praveshaagya upa warga 601.
Nepali (Devanagari): अर्को विद्युतीय यात्रा अधिकार प्रवेशाज्ञा (उप वर्ग ६०१) हो।

English: It allows you to visit Australia as many times as you want for up to a year and stay for three months during each visit.
Nepali (Romanized): Yeshle tapailai ek barsha samma dherai patak Australia bhraman garna anumati dincha ra pratyak bhramanma tin mahina samma basna dincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसले तपाईंलाई एक वर्षसम्म धेरै पटक अष्ट्रेलिया भ्रमण गर्न अनुमति दिन्छ
column5: र प्रत्येक भ्रमणमा तीन महिनासम्म बस्न दिन्छ।
यो राम्रो लाग्यो।

English: We want to open a company here in Australia and as an experienced business woman she takes all the decisions.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami Australiama euta sanstha kholna chahanchau ra ek anubhabi byapari mahilako rupma unle sabai nirnayaharu linchin.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी अष्ट्रेलियामा एउटा संस्था खोल्न चाहन्छौं र एक अनुभवी व्यापारी महिलाको रूपमा
column5: उनले सबै निर्णयहरू लिन्छिन्।

English: Does this visa allow her to be involved in business?
Nepali (Romanized): Ke yo visale uhalai byabasayama saglagna huna anumati dincha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यो भिसाले उहाँलाई व्यवसायमा संलग्न हुन अनुमति दिन्छ?

English: Well you will be happy to know that there is no visa application charge for an ETA.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha tapai yo janera khusi hunuhunecha ki ETAko lagi kunai visa aabedan sulka lagdaina.
column5: तपाईं यो जानेर खुसी हुनुहुनेछ कि ETA को लागि कुनै भिसा आवेदन शुल्क लाग्दैन।

English: However a $20 service charge applies for online applications only.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhapi kewal online aabedan ko lagi $20 sewa sulka lagu huncha.
column5: केवल अनलाइन आवेदनको लागि $२० सेवा शुल्क लागु हुन्छ।

English: Yes she can get involved in the business but there are some restrictions.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho uha byapaar ma sanglagna huna saknu huncha tara kehi pratibandhaharu chan.
column5: उहाँ व्यापारमा संलग्न हुन सक्नुहुन्छ तर केही प्रतिबन्धहरू छन्।

English: No fee at all? That is great!
What type of restrictions are there?
Could you please explain to me in detail?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai bistarma batauna saknuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई विस्तारमा बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Moreover what is the processing time?
column5: प्रक्रियामा कति समय लाग्छ?

English: In this visa she can only make general business enquiries and investigate negotiate enter into or review a business contract.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesh visama uha kewal samanya byabasay ik sodhpuch ra anusandhan samjhauta byapar karar ma pravesh wa samikshya garna saknu huncha.
column5: उहाँ केवल सामान्य व्यवसायिक सोधपुछ र अनुसन्धान
column6: सम्झौता
column7: व्यापार करारमा प्रवेश वा समीक्षा गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: She cannot provide services to an organisation based in Australia.
Nepali (Romanized): Uha Australiama adharit sangathanka lagi sewaharu dina saknu hunna.
Nepali (Devanagari): उहाँ अष्ट्रेलियामा आधारित संगठनका लागि सेवाहरू दिन सक्नुहुन्न।

English: And the processing time is not fixed.
Alright thank you for providing the useful information.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha upayukta jankari pradan garnu vayeko ma dhanyabaad.
column5: उपयुक्त जानकारी प्रदान गर्नु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: I think I will ask my family and discuss the visa.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero bicharma ma afno pariwarlai sodnechu ra visako bare chalfal garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो विचारमा म आफ्नो परिवारलाई सोध्नेछु र भिसाको बारे छलफल गर्नेछु।

English: After that I will lodge the application.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesh pachi ma aabedan darta garnechu.
column5: म आवेदन दर्ता गर्नेछु।

English: Please feel free to contact us for any further help.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya thap sahayogko lagi hamilai samparka garna nahichkichaunu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया थप सहयोगको लागि हामीलाई सम्पर्क गर्न नहिचकिचाउनु होला।

Nepali (Romanized): Electronic Travel Authority / Bidhutiya Yatra Adhikaar
Nepali (Devanagari): इलेक्ट्रोनिक ट्राभल अथोरिटी / विद्युतीय यात्रा अधिकार

Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai kasari madat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Actually I wanted to get some information regarding your recruitment services.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma ma tapaiko bharti sewaharu ko barema kehi jankari lina chahanthe.
Nepali (Devanagari): वास्तवमा म तपाईंको भर्ती सेवाहरूको बारेमा केही जानकारी लिन चाहन्थें।

English: We recruit people across all industries but we specialise in 4 industries.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami manchhe haru lai sabai udhyog ma bharti gardachhau tara hami 4 ota udhyogharu ma bisheshyagyata dekhauchhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी मान्छेहरूलाई सबै उद्योगमा भर्ती गर्दछौं तर हामी ४ वटा उद्योगहरूमा विशेषज्ञता देखाउँछौं।

English: They are accounting finance sales and marketing.
Nepali (Romanized): Ti hun lekha bitta bikri ra bazar.
column5: वित्त
column6: बिक्री र बजार।

English: As we want to outsource our recruitment process and after a lot of thinking we have come to the conclusion that we would require more staff for sales and marketing.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami hamro bharti prakriya outsource garna chaahanchhau ra dherai bichar pachhi hami yo niskarsha ma pugeka chhau ki hamilai bikri ra bazar kaa lagi thap karmachari haru chaahinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी हाम्रो भर्ती प्रक्रिया आउटसोर्स गर्न चाहन्छौं र धेरै विचार पछि हामी यो निष्कर्षमा पुगेका छौं कि हामीलाई बिक्री र बजारका लागि थप कर्मचारीहरू चाहिन्छ।

English: We use various Internet sources as well as print media to source high quality candidates.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami uccha stariya umedwarharu lina bibhinna internet shrot haru ra sathai sanchar madhyam prayog gardachhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी उच्च स्तरीय उम्मेद्वारहरू लिन विभिन्न इन्टरनेट स्रोतहरू र साथै सञ्चार माध्यम प्रयोग गर्दछौं।

English: On top of this we have an extending range of sources in the media industry all around.
Nepali (Romanized): Yes bahek hami sanga sanchar udhyog ma bistrit shrot haru chhan.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस बाहेक हामीसँग सञ्चार उद्योगमा विस्तृत स्रोतहरू छन्।

Nepali (Romanized): K tapai bigyapanko lagi sulka linu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं विज्ञापनको लागि शुल्क लिनुहुन्छ?

Nepali (Romanized): Yedi ho bhane kati linu huncha?
column5: कति लिनुहुन्छ?

English: No we do not charge for advertising.
Nepali (Romanized): Hoina hami bigyapanko lagi shulka lidainau.
column5: हामी विज्ञापनको लागि शुल्क लिँदैनौं।

English: In fact we can often fill your position without the need for any kind of advertising.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma hami praya kunai pani prakar ko biygapan bina tapaiko padpurti garna sakchhau.
column5: हामी प्रायः कुनै पनि प्रकारको विज्ञापन बिना तपाईंको पदपूर्ति गर्न सक्छौं।

English: However should you wish to do any kind of special advertising we can negotiate.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhapi yadi tapai kunai bishesh prakar ko bigyapan garna chahanu hunchha bhane hami samjhauta garna sakchhau.
column5: यदि तपाईं कुनै विशेष प्रकारको विज्ञापन गर्न चाहनुहुन्छ भने हामी सम्झौता गर्न सक्छौं।

English: How long do you take to interview a candidate?
Nepali (Romanized): Umedwar ko antarbarta lina tapai kati samaya linu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): उम्मेद्वारको अन्तर्वार्ता लिन तपाईं कति समय लिनुहुन्छ?

English: The average interview takes approximately 49-50 minutes but this can differ depending upon the role the person is interviewed for.
Nepali (Romanized): Ausatma antarbarta lagbhag 49 dekhi 50 minute lagchha tara yo kun pad ko lagi antarbarta diraheko cha bhanne kura ma bhar parna sakchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): औसतमा अन्तर्वार्ता लगभग ४९ देखि ५० मिनेट लाग्छ तर यो कुन पदको लागि अन्तर्वार्ता दिइरहेको छ भन्ने कुरामा भर पर्न सक्छ।

English: What if the candidate doesn't fit the role?
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi umedwar pad anurup nabhae k hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि उम्मेद्वार पद अनुरूप नभए के हुन्छ?

English: If a candidate does not work out for whatever reason within their probationary period we can refill the role free of charge.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi parishya kaalawadhi bhitra jun sukai karanbas ummedbaar kaam lagena bhane hami purna padpurti nishulka garna sakdachhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि परीक्षण कालावधि भित्र जुनसुकै कारणबस उम्मेद्वार काम लागेन भने हामी पूर्ण पदपूर्ति निःशुल्क गर्न सक्दछौं।

English: Thanks once again for providing me this information.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai yo jankari pradan garnu bhaeko ma punha dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई यो जानकारी प्रदान गर्नु भएकोमा पुनः धन्यवाद।

English: I will email you soon after talking to my employer.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero haakim sanga kura garepaxi ma tapailai email garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो हाकिम सँग कुरा गरेपछि म तपाईंलाई ईमेल गर्नेछु।

English: Should you have any further questions please feel free to send an email.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapai sanga kehi thap prasna haru chhan bhane kripaya email pathauna sankoch namannu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंसँग केही थप प्रश्नहरू छन् भने कृपया ईमेल पठाउन संकोच नमान्नु होला।

English: How can I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai aaja kasari maddat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई आज कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I talked to your secretary yesterday and she asked me to come and see you.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile hijo tapaiko sachib sanga kura gare ra unle malai aayera tapailai bhetna bhanin.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले हिजो तपाईंको सचिवसँग कुरा गरें र उनले मलाई आएर तपाईंलाई भेट्न भनिन्।

Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapai aunu huncha bhanera aasa gardai thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईं आउनुहुन्छ भनेर आशा गर्दै थिएँ।

English: My secretary told me that you would like to join our recruitment agency.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero sachib le malai bhannu bhayo ki tapai hamro bharti sanstha sanga judna chaahanu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो सचिवले मलाई भन्नुभयो कि तपाईं हाम्रो भर्ती संस्थासँग जुड्न चाहनुहुन्छ।

English: Could you please provide me with your C.V?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai afno CV / baiyaktik bibaran pradan garna saknu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई आफ्नो वैयक्तिक विवरण प्रदान गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: I saw your advertisement in the newspaper.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tapaiko bigyapan patrika ma dekheko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तपाईंको विज्ञापन पत्रिकामा देखेको थिएँ।

English: Do you have any such job where I don't have to speak much English?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai sanga testo kunai kaam cha jasma maile dherai angrezi bolnu pardaina?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंसँग त्यस्तो कुनै काम छ जसमा मैले धेरै अंग्रेजी बोल्नु पर्दैन?

English: We have a list of organisations that need skilled labour.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami sanga yesta sangathan haru ko suchi chha jasma kushal shram / yogya janashakti ko awashyakta pardachha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीसँग यस्ता संगठनहरूको सूची छ जसमा कुशल श्रम / योग्य जनशक्तिको आवश्यकता पर्दछ।

English: Even if you have basic English that will do.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapailai aadharbhut angrezi matra aayepani tesle kaam garchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंलाई आधारभूत अंग्रेजी मात्र आएपनि
column5: त्यसले काम गर्छ।

English: But before we proceed further I need some more details like your visa status work rights etc.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara hami aghi badnu pahile malai kehi thap bibaran haru chaahinchha jastai tapaiko praveshaagya sthiti kaam garne adhikar haru aadi.
column5: मलाई केही थप विवरणहरू चाहिन्छ जस्तै तपाईंको प्रवेशाज्ञा स्थिति
column6: काम गर्ने अधिकारहरू आदि।

English: I have worked for a long time as a welder in Nepal.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile Nepal ma lamo samaya samma welderko rupma kaam gareko chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले नेपालमा लामो समयसम्म वेल्डरको रूपमा काम गरेको छु।

English: I have around 4 years of experience.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga lagbhag 4 barsa ko anubhav chha.

English: At present I am on a dependent visa and we have applied for permanent residency.
Nepali (Romanized): Haal ma saajhedar praveshaagya ma chhu ra sthayi praveshaagya ko lagi aabedan diyeko chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाल म साझेदार प्रवेशाज्ञामा छु र स्थायी प्रवेशाज्ञाको लागि आवेदन दिएको छु।

English: Once you'll be recruited you have to undergo training.
Nepali (Romanized): Ek choti tapai bharti bhayepachhi tapaile prashikshan linu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): एक चोटी तपाईं भर्ती भएपछि तपाईंले प्रशिक्षण लिनु पर्छ।

English: If ever you face any discrimination you can always contact Fair works Ombudsman.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapaile kahile kunai bhedbhav ko samana garnu bhayo bhane tapai jahile pani Fair Work Ombudsman lai samparka garna saknu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंले कहिले कुनै भेदभावको सामना गर्नुभयो भने
column5: तपाईं जहिले पनि फेयर वर्क ओम्बड्सम्यानलाई सम्पर्क गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Please mention if you have any other special requirements.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapai sanga kunai bishesh awashyaktaharu chhan bhane kripaya ulekh garnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंसँग कुनै विशेष आवश्यकताहरू छन् भने कृपया उल्लेख गर्नुहोस्।

column5: अरु केही छैन।

English: I just want my salary in my account which is the joint account belonging to me and my husband.
Nepali (Romanized): Matra malai mero talab mero khata ma chaahinchha jun mero ra mero shriman ko sanyukta khata ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मात्र मलाई मेरो तलब मेरो खातामा चाहिन्छ जुन मेरो र मेरो श्रीमानको संयुक्त खाता हो।

English: You will get your salary in your nominated account.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile tapaiko talab afno manonit khata ma paunu hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले तपाईंको तलब आफ्नो मनोनीत खातामा पाउनु हुनेछ।

English: Additionally you need to undergo a health and safety training as well as first-aid training.
Nepali (Romanized): Thap tapaile swasthya ra surakshya prashikshyanko saath saathai prathamik upacharko taalim linu parchha.
column5: तपाईंले स्वास्थ्य र सुरक्षा प्रशिक्षणको साथ साथै प्राथमिक उपचारको तालिम लिनु पर्छ।

English: Moreover when are you ready to start?
Nepali (Romanized): Yasbahek tapai kahile bata shuru garna tayaar hunuhunchha?
column5: तपाईं कहिले बाट सुरु गर्न तयार हुनुहुन्छ?

English: I can start work from tomorrow.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma bholi dekhi nai kaam shuru garna sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म भोलि देखि नै काम सुरु गर्न सक्छु।

English: I believe that we should not delay doing good things.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero dharana ma asal kaam garnuma dheelai garnu hudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो धारणामा असल काम गर्नुमा ढिलाई गर्नु हुँदैन।

English: One more thing would they ask me questions related to my profession in the interview or can they ask something else?
Nepali (Romanized): Arko euta kura antarbarta ko bela uniharule mero pesha sanga sambandhit prasna haru matra sodhnechhan ki aru pani sodhna sakchhan?
column5: अन्तर्वार्ताको बेला उनीहरूले मेरो पेशा सँग सम्बन्धित प्रश्नहरू मात्र सोध्नेछन् कि अरु पनि सोध्न सक्छन्?

English: They will not ask you very complex questions rather the questions will be simple and straightforward.
Nepali (Romanized): Uniharule tapailai dherai jatil prasna haru sodhne chhainan baru prasna haru saral ra sidha hunechhan.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनीहरूले तपाईंलाई धेरै जटिल प्रश्नहरू सोध्ने छैनन्
column5: बरु प्रश्नहरू सरल र सीधा हुनेछन्।
