English: Anyway before your interview you can come here if you want us to help you with preparation.
Nepali (Romanized): J bhaye pani tapaiko antarbata agadi tapai yeha auna saknu huncha yadi tapailai afno tayari garna maddat chahema.
column5: तपाईंको अन्तर्वार्ता अगाडि तपाईं यहाँ आउन सक्नुहुन्छ यदि तपाईंलाई आफ्नो तयारी गर्न मद्दत चाहेमा।

English: Thanks a lot for your help.
I will bring sweets for you once I get the job.
Nepali (Romanized): Jaba maile kaam pauchhu ma tapaiko lagi mithai lyaune chhu.
column5: म तपाईंको लागि मिठाई ल्याउने छु।

English: My secretary told me that your company is interested in hiring us to do your overseas recruitment.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero sachible malai bhannu bhanyo ki tapaiko sansthale hamilai tapaiko baidesik bhartiko lagi kaam garauna ruchi dekhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो सचिवले मलाई भन्नुभयो कि तपाईंको संस्थाले हामीलाई तपाईंको वैदेशिक भर्तीको लागि काम गराउन रुचि देखाएको छ।

English: I represent Mobilink Communication Services which is one of the fastest growing media companies of today.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Mobilink Sanchar Sewa ko pratinidhitwa gardachhu jun aajkal ko sabai bhanda chito unnati gariraheko sanchar sanstha ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मोबिलिंक सञ्चार सेवाको प्रतिनिधित्व गर्दछु जुन आजकलको सबैभन्दा छिटो उन्नति गरिरहेको सञ्चार संस्था हो।

English: Our recruitment requirements will continue to grow over the next year given the way our company is evolving.
Nepali (Romanized): Jasari hamro sanstha ko bikash bhairaheko chha tyo tarika ley hamro bharti awashyaktaharu arko barsha jhanai badhnechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): जसरी हाम्रो संस्थाको विकास भइरहेको छ त्यो तरिकाले हाम्रो भर्ती आवश्यकताहरू अर्को वर्ष झनै बढ्नेछ।

English: Ah yes! I read the English version of the company profile you sent through last week.
Nepali (Romanized): Ah ho Tapaile pachhilo hapta pathaunu bhayeko tapaiko sansthako bibaranko angrezi sanskaran maile padhe.
Nepali (Devanagari): अँ हो! तपाईंले पछिल्लो हप्ता पठाउनु भएको तपाईंको संस्थाको विवरणको अंग्रेजी संस्करण मैले पढें।

English: Your company seems to be going through quite a transformation.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko sanstha dherai rupantaran bhairaheko dekhinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको संस्था धेरै रूपान्तरण भइरहेको देखिन्छ।

English: Usually our Human Resources Department handles all our recruiting but we are now looking to outsource it.
Nepali (Romanized): Praya jaso hamro sabai bhartiharu hamro manav sansaadhan bibhagle samhalchha tara hami aba yeslai outsource garauna khojiraheka chhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): प्रायः जसो हाम्रो सबै भर्तीहरू हाम्रो मानव संसाधन विभागले सम्हाल्छ तर हामी अब यसलाई आउटसोर्स गराउन खोजिरहेका छौं।

English: Well let me say you have made a wise choice.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ta bhanchu ki tapaile euta budhimani chanot garnu bhayeko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त भन्छु कि तपाईंले एउटा बुद्धिमानी छनोट गर्नुभएको छ।

English: We found out about your company after we did some research on recruitment companies in Australia.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile Australiya ka bharti sansthaharu mathi kehi anusandhan gare pachhi tapaiko sansthako barema thaha payau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले अष्ट्रेलियाका भर्ती संस्थाहरू माथि केही अनुसन्धान गरे पछि तपाईंको संस्थाको बारेमा थाहा पायौं।

English: Your market share seems fairly high.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko bazar share ekdum dherai dekhinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको बजार शेयर एकदम धेरै देखिन्छ।

English: I am also proud of the achievements we have made.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pani hamile gareka upalabdhima garba gardachhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म पनि हामीले गरेका उपलब्धिमा गर्व गर्दछु।

Nepali (Romanized): Sanstha batai bharti garauna besi samaya lagna sakchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): संस्था बाटै भर्ती गराउन बेसी समय लाग्न सक्छ।

English: My company can save you time and money.
Nepali (Romanized): tara mero sansthale tapaiko samaya ra paisa bachaidina sakchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मेरो संस्थाले तपाईंको समय र पैसा बचाइदिन सक्छ।

English: What kind of services do you provide specifically?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai bishesh rupma kasta prakarka sewaharu pradan garnu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं विशेष रूपमा कस्ता प्रकारका सेवाहरू प्रदान गर्नुहुन्छ?

English: We handle the whole recruitment process From resumes to cover-letters to organising all the job interviews.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami purai bharti prakriya herchau Baiyaktik bibaran dekhi cover patra dekhi jagir ko antarbarta samma sabai herchhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी पूरै भर्ती प्रक्रिया हेर्छौं। वैयक्तिक विवरण देखि कभर पत्र देखि जागिरको अन्तर्वार्ता सम्म सबै हेर्छौं।

English: I see I'm going to start taking some notes as I have a few questions I'd like to ask.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha Ma kehi tipot garna suru garchhu kinabhane ma sanga kehi prasna haru chhan jun ma sodhna chahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ। म केही टिपोट गर्न सुरु गर्छु किनभने मसँग केही प्रश्नहरू छन् जुन म सोध्न चाहन्छु।

Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai kasari sahayog garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई कसरी सहयोग गर्न सक्छु?

English: I would like to book a room in your hotel.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapaiko hotelma euta kotha aarakshan garna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंको होटलमा एउटा कोठा आरक्षण गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: We have planned to stay here for three or four days.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile tin wa char din yaha basne yojana gareka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले तीन वा चार दिन यहाँ बस्ने योजना गरेका छौं।

English: What type of room are you after?
We have single rooms double rooms and deluxe rooms available.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamisanga ekal kothaharu double kothaharu ra deluxe kothaharu upalabda chan.
column5: डबल कोठाहरू र डिलक्स कोठाहरू उपलब्ध छन्।

Nepali (Romanized): Yo Deluxe kotha bhaneko k ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): यो डिलक्स कोठा भनेको के हो?

English: In the deluxe rooms we have a geyser a telephone a colour TV and an attendant.
Nepali (Romanized): Deluxe kothaharuma hamisanga euta geyser telephone rangin TV ra ek sewak cha.
column5: टेलिफोन
column6: रंगीन टिभी र एक सेवक छ।

English: Each suite is a self-contained unit that has a separate sitting room and an attached bath and a balcony overlooking the garden.
Nepali (Romanized): Pratyak suite aatma-nihit cha jasma chuttai baithak kotha rа euta jodiyeko snankakshya ra bagaicha abalokan garne euta varanda cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): प्रत्येक सुइट आत्म-निहित छ जसमा छुट्टै बैठक कोठा
column5: र एउटा जोडिएको स्नानकक्ष र बगैंचा अवलोकन गर्ने एउटा बरन्डा छ।

English: There is also a valet who will attend to all your needs.
Nepali (Romanized): Euta sewak pani huncha jasle tapaika sabai abashektaharuko dhyan rakhnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): एउटा सेवक पनि हुन्छ जसले तपाईंका सबै आवश्यकताहरूको ध्यान राख्नेछ।

English: Could you please tell me the charges for each of these?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai yee pratayakko sulka bataunu saknuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई यी प्रत्येकको शुल्क बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: We are interested in air-conditioned accommodation?
Nepali (Romanized): Hami airconditioner bhaeko thauma ruchi rakdachau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी एयर कन्डिसनर भएको ठाउँमा रुचि राख्दछौं।

English: This is the tariff card maam.
You'll find all the details in this one.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai yesma sabai bibaranaharu paunu hunecha.

English: The suite of course is too expensive for us.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo suite nisandeha hamro lagi dherai mahango vayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो सुइट निसन्देह हाम्रो लागि धेरै महँगो भयो।

English: I am interested in the double room but there are three of us me my husband and our ten-year-old son.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma double kothama ruchi rakchu tara hami tin jana chau Ma mero shriman ra hamro das barshe chora.
Nepali (Devanagari): म डबल कोठामा रुचि राख्छु तर हामी तीन जना छौं
column5: म
column6: मेरो श्रीमान् र हाम्रो दश वर्षे छोरा।

English: If you want you can take a double room.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi tapai chahanuhuncha vane tapai ek double kotha lina saknuhuncha.
column5: तपाईं एक डबल कोठा लिन सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: We can accommodate three people there.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami tyaha tinjana samayojan garna sakchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी त्यहाँ तीनजना समायोजन गर्न सक्छौं।

English: You will just have to pay a little extra for the third bed.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile tesro khaatko lagi matra ali badi tirnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले तेस्रो खाटको लागि मात्र अलि बढी तिर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

English: Do I have to pay any advance now?
Nepali (Romanized): K maile aba kunai agrim bhuktani garnu parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के मैले अब कुनै अग्रिम भुक्तानी गर्नुपर्छ?

Nepali (Romanized): Hami tyo pachi sankalan garna sakchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी त्यो पछि संकलन गर्न सक्छौं।

English: We have given you room number 202 on the second floor.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile tapailai dosro tallako kotha number 202 diyeka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले तपाईंलाई दोस्रो तल्लाको कोठा नम्बर २०२ दिएका छौं।

English: I'll instruct the bell-boy to take your luggage to your room.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sewaklai tapaiko saman tapaiko kothama laijana nirdesan dinechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म सेवकलाई तपाईंको सामान तपाईंको कोठामा लैजान निर्देशन दिनेछु।

English: In case you need anything further you can contact the reception.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi tapailai kehi thap abashek parema tapaile swagat kakshyama samparka garna saknuhuncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंलाई केही थप आवश्यक परेमा तपाईंले स्वागत कक्षमा सम्पर्क गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: We hope you have a pleasant stay here.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami asha gardachau ki tapaiko basai yaha aaramdayi rahos.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी आशा गर्दछौं कि तपाईंको बसाई यहाँ आरामदायी रहोस्।

English: Ms. Manisha can I talk to you for a moment?
Nepali (Romanized): Sushri Manisha k ma tapai sanga ekchin kura garna sakchu?
column5: के म तपाईंसँग एकछिन कुरा गर्न सक्छु?

English: I'm actually concerned about the delays we're experiencing with some of our suppliers.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma vastavma hamra kehi aapurtikartaharubata bhairaheko dhilai ko bare chintit chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म वास्तवमा हाम्रा केही आपूर्तिकर्ताहरूबाट भइरहेको ढिलाइको बारेमा चिन्तित छु।

English: Umm look I know that and I am also concerned about it.
Nepali (Romanized): Hernuhos malai tyo thaha cha ra ma pani yesko bare chintit chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हेर्नुहोस् मलाई त्यो थाहा छ र म पनि यसको बारे चिन्तित छु।

English: That's why we're doing everything to get back on our previous schedule.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesaile hami purva talika ma farkina ko lagi sabai chiz gardaichau.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसैले हामी पूर्व तालिकामा फर्किनको लागि सबै चीज गर्दैछौं।

English: Could you give me an approximate timeline?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai anumanit samayawadhi dina saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई अनुमानित समयावधि दिन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: You know I have to pay for their deliveries out of my pocket.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapailai thaha nai cha maile merai khaltibata uniharuko bitaran ko bhuktani garnu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंलाई थाहा नै छ मैले मेरै खल्तीबाट उनीहरूको वितरणको भुक्तानी गर्नुपर्छ।

English: I am sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Nepali (Romanized): Asubhidha bhayeko ma malai maaf garnu hos.

English: A number of deliveries are arriving tomorrow.
Unfortunately this time of year is often troublesome.
Nepali (Romanized): Durbhagyawas barsa ko yo samaya praya samasyagrasta huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): दुर्भाग्यवश वर्षको यो समय प्रायः समस्याग्रस्त हुन्छ।

English: We can't make excuses to our clients.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami hamra grahak sanga bahana banauna sakdainau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी हाम्रा ग्राहकसँग बहाना बनाउन सक्दैनौं।

English: Where are most of our suppliers located?
Nepali (Romanized): Hamra praya aapurtikartaharu kaha awasthit chan?
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रा प्रायः आपूर्तिकर्ताहरू कहाँ अवस्थित छन्?

English: I think we need to take legal action against them as it is ruining our reputation in the business market.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha hamile uniharu birudhha kanuni karwahi garnu parcha kinaki yesle byapaar bazaarma hamro pratistha bigardaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ हामीले उनीहरू विरुद्ध कानुनी कारवाही गर्नुपर्छ किनकि यसले व्यापार बजारमा हाम्रो प्रतिष्ठा बिगार्दैछ।

English: Well most of them are in China but there are a few in California.
Nepali (Romanized): Uniharu madhya dherai jana China ma chan tara kehi California ma chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनीहरू मध्ये धेरै जना चीनमा छन् तर केही क्यालिफोर्नियामा छन्।

English: I don't think taking any such action would be a good idea as these suppliers are the cheapest.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagdaina ki testa kunai prakar ka karwahi garnu ramro bichar ho kinaki yi aapurtikartaharu sabai bhanda sasta hun.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्दैन कि त्यस्ता कुनै प्रकारका कारवाही गर्नु राम्रो विचार हो किनकि यी आपूर्तिकर्ताहरू सबै भन्दा सस्ता हुन्।

English: And they usually send the items on time but it is because of the climate in these countries that we are facing the delays.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra uniharule samanyataya saamanharu samaya mai pathauchan tara yi deshharuka mausam ka karan hamile yo dhilai bhogiraheka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): र उनीहरूले सामान्यतया सामानहरू समयमै पठाउँछन् तर यी देशहरूका मौसमका कारण हामीले यो ढिलाइ भोगिरहेका छौं।

English: But how does that affect deliveries?
Nepali (Romanized): Tara tesle bitaranlai kasari prabhav parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तर त्यसले वितरणलाई कसरी प्रभाव पार्छ?

English: I really am fed up with all this.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma ma yi cheez bata thakisake.

English: We can't imagine our business without customers which is eventually going to happen if they won't send our products this week.
Nepali (Romanized): Grahakharu bina hami hamro byapar ko kalpana garna sakdainau jun antata hune wala cha yadi uniharule yo hapta hamro utpadan pathayenan bhane.
Nepali (Devanagari): ग्राहकहरू बिना हामी हाम्रो व्यापारको कल्पना गर्न सक्दैनौं जुन अन्ततः हुनेवाला छ यदि उनीहरूले यो हप्ता हाम्रो उत्पादन पठाएनन् भने।

English: Because of the bad weather they can't get their raw materials on time.
Nepali (Romanized): Kharab mausamka karan uniharule afno aprasodhit samagri samayama prapta garna sakdainan.
Nepali (Devanagari): खराब मौसमका कारण उनीहरूले आफ्नो अप्रशोधित सामग्री समयमा प्राप्त गर्न सक्दैनन्।

English: Sometimes because of a bottleneck at the distribution point larger packages are delayed.
Nepali (Romanized): Kahile kahi bitaran bindu ma hune ba:dha adchan ko karan thula package haru dhilo hunchan.
Nepali (Devanagari): कहिलेकाहीं वितरण बिन्दुमा हुने बाधा अड्चनको कारण ठूला प्याकेजहरू ढिलो हुन्छन्।

English: Hmm.. Isn't there any alternate and not too expensive solution to these delays?
Nepali (Romanized): Hmm..yesta dhilai ka lagi k kunai baikalpik ra dherai mahango nabhayeko samadhan chaina?
Nepali (Devanagari): हम्.. यस्ता ढिलाइका लागि के कुनै वैकल्पिक र धेरै महँगो नभएको समाधान छैन?

English: Well we often work with delivery services such as UPS Fed ex or DHL for our most urgent shipping.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro attyawashyak shipping ko lagi hami praya UPS Fed ex wa DHL jasta bitaran sewaharusanga kaam garchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो अत्यावश्यक शिपिंगको लागि हामी प्रायः UPS
column5: Fed ex वा DHL जस्ता वितरण सेवाहरूसँग काम गर्छौं।

English: They guarantee door-to-door deliveries within 48 hours.
Nepali (Romanized): Uniharu le 48 ghanta bhitra dhoka mai bitaran garne jimma linchan.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनीहरूले ४८ घण्टा भित्र ढोकामै वितरण गर्ने जिम्मा लिन्छन्।

English: Hello! I would like to see the manager of your restaurant.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste! Ma tapaiko bhojanalaya ko prabandhak sanga bhetna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते! म तपाईंको भोजनालयको प्रबन्धकसँग भेट्न चाहन्छु।

English: Good to see you again ma'am.
Nepali (Romanized): Pheri bhetna pauda khusi lagyo mahodaya.
Nepali (Devanagari): फेरि भेट्न पाउँदा खुसी लाग्यो महोदया।

Nepali (Romanized): Khusi chu tapaile malai chinnu bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): खुसी छु तपाईंले मलाई चिन्नु भयो।

English: Being a regular customer of your restaurant I would like to share my experience.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko bhojanalaya ko niyamit grahak bhayeko karan ma mero anubhav badhna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको भोजनालयको नियमित ग्राहक भएको कारण म मेरो अनुभव बाँड्न चाहन्छु।

Nepali (Romanized): Yo ta hamrolagi khusiko kura ho mahodaya.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो त हाम्रोलागि खुसीको कुरा हो महोदया।

English: We always value feedback from our customers and we always try to meet their expectations.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami jahile hamra grahakharuka pratikriyalai mahatwa dinchau ra uha haruka apekshyaharu pura garna prayas gardachau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी जहिले हाम्रा ग्राहकहरूका प्रतिक्रियालाई महत्व दिन्छौं र उहाँहरूका अपेक्षा पूरा गर्न प्रयास गर्दछौं।

English: Your food is delicious and fresh.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko khana swadista ra taja cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको खाना स्वादिष्ट र ताजा छ।

English: Even I realised that you have maintained the quality and hygiene standards.
Nepali (Romanized): Ajha maile mahasoos gare ki tapaile gunastar ra swachchata / sarsafai maapdandaharu kayam rakhnu bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अझ मैले महसुस गरें कि तपाईंले गुणस्तर र स्वच्छता / सरसफाइ मापदण्डहरू कायम राख्नुभएको छ।

English: It is always a pleasure to dine at your restaurant.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko bhojanalaya ma khana khana sadhai ananda lagcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको भोजनालयमा खाना खान सधैं आनन्द लाग्छ।

English: We have a trained and experienced chef and he loves experimenting with food.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami sanga ek prasikshit ra anubhawi chef chan ra uha khanasanga prayog garna ruchauchan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीसँग एक प्रशिक्षित र अनुभवी सेफ छन् र उहाँ खानासँग प्रयोग गर्न रुचाउँछन्।

English: We always try to make sure that quality and standards are always met.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami jahile pani sunishchit garna khojchau ki hamra gunastar ra maapdanda pura rahos.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी जहिले पनि सुनिश्चित गर्न खोज्छौं कि हाम्रा गुणस्तर र मापदण्ड पुरा रहोस्।

English: Great! When we came here last Sunday one of your employees served us food and took care of our choices and served us with all her heart.
Nepali (Romanized): Ramro! Jaba hami gata aaitabaar yaha ayeka thiyau tapaiko ek karmacharile hamilai khana paskanu bhayo ra hamro rojaiko dhyan rakhe ra pura hridaya dekhi sewa gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): राम्रो! जब हामी गत आइतबार यहाँ आएका थियौं
column5: तपाईंको एक कर्मचारीले हामीलाई खाना पस्कनु भयो
column6: र हाम्रो रोजाइको ध्यान राखे र पूरा हृदय देखि सेवा गरे।

English: We have a lot of employees here.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami kaha yaha dherai karmachariharu chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी कहाँ यहाँ धेरै कर्मचारीहरू छन्।

English: If I am not wrong I think it was Pratigya who took the order and served you last time.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi ma galat chuina bhane malai lagcha ki tyo Pratigya thiyi jasle order liyeko thiyo ra pachilo patak tapaiko sewa garyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि म गलत छैन भने मलाई लाग्छ कि त्यो प्रतिज्ञा थिई जसले अर्डर लिएको थियो र पछिल्लो पटक तपाईंको सेवा गर्यो।

English: She is a very dedicated and hardworking employee.
Nepali (Romanized): Uni dherai samarpit ra mehinati karmachari hoon.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनी धेरै समर्पित र मेहनती कर्मचारी हुन्।

English: She took orders from my daughter and my daughter is allergic to nuts and gluten so your staff mentioned her the appropriate food choices.
Nepali (Romanized): Unle meri chori ko order liye ani meri chorilai badam ra glutenko allergy cha tesaile tapaiko karmacharile uslai upayukta khana bataye.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनले मेरी छोरीको अर्डर लिए अनि मेरी छोरीलाई बदाम र ग्लुटेनको एलर्जी छ त्यसैले तपाईंको कर्मचारीले उसलाई उपयुक्त खाना बताए।

English: The food was nicely cooked with less spices.
Nepali (Romanized): Khana ramro sanga kam masala ko saath pakaiyeko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): खाना राम्रो सँग कम मसलाको साथ पकाइएको थियो।

English: Yes all our employees are fully trained and they know how to cater to customers' needs.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho hamro sabai karmachari haru purna ruple prasikshit chan ra uniharu grahakko awashyaktaharu kasari puryaune bhanera jandachan.
column5: हाम्रो सबै कर्मचारीहरू पूर्ण रूपले प्रशिक्षित छन् र उनीहरू ग्राहकको आवश्यकताहरू कसरी पुर्याउने भनेर जान्दछन्।

English: That's not a problem at all.
My whole family praised her and her customer service.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero sampurna pariwarle unko ra unko grahak sewako prasansa gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो सम्पूर्ण परिवारले उनको र उनको ग्राहक सेवाको प्रशंसा गरे।

English: If so we would love it if she serves us today.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi chin bhane aja uhale hamro sewa gare hamilai ramro lagthyo.
column5: आज उहाँले हाम्रो सेवा गरे हामीलाई राम्रो लाग्थ्यो।

English: Moreover I would like to give her a tip.
Nepali (Romanized): Yasbahek ma unlai baksis dina chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसबाहेक म उनलाई बक्सिस दिन चाहन्छु।

column5: उनी छिन्।

English: I will ensure that she serves you.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yo sunischit garnechu ki uhale tapaiko dhyan rakchin.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यो सुनिश्चित गर्नेछु कि उहाँले तपाईंको ध्यान राख्छिन्।

English: I will also pass on the feedback you gave.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile diyeko pratikriya pani ma unilai bhanne chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले दिएको प्रतिक्रिया पनि म उनलाई भन्नेछु।

English: I am sure she will be overwhelmed to hear this.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pakka chu ki yo sunera uni khusi hunechin.
Nepali (Devanagari): म पक्का छु कि यो सुनेर उनी खुसी हुनेछिन्।

English: Now I want to book your party hall on the top floor for my daughter's birthday which is on 30 October 2020.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba ma meri choriko janmadin ko lagi mathillo talla ma tapaiko bhojan hall aarakshyan garna chahanchu jun 30 October 2020 ma cha.
column5: म मेरी छोरीको जन्मदिनको लागि माथिल्लो तल्लामा तपाईंको भोजन हल आरक्षण गर्न चाहन्छु जुन ३० अक्टोबर २०२० मा छ।

English: I need some of your details to book that.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai tyo aarakshit garna tapaika kehi bibaranharu chaahincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई त्यो आरक्षित गर्न तपाईंका केही विवरणहरू चाहिन्छ।

English: What time of the day would you like to reserve the party hall?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kati bajeko lagi bhojan hall aarakshit garna chahanu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं कति बजेको लागि भोजन हल आरक्षित गर्न चाहनुहुन्छ?

Nepali (Romanized): Kunai bishesh kura bata sharir ma hune pratikriya / Allergic
Nepali (Devanagari): कुनै विशेष कुराबाट शरीरमा हुने प्रतिक्रिया / एलर्जी

Nepali (Romanized): Ma Brenda hun Ryanko pramukh sikshika.
column5: रायनको प्रमुख शिक्षिका।

English: You asked me to come here to meet you as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile malai jati sakdo chado ayera tapailai vetna vannu bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले मलाई जति सक्दो चाँडो आएर तपाईंलाई भेट्न भन्नुभयो।

column5: ऊ एकदम ठिक छ।

English: Actually we have called you as we are concerned about his behaviour in the class.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma hamile tapailai bolayau kina bhane hami kakshyaa maa usko byabaharlai liyera chintit chau.
column5: हामीले तपाईंलाई बोलायौं किनभने हामी कक्षामा उसको व्यवहारलाई लिएर चिन्तित छौं।

English: His Maths teacher has caught him napping several times during the class.
Nepali (Romanized): Usko Ganitko sikshakle uslai dherai patak kakshyaama suteko vetaunu bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसको गणितको शिक्षकले उसलाई धेरै पटक कक्षामा सुतेको भेटाउनु भएको छ।

English: Is it? This is very shameful.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho ra? Yo ta dherai laajmardo kura ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): हो र? यो त धेरै लाजमर्दो कुरा हो।

English: He goes to his room on time at home.
Nepali (Romanized): Oo gharma ta samayamai afno kothama jancha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ऊ घरमा त समयमै आफ्नो कोठामा जान्छ।

English: How is it possible? I'll have to know the reason.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo kasari huna sakcha? Maile karan patta lagaunai parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो कसरी हुन सक्छ? मैले कारण पत्ता लगाउनै पर्छ।

English: Not only that Mr. Sambhab he's skipping classes.
Nepali (Romanized): Kewal teti matra haina srimaan Sambhab oo kaskshya ma pani audaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): केवल त्यति मात्र होइन श्रीमान् सम्भव
column5: ऊ कक्षामा पनि आउँदैन।

English: He has been irregular for the last two weeks.
Nepali (Romanized): Oo bigat 2 hapta dekhi aniyamit bhairaheko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ऊ विगत २ हप्ता देखि अनियमित भइरहेको छ।

English: We have also seen him bullying one of the students in his class.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile uslai afno kaskhyama ek bidarthi lai hepiraheko pani dekhyau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले उसलाई आफ्नो कक्षामा एक विद्यार्थीलाई हेपिरहेको पनि देख्यौं।

English: I am feeling ashamed after hearing this.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai yo sunera dherai laaj lagiraheko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई यो सुनेर धेरै लाज लागिरहेको छ।

English: I think this is all our fault.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha yo sabai hamro galti ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ यो सबै हाम्रो गल्ती हो।

English: We could not take care of him very well.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile uslai ramrari herchaha garna sakenau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले उसलाई राम्ररी हेरचाह गर्न सकेनौं।

English: His mother and I have just recently divorced because of which the environment at the house has been stressful.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ra usko aamako varkharai matra sambandhhabichhed vayeko cha jasle garda gharko mahol tanaabgrasta bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म र उसको आमाको भर्खरै मात्र सम्बन्धविच्छेद भएको छ जसले गर्दा घरको माहोल तनावग्रस्त भएको छ।

English: Of course it must have affected Ryan mentally.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani Ryan lai manasik rupma asar pareko hunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): पक्कै पनि रायनलाई मानसिक रूपमा असर परेको हुनुपर्छ।

English: This month was a lot better than the last one.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo mahina gata mahina vanda dherai ramro thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो महिना गत महिना भन्दा धेरै राम्रो थियो।

English: But before we separated my ex-wife abused me mentally and physically.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara hami chuttinu bhanda pahile mero bhutpurva srimatile malai manasik tatha saririk rupma durbyabahar garthe.
column5: मेरो भूतपूर्व श्रीमतीले मलाई मानसिक तथा शारीरिक रूपमा दुर्व्यवहार गर्थे।

English: And she would not only abuse Ryan but beat him too.
Nepali (Romanized): Ani usle Ryanlai gali garne matra haina kutthyi pani.
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि उनले रायनलाई गाली गर्ने मात्र होइन कुट्थिन् पनि।

English: Now I know the reason for his misbehaviour in the class.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba malai thaha bhayo usle kakshyama garne durbyabaharko karan.
Nepali (Devanagari): अब मलाई थाहा भयो उसले कक्षामा गर्ने दुर्व्यवहारको कारण।

English: He must have picked it up from home.
Mr. Sambhab try to communicate with Ryan and spend some quality time with him.
Nepali (Romanized): Mr. Sambhab Ryansanga kura garne prayas garnuhos ra oosanga gunastariye samaye bitaunuhos.
column5: रायनसँग कुरा गर्ने प्रयास गर्नुहोस् र उसँग गुणस्तरीय समय बिताउनुहोस्।

English: I will take good care of him from today.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ajai dekhi usko ramrari dhyan rakhnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आजै देखि उसको राम्ररी ध्यान राख्नेछु।

English: His future must not be compromised because of us.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro karan usko bhavisya bigrinu hudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो कारण उसको भविष्य बिग्रिनु हुँदैन।

column5: श्रीमान् सम्भव।

English: His grades have also dropped significantly in all subjects which is a shame because he used to be at the top of his class.
Nepali (Romanized): usko sabai bisayaharuma anka pani dherai nai ghateko cha jun laajmardo kura ho kinaki oo afno kaskhyako shirsha sthan ma hune garthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसको सबै विषयहरूमा अंक पनि धेरै नै घटेको छ
column5: जुन लाजमर्दो कुरा हो किनकि ऊ आफ्नो कक्षाको शीर्ष स्थानमा हुने गर्थ्यो।

English: I assure you that he will now work harder and he'll not trouble anyone in the class too.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai aashwaasan dinchu ki aba usle kada parishram garnecha ra kakshya ma pani usle kasailai dukha dine chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई आश्वासन दिन्छु कि अब उसले कडा परिश्रम गर्नेछ र कक्षामा पनि उसले कसैलाई दुख दिने छैन।

English: I am thinking of getting him a tuition.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma uslai tuition rakhne soch ma chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म उसलाई ट्युसन राख्ने सोचमा छु।

English: Do you know any good tutor?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapailai kunai ramro shikshakko barema thaha cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंलाई कुनै राम्रो शिक्षकको बारेमा थाहा छ?

English: I'm glad that you are taking the responsibility.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma khushi chu ki tapaile yo jimmewari linu hudaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म खुसी छु कि तपाईंले यो जिम्मेवारी लिनु हुँदैछ।

English: I know it will be hard for you to manage everything on your own.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thaha cha sabai chijharu afai prabandha garna tapailai garo huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थाहा छ सबै चीजहरू आफै प्रबन्ध गर्न तपाईंलाई गाह्रो हुन्छ।

English: You can ask our administration to help you.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile hamro prashasan sanga maddat magna saknuhuncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले हाम्रो प्रशासनसँग मद्दत माग्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: How may I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai aja kasari madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई आज कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

Nepali (Romanized): K ma Sushri Grace lai vetna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के म सुश्री ग्रेसलाई भेट्न सक्छु?

English: Actually I want to share a problem.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma ma euta samasya batauna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): वास्तवमा म एउटा समस्या बताउन चाहन्छु।

English: Tell me what the problem is.
Madam things are being stolen from our class.
Nepali (Romanized): Mahodaya hamro kakshyabata samaanharu gayab bhairaheka chan.
column5: हाम्रो कक्षाबाट सामानहरू गायब भइरहेका छन्।

English: Nothing happens until we are in the class but whenever we go to the playground for Physical Education class our stuff gets stolen from our bags.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami kashyama vayesamma kehi hudaina tara jaba hami saririk shikshya satrako lagi khel maidanma janchau hamro jhola bata samaan chori huncha.
column5: तर जब हामी शारीरिक शिक्षा सत्रको लागि खेल मैदानमा जान्छौं
column6: हाम्रो झोलाबाट सामान चोरी हुन्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): K yo ghatana halsalai suru vayeko ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यो घटना हालसालै सुरु भएको हो?

English: What things have you noticed being stolen?
Nepali (Romanized): Timile k kasta samaanharu chori bhaeko yaad gareka chau?
Nepali (Devanagari): तिमीले के कस्ता सामानहरू चोरी भएको याद गरेका छौ?

English: Yes it hasn't been long since this happened.
Nepali (Romanized): Hajur yesto bhaeko dherai bhayeko chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): हजुर यस्तो भएको धेरै भएको छैन।

English: My cricket kit my friend's books and an expensive wrist watch of my classmate have been stolen.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero cricket ko samagri mero mitraka kitaabharu ra mero sahapathi ko mahango haate ghadi chori vayeko cha.
column5: मेरो मित्रका किताबहरू र मेरो सहपाठीको महँगो हाते घडी चोरी भएको छ।

English: Ok! That seems to be a huge problem.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha! Yo ta thulo samasya jasto nai dekincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ! यो त ठूलो समस्या जस्तो नै देखिन्छ।

English: Do you think all the items were stolen on the same day or around different time intervals.
Nepali (Romanized): K timilai lagcha ki yee sabai chijharu ekai dinma chori gariyeko ho wa farak samaya antaraalma.
Nepali (Devanagari): के तिमीलाई लाग्छ कि यी सबै चिजहरू एकै दिनमा चोरी गरिएको हो वा फरक समय अन्तरालमा?

English: The theft did not happen in one day.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo ekai din ma bhaeko chori haina.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो एकै दिनमा भएको चोरी होइन।

English: Actually I can't say when this happened exactly.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma maile yo thyakkai kahile kahile bhayeko bhanna chai sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): वास्तवमा मैले यो ठ्याक्कै कहिले कहिले भएको भन्न चाहिँ सक्दिन।

Nepali (Romanized): Sayad yo paathya avadi suru bhae dekhi bhaeko hunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सायद यो पाठ्य अवधि सुरु भए देखि भएको हुनुपर्छ।

English: We have CCTVs in the school corridors and in the science and computer labs.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro bidhyalayakaa baardaliharuma ra bigyan ra susankhya prayogshala haruma CCTVharu chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो विद्यालयका बार्दलीहरूमा र विज्ञान र सुसंख्य प्रयोगशालाहरूमा CCTVहरू छन्।

English: I'll ask our technical team to investigate this.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma hamro prabidhik toli lai yesko chaanbin garna bhannechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म हाम्रो प्राविधिक टोलीलाई यसको छानबिन गर्न भन्नेछु।

English: According to me the thieves targeted the class because they knew that there were no cameras there.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero anusaar chorharule kaskhyalai nishaana banako ho kinavane uniharulai thaha thiyo ki teha bhaachitran yantra chaina.
column5: चोरहरूले कक्षालाई निशाना बनाएको हो किनभने उनीहरूलाई थाहा थियो कि त्यहाँ भाचित्रण यन्त्र छैन।

English: Do you suspect anyone or do you think it is done by someone random?
Nepali (Romanized): K timilai kasaimathi sanka cha wa timilai lagcha ki yo kohi anjaan byakti le gareko ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): के तिमीलाई कसैमाथि शंका छ वा तिमीलाई लाग्छ कि यो कोही अन्जान व्यक्तिले गरेको हो?

English: I will bring this to the Principal's notice and make sure that a relevant step is taken on an urgent basis.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yo kura pradhaan adhyapak ko dhyaan ma lyaune chhu ra yo sunischit garnechhu ki turuntai kehi uchit kadam chalinecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यो कुरा प्रधान अध्यापकको ध्यानमा ल्याउने छु र यो सुनिश्चित गर्नेछु कि तुरुन्तै केही उचित कदम चालिनेछ।

English: I think it's some unprofessional thief who takes whatever he lays his hands on.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagdacha ki oo abebashayik chor ho jasle haatma j vetaucha tei lincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्दछ कि ऊ अव्यवसायिक चोर हो
column5: जसले हातमा जे भेट्छ त्यही लिन्छ।

English: I am hopeful that soon cameras will be installed in the classrooms as well.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai asha cha ki chadai kakshyakothma bhaachitran yantra sthapana garinecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई आशा छ कि चाँडै कक्षाकोठामा भाचित्रण यन्त्र स्थापना गरिनेछ।

column5: म एमी हुँ।

Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai kasari madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hello my name is Prem and my friends told me that I could book a silent room in this library.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaskar mero naam Prem ho Mero sathile yes pustakalayama shaant kakshya aarakshyan garna sakincha vanera bataye.
column5: मेरो नाम प्रेम हो। मेरो साथीले यस पुस्तकालयमा शान्त कक्षा आरक्षण गर्न सकिन्छ भनेर बताए।

English: Can you tell me its formalities and procedures?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai yesko aupacharikta ra prakriyaharu batauna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई यसको औपचारिकता र प्रक्रियाहरू बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Definitely you can and I can help you with that.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai tapai saknu huncha ra ma tapailai tesma madat garna sakdachu.
Nepali (Devanagari): पक्कै तपाईं सक्नुहुन्छ र म तपाईंलाई त्यसमा मद्दत गर्न सक्दछु।

English: To proceed I need to see your library card.
Nepali (Romanized): Aghi badna ko lagi maile tapaiko pustakalaya patra hernu parnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अघि बढ्नको लागि मैले तपाईंको पुस्तकालय पत्र हेर्नुपर्नेछ।

English: I don't have a library card.
I have come here for the first time but I can show you my passport for identification.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yeha pahilo palta ayeko hu tara ma tapailai pahichanko lagi mero rahadani dekhauna sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यहाँ पहिलो पल्ट आएको हुँ तर म तपाईंलाई पहिचानको लागि मेरो राहदानी देखाउन सक्छु।

English: I have my exams coming up and with two kids at home I can't study.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero parikshya audaicha ra gharma dui jana bachaharu sanga ma padhna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो परीक्षा आउँदैछ र घरमा दुई जना बच्चाहरूसँग म पढ्न सक्दिन।

English: I totally understand how hard it is to study where there are kids.
Nepali (Romanized): Bachaharu bhayeko thauma adhyan garna kati garo huncha vanera ma purna ruple bujdachu.
Nepali (Devanagari): बच्चाहरू भएको ठाउँमा अध्ययन गर्न कति गाह्रो हुन्छ भनेर म पूर्ण रूपले बुझ्दछु।

English: If you don't have the card I can issue that for you.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi tapaisanga card chaina vane ma tapaiko lagi tyo jari garidina sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंसँग कार्ड छैन भने म तपाईंको लागि त्यो जारी गरिदिन सक्छु।

English: But for that you need to fill this form and provide a copy of your ID.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara tesko lagi tapaile yo faram bharnu parcha ra tapaiko parichaya patra ko pratilipi pradaan garnuparcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर त्यसको लागि तपाईंले यो फारम भर्नुपर्छ र तपाईंको परिचय पत्रको प्रतिलिपि प्रदान गर्नुपर्छ।

English: I don't have the copy of the passport with me.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara ma sanga rahadaniko pratilipi chaina.

English: Can you please print it out of rom your printer.
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai yeslai tapai ko mudrak bata mudran garna saknuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं यसलाई तपाईंको मुद्रकबाट मुद्रण गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: I'll scan your passport and keep the copy in our documents for the record.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapaiko rahadani scan garchu ra record ko lagi pratilipi hamro kagajatsangai rakhchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंको राहदानी स्क्यान गर्छु र रेकर्डको लागि प्रतिलिपि हाम्रो कागजातसँगै राख्छु।

English: Do I need to pay any fee for the card?
Nepali (Romanized): K maile cardko lagi sulka tirnu parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के मैले कार्डको लागि शुल्क तिर्नुपर्छ?

English: I also want to ask about other services I'll be entitled to with this card.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yo pani sodhna chahanchu ki yes card sanga ma anye kun sewaharuko hakdaar hunechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यो पनि सोध्न चाहन्छु कि यस कार्डसँग म अन्य कुन सेवाहरूको हकदार हुनेछु।

English: You can get the library card free of cost.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile pustakalaya card nishulka pauna saknu hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले पुस्तकालय कार्ड निःशुल्क पाउन सक्नुहुनेछ।

English: This card allows you to get free access to the library issue a maximum of six books and also book a room to study.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo cardle tapailai pustakalayako nishulka praveshaadhikaar dincha adhiktam cha ota pustakharu jari garna saknuhuncha ra adhyan garna kotha pani aarakshyan garna saknuhuncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो कार्डले तपाईंलाई पुस्तकालयको निःशुल्क प्रवेशाधिकार दिन्छ
column5: अधिकतम ६ वटा पुस्तकहरू जारी गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ र अध्ययन गर्न कोठा पनि आरक्षण गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Did you say I can issue 6 books?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile bhannuvayo ki ma 6 ota pustakharu jaari garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले भन्नुभयो कि म ६ वटा पुस्तकहरू जारी गर्न सक्छु?

English: Please tell me in how many days I need to return the books and if I am unable to return the books in the designated time will there be a fine or not?
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya bhannuhos maile kati din samma pustakharu firta garnu parcha ra yedi ma tokiyeko samayama pustakharu firta garna asamartha vaye vane kunai jariwana lagcha ki lagdaina?
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया भन्नुहोस् मैले कति दिन सम्म पुस्तकहरू फिर्ता गर्नु पर्छ र यदि म तोकिएको समयमा पुस्तकहरू फिर्ता गर्न असमर्थ भएँ भने कुनै जरिवाना लाग्छ कि लाग्दैन?

English: You have to return them in 4 weeks.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile yi pustakharu 4 hafta samma maa firta garnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले यी पुस्तकहरू ४ हप्ता सम्ममा फिर्ता गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

English: In case you fail to return you'll be charged 10 cents per day and if the book is lost or stolen you'll have to pay the full amount of the book.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi tapai farkauna asafal hunuvayo vane tapailai prati din 10 cents lagnecha ra yedi pustak harayo wa chori vayo vane tapaile pustakko sampurna rakam bhuktani garnuparne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईं फर्काउन असफल हुनुभयो भने
column5: तपाईंलाई प्रति दिन १० सेन्ट लाग्नेछ र यदि पुस्तक हरायो वा चोरी भयो भने तपाईंले पुस्तकको सम्पूर्ण रकम भुक्तानी गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai kasari madat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: My name is Shital and my friend told me that as my ankle has been dislocated if I cannot work now I can get some financial help.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero naam Shital ho ra mero saathile malai bhaneko thiyo ki mero goli gaantha fuskeko bhaera ma ahile kaam garna nasake kehi aarthik maddat lina sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो नाम शितल हो र मेरो साथीले मलाई भनेको थियो कि मेरो गोली गाँठो फुस्केको भएर म अहिले काम गर्न नसके केही आर्थिक मद्दत लिन सक्छु।

English: Yes your friend is absolutely right.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho Tapaiko mitra purna ruple sahi hunuhuncha.
column5: तपाईंको मित्र पूर्ण रूपले सही हुनुहुन्छ।

English: You can be eligible for sickness allowance if you meet its criteria.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai birami bhattako lagi yogya huna saknu hunchha yedi tapaile tesko maapdanda pura garnu bhayo bhane.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं बिरामी भत्ताको लागि योग्य हुन सक्नुहुन्छ यदि तपाईंले त्यसको मापदण्ड पूरा गर्नुभयो भने।

English: But I do not have any idea about this sickness allowance.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara malai yo birami bhattako bare kehi thaha chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मलाई यो बिरामी भत्ताको बारे केही थाहा छैन।

English: I can explain it to you.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai tesko bare barnan garna sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई त्यसको बारे वर्णन गर्न सक्छु।

English: This is an income support payment if you can't work or study for a while because of illness disability or injury.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapai rog apangata wa chotka karan kei samaya kaam wa adhhyan garna saknu hunna bhane yo aaya sahayata bhuktani ho.
column5: अपांगता वा चोटका कारण केही समय काम वा अध्ययन गर्न सक्नुहुन्न भने यो आय सहायता भुक्तानी हो।

English: There are however some requirements that you need to fulfill.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhepi yesma kehi aawashyaktaharu chhan jun tapaile pura garnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यद्यपि यसमा केही आवश्यकताहरू छन् जुन तपाईंले पूरा गर्नुपर्छ।

English: I think I am eligible for this.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha ma yesko lagi yogya chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ म यसको लागि योग्य छु।

English: The doctor advised me not to walk much and I neither go to college nor to work.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai dactarle dherai na hidna salaha gareka chhan Tesaile ma na ta college janchhu na ta kaam janchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई डाक्टरले धेरै नहिँड्न सल्लाह गरेका छन्। त्यसैले म न त कलेज जान्छु न त काम जान्छु।

English: What do I need to do to get its benefits?
Nepali (Romanized): Yasko laabh lina maile k garnu parchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): यसको लाभ लिन मैले के गर्नुपर्छ?

English: Basically you should meet the income and assets test limit be at least 22 years old but under the pension age and either do a job or study full-time.
Nepali (Romanized): Adharbhut rupma tapaile aaya ra sampatti parishyan sima pura garnu parcha kamti maa 22 barsa tara nibrittibaran umer bhitra hunu parcha ani ki ta kaam gardai ki ta purna kaalin padhiraheko hunu parcha.
column5: तपाईंले आय र सम्पत्ति परीक्षण सीमा पूरा गर्नुपर्छ
column6: कम्तिमा २२ वर्ष तर निवृत्तिभरण उमेर भित्र हुनुपर्छ
column7: अनि कि त काम गर्दै कि त पूर्ण कालीन पढिरहेको हुनुपर्छ।

English: Ok I am a full-time student here.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha Ma yeha purna kaalin bidhyarthi hun.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ। म यहाँ पूर्ण कालीन विद्यार्थी हुँ।

English: Could you please tell me how much I would get paid?
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya malai bataunuhos ki maile kati bhuktani paune chhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया मलाई बताउनुहोस् कि मैले कति भुक्तानी पाउने छु?

English: If you are single with no children you get $555.70.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapai bachaharu bina abibahit hunu hunchha bhane tapaile $555.70 paunu hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईं बच्चाहरू बिना अविवाहित हुनुहुन्छ भने
column5: तपाईंले $५५५.७० पाउनुहुनेछ।

English: If you have a spouse with no children you get $501.70.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi bachaharu bina tapaiko jiwansathi cha bhane tapaile $501.70 paunu hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि बच्चाहरू बिना तपाईंको जीवनसाथी छ भने
column5: तपाईंले $५०१.७० पाउनुहुनेछ।

English: If you are single with dependent children you get $601.50.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapai abibahit hunu huncha ra aashrit bachhaharu chan bhane $601.50 paunu hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईं अविवाहित हुनुहुन्छ र आश्रित बच्चाहरू छन् भने $६०१.५० पाउनुहुनेछ।

English: I am not married and I don't have any children.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma abibahit hoon ra mera bachaharu chainan.
Nepali (Devanagari): म अविवाहित हुँ र मेरा बच्चाहरू छैनन्।

English: Do I need to come to the office to submit the application?
Nepali (Romanized): K ma yesko abedan bujhauna karyalaya mai aaunu parchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के म यसको आवेदन बुझाउन कार्यालय मै आउनु पर्छ?

English: You can apply it online as well but make sure the information that you enter has to be authentic as we verify your details via different sources.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile online aabedan dina saknu hunchha tara nischit garnuhos ki tapaile bharnu bhayeko jankari praamanik hos kina bhane hamile bibhinna shrotharu marfat tapaiko bibaran pusti garchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले अनलाइन आवेदन दिन सक्नुहुन्छ तर निश्चित गर्नुहोस् कि तपाईंले भर्नु भएको जानकारी प्रामाणिक होस् किनभने हामीले विभिन्न स्रोतहरू मार्फत तपाईंको विवरण पुष्टि गर्छौं।

Nepali (Romanized): Ghumeko / Bisthapit Bhaeko / Fuskeko Goli Gaantho
Nepali (Devanagari): घुमेको / विस्थापित भएको / फुस्केको गोली गाँठो

English: Thank you for calling the Department of Human services.
Nepali (Romanized): Manav sewa bibhagma samparka garnu vayekoma dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): मानव सेवा विभागमा सम्पर्क गर्नु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: So you have called us to enquire about Family Tax Benefit.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesovaye tapaile hamilai paariwarik kar laavko barema sodhpuch garna samparka garnu bhayeko ho?
column5: तपाईंले हामीलाई पारिवारिक कर लाभको बारेमा सोधपुछ गर्न सम्पर्क गर्नु भएको हो?

English: Yes I came to Australia as a permanent resident only last year.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho ma gata barsha matra Australiama sthahi niwasiko rupma ayeki hu.
column5: म गत वर्ष मात्र अष्ट्रेलियामा स्थायी निवासीको रूपमा आएकी हुँ।

English: So I want to ask if I am eligible to get this Family Tax Benefit?
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhaera ma sodhna chahanchu k ma yo pariwarik kar laav lina yogye chu?
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यही भएर म सोध्न चाहन्छु के म यो पारिवारिक कर लाभ लिन योग्य छु?

English: I have to ask you a few questions to make sure of your eligibility.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko yogyata nischit garna maile kehi prashnaharu sodhnu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको योग्यता निश्चित गर्न मैले केही प्रश्नहरू सोध्नु पर्छ।

English: So when did you first arrive in Australia?
Nepali (Romanized): Tesobhae tapai pahilo patak Australia kahile aunu bhayeko thiyo?
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसोभए तपाईं पहिलो पटक अष्ट्रेलिया कहिले आउनु भएको थियो?

Nepali (Romanized): Hami 22 March 2019 ma yeha aipugeka hau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी २२ मार्च २०१९ मा यहाँ आइपुगेका हौं।

English: Alright! The basic requirement to avail this facility is that the applicant must have resided in Australia for at least 1 year before applying.
Nepali (Romanized): Thikai cha! Yo subidha prapta garnako lagi adharbhut awashyakta yo ho ki aavedak aabedan dina agadi Australia ma kamtima 1 barsa samma baseko hunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिकै छ! यो सुविधा प्राप्त गर्नको लागि आधारभूत आवश्यकता यो हो कि आवेदक आवेदन दिन अगाडि अष्ट्रेलियामा कम्तिमा १ वर्ष सम्म बसेको हुनुपर्छ।

English: In your case as 1 year has already passed you have met the criteria.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko awasthama 1 barsa bhaisakeko huda tapaile maapdanda pura garnubhaisakyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको अवस्थामा १ वर्ष भइसकेको हुँदा तपाईंले मापदण्ड पूरा गर्नुभइसक्यो।

English: How many family members are there?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaika pariwarik sadashyaharu kati jana chan?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंका पारिवारिक सदस्यहरू कति जना छन्?

English: In my family I have my husband and two children aged 13 and 16 years.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero pariwarma mero shrimaan ra mera 13 ra 16 barsiye dui jana bacchaharu chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो परिवारमा मेरो श्रीमान् र मेरा १३ र १६ वर्षीय दुई जना बच्चाहरू छन्।

English: Could you please tell me in detail what I need to do?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile malai bistrit rupma batauna saknuhuncha ki maile k garnu parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले मलाई विस्तृत रूपमा बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ कि मैले के गर्नुपर्छ?

English: Sure! You are eligible to apply for Family Tax Benefit Part A for your younger one and for a child between 16-19 years you have to apply for FTB Part B.
Nepali (Romanized): Nischit rupma! Tapai tapaiko kanchoko lagi Pariwarik Kar Laav Bhag A ko aabedan dina yogye hunuhuncha ra tapaile 16 dekhi 19 barsha bichko bacchako lagi FTB Bhag B ma aabedan dinu parnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): निश्चित रूपमा! तपाईं तपाईंको कान्छोको लागि पारिवारिक कर लाभ भाग A को आवेदन दिन योग्य हुनुहुन्छ र तपाईंले १६ देखि १९ वर्ष बीचको बच्चाको लागि FTB भाग B मा आवेदन दिनुपर्नेछ।

English: What sort of documents do I need to provide for this?
Nepali (Romanized): Yeska lagi maile kasta kisimka kagajatharu dinu parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): यसका लागि मैले कस्ता किसिमका कागजातहरू दिनुपर्छ?

English: Firstly your elder child has to be in full time secondary study.
Nepali (Romanized): Sarwapratham tapaiko jetho bacchale purna kaalin madhyamik addhyan garnu pardacha.
column5: तपाईंको जेठो बच्चाले पूर्ण कालीन माध्यमिक अध्ययन गर्नुपर्दछ।

English: Secondly your family's adjusted income should be less than $80
column5: 000 vanda kam hunu pardacha.
column6: दोस्रो

English: Lastly you must care for the child at least 35% of the time.
Nepali (Romanized): Antimma tapaile kamtima 35% samaya bacchako herchaha garnu parnecha.
column5: तपाईंले कम्तिमा ३५% समय बच्चाको हेरचाह गर्नुपर्नेछ।

English: Yes my elder son is a full time student.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho mero jetho bacha ek purna kaalin bidhyarthi ho.
column5: मेरो जेठो बच्चा एक पूर्ण कालीन विद्यार्थी हो।

English: But what does this adjusted income mean?
Nepali (Romanized): Tara yo samayojit aaya vaneko k ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर यो समायोजित आय भनेको के हो?

English: Is it only mine or my husband's and mine combined?
Nepali (Romanized): K yo mero eklo matra ho wa mero srimaan ra mero sanyukta?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यो मेरो एक्लो मात्र हो वा मेरो श्रीमान् र मेरो संयुक्त?

English: It is your household income which includes yours and your husband's.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo bhaneko tapaiko gharelu aamdani ho jasma tapai ra tapaiko srimaan ko aaye samawesh huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो भनेको तपाईंको घरेलु आम्दानी हो जसमा तपाईं र तपाईंको श्रीमानको आय समावेश हुन्छ।

English: Also your children must meet immunisation requirements.
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai tapaiko bacchaharule khop ka abashektaharu pura garnai pardacha.
Nepali (Devanagari): साथै तपाईंको बच्चाहरूले खोपका आवश्यकताहरू पूरा गर्नै पर्दछ।

English: Sure I'll deposit all the documents as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Ma sabai kagajaat sakesamma chado jamma garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य। म सबै कागजात सकेसम्म चाँडो जम्मा गर्नेछु।

English: You have come to enquire about child care subsidy.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile baal herchaha aarthik sahayata ko barema sodhpooch garna aunu bhayeko ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले बाल हेरचाह आर्थिक सहायताको बारेमा सोधपुछ गर्न आउनु भएको हो।

English: Yes I want to know about Child Care Subsidy for my 3-year-old son.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho ma mero 3 barse chhorako lagi baal herchaaha aarthik sahayata ko bare janna chahanchu.
column5: म मेरो ३ वर्षे छोराको लागि बाल हेरचाह आर्थिक सहायताको बारे जान्न चाहन्छु।

English: We only got our permanent residency last month.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile gata mahina matra sthaayi nibas payeka thiyau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले गत महिना मात्र स्थायी निवास पाएका थियौं।

English: I want to admit my child to a school.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero bachaa lai bidhyalaya ma bharna garna chahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो बच्चालाई विद्यालयमा भर्ना गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: Of course I can help you with that.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Ma yesma tapailai maddat garna sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य म यसमा तपाईंलाई मद्दत गर्न सक्छु।

English: But before we proceed can I get your CRN.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara hami agadi badhnu bhanda pahile K ma tapaiko CRN pauna sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर हामी अगाडि बढ्नु भन्दा पहिले के म तपाईंको CRN पाउन सक्छु?

English: Nobody has told me about CRN.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai kasaile CRN ko bare bhaneko chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई कसैले CRN को बारे भनेको छैन।

English: CRN means Customer Reference Number used when you get payments and services from us.
Nepali (Romanized): CRN bhaneko Grahak Sandarbh Number ho jun tapaile hami bata bhuktani ra sewa pauda paunuhuncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): CRN भनेको ग्राहक सन्दर्भ नम्बर हो जुन तपाईंले हामीबाट भुक्तानी र सेवा पाउँदा पाउनुहुन्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): Yesle tapaiko byaktigat record patta lagaucha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसले तपाईंको व्यक्तिगत रेकर्ड पत्ता लगाउँछ।

English: Don't worry I can create that for you.
Nepali (Romanized): Chinta nalinus Maile tapaiko lagi yo banaidina sakchu.
column5: मैले तपाईंको लागि यो बनाइदिन सक्छु।

English: But first I need to create your centrelink account.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara sarwapratham maile tapaiko centrelink khata banaunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर सर्वप्रथम मैले तपाईंको सेन्टरलिङ्क खाता बनाउनु पर्छ।

English: So I have little knowledge about these technological/technical requirements.
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhayera yo prabidhik awashyaktaharu ko malai dherai gyan chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यही भएर यो प्राविधिक आवश्यकताहरूको मलाई धेरै ज्ञान छैन।

English: What documents do you need to create this Centrelink account?
Nepali (Romanized): Yo centrelink khata banauna tapailai kun kagajatharu chahinchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): यो सेन्टरलिङ्क खाता बनाउन तपाईंलाई कुन कागजातहरू चाहिन्छ?

English: I just need your passport and visa grant letter.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai kebal tapaiko rahadani ra praveshaagya anumati patra chahinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई केवल तपाईंको राहदानी र प्रवेशाज्ञा अनुमति पत्र चाहिन्छ।

English: I have all this with me.
Ma'am can you also tell me what I need for Child Care Subsidy and how many days it will take to know its results?
Nepali (Romanized): Mahodaya baal herchaaha sahayata ko lagi k kasta kagajaatharu chaahinchha bhanera pani bhannu hos ra ma kati dinma yesko natijaa thaha pauna sakchhu?
column5: बाल हेरचाह सहायताको लागि के कस्ता कागजातहरू चाहिन्छ भनेर पनि भन्नुहोस् र म कति दिनमा यसको नतिजा थाहा पाउन सक्छु?

English: I have uploaded the copies of both your documents.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tapaika dubai kagajaatharuka pratilipi upload garisake.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तपाईंका दुबै कागजातहरूका प्रतिलिपि अपलोड गरिसकें।

English: To apply for the child care subsidy you need to fill the application form.
Nepali (Romanized): Baal herchaaha sahayatako aavedan dinako lagi tapaile abedan faram bharnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): बाल हेरचाह सहायताको आवेदन दिनको लागि तपाईंले आवेदन फारम भर्नु पर्छ।

English: You also need to upload your child's birth certificate and his immunization certificate.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile afno bachha ko janma pramanpatra ra khop praman patra pani upload garnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले आफ्नो बच्चाको जन्म प्रमाणपत्र र खोप प्रमाण पत्र पनि अपलोड गर्नु पर्छ।

English: You have made my work easier.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile mero kaam jhanai sajilo banaunu bhayeko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले मेरो काम झनै सजिलो बनाउनु भएको छ।

English: I hope that my work will be done soon.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai aasa chha ki mero kaam chadai sampanna hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई आशा छ कि मेरो काम चाँडै सम्पन्न हुनेछ।

English: Actually staying at home with a child all day is equivalent to banging your head on the wall.
Nepali (Romanized): Khasma dinbhar bachhako saath gharma basnu bhaneko afno tauko bhittama pitnu barabar ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): खासमा दिनभर बच्चाको साथ घरमा बस्नु भनेको आफ्नो टाउको भित्तामा पिट्नु बराबर हो।

English: Thank you for choosing to fly with Jet Airlines.
Nepali (Romanized): Jet Airlines lai udaan ka lagi channuvayekoma dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): जेट एयरलाइन्सलाई उडानका लागि छान्नुभएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: How can I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai aja kasari madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई आज कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I am facing difficulty with online check-in.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai online check-in garna kathinai vairaheko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई अनलाइन चेक-इन गर्न कठिनाइ भइरहेको छ।

Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai madat garna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई मद्दत गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Please provide me with your booking reference number.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya malai tapaiko aarakshyan reference number pradan garna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया मलाई तपाईंको आरक्षण सन्दर्भ नम्बर प्रदान गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Also do you have any preference in seat selection?
Nepali (Romanized): Sathai k tapaiko aasan chanotma kehi prathamikta cha?
column5: के तपाईंको आसन छनोटमा केही प्राथमिकता छ?

English: My booking reference number is B-459781.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero booking ullekh number B-459781 ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो बुकिङ उल्लेख नम्बर B-459781 हो।

English: Actually I am travelling with my family.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma ma mero pariwar sanga yatra gardaichau.
column5: म मेरो परिवारसँग यात्रा गर्दैछौं।

English: Could you give us the window seat?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile hamilai jhyalko aasan dina saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले हामीलाई झ्यालको आसन दिन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: My son wants to see the outside view.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero chora bahiri drishya herna chahancha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो छोरा बाहिरी दृश्य हेर्न चाहन्छ।

English: Let me have a look at the availability of the seats.
Can you please confirm who is accompanying you in the flight.
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai udaanma tapaiko sath ko hunuhuncha vanera nischit garna saknuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं उडानमा तपाईंको साथ को हुनुहुन्छ भनेर निश्चित गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: My husband and my 3-year-old son are travelling with me.
Nepali (Romanized): Masanga mero sriman ra mero 3 barse chora yatra gardaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग मेरो श्रीमान् र मेरो ३ वर्षे छोरा यात्रा गर्दैछ।

English: I will be very thankful if we get all the three seats together.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi hami tinai janako aasanharu sangai vayo vane ma dherai avari hunechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि हामी तीनै जनाको आसनहरू सँगै भयो भने म धेरै आभारी हुनेछु।

English: Fortunately we have 3 seats in a row and one of them is a window seat.
Nepali (Romanized): Bhagyabas hamisanga 3 wota aasanharu ekai pangtima chan ra ti madhye euta jhayalko aasan ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): भाग्यवश हामीसँग ३ वटा आसनहरू एकै पंक्तिमा छन् र ती मध्ये एउटा झ्यालको आसन हो।

English: The seat numbers are G-10 11 12 and G-10 is the window seat.
Nepali (Romanized): Aasan number G-10 11 ra 12 hun ra G-10 jhayalko aasan ho.
column5: 11 र 12 हुन् र G-10 झ्यालको आसन हो।

English: Do you want me to reserve these for you?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai chahanu huncha ki maile tapaiko lagi yi aarakshyan garidiu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं चाहनुहुन्छ कि मैले तपाईंको लागि यी आरक्षण गरिदिउँ?

English: We are flying for the first time.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami pahilo patak udaan gariraheka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी पहिलो पटक उडान गरिरहेका छौं।

English: My son is very excited for this journey.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero chora yesh yatrako lagi dherai utsahit cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो छोरा यस यात्राको लागि धेरै उत्साहित छ।

English: Is there an arrangement of food in this flight for us?
Nepali (Romanized): K yes udaanma hamro lagi khana ko bandobasta cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यस उडानमा हाम्रो लागि खानाको बन्दोबस्त छ?

English: Definitely you'll get a snack and a meal on this flight.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani tapaile yes udaanma khaja ra khana paunuhunecha.
column5: तपाईंले यस उडानमा खाजा र खाना पाउनुहुनेछ।

English: So would you prefer vegetarian or a non-veg meal?
Nepali (Romanized): Ani tapaile sakahari ruchaunu huncha ki mangsahari khana?
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि तपाईंले शाकाहारी रुचाउनु हुन्छ कि मांसाहारी खाना?

English: Your son will get a kid's meal.
Please select non-veg meals for all of us.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya hami sabai janako lagi maangsahari khana chayan garidinuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया हामी सबै जनाको लागि मांसाहारी खाना चयन गरिदिनुहोस्।

English: And at what time do we need to reach the airport?
Nepali (Romanized): Ani hami kati baje bimansthal pugnu parne huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि हामी कति बजे विमानस्थल पुग्नु पर्ने हुन्छ?

English: Sure I have selected all meals as per your preferences.
Nepali (Romanized): Abasya pani maile tapaiko rojai anusaar sabai bhojan chayan gareki chu.
column5: मैले तपाईंको रोजाइ अनुसार सबै भोजन चयन गरेकी छु।

English: Answer to your 2nd question is that you have to be at the airport 3 hours prior to the departure time as it is an international travel.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai ko dosro prashnako uttar yo ho ki prasthan samaya vanda 3 ghanta pahile tapai bimansthal pugnu parcha kinaki yo antarastriya yatra ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको दोस्रो प्रश्नको उत्तर यो हो कि प्रस्थान समय भन्दा ३ घण्टा पहिले तपाईं विमानस्थल पुग्नु पर्छ किनकि यो अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय यात्रा हो।

English: We are allowed to carry 30 kg per person.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamilai prati byakti 30 kilo bokna anumati cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीलाई प्रति व्यक्ति ३० किलो बोक्न अनुमति छ।

English: But can the combined weight of our luggage be 90 kilograms?
Nepali (Romanized): Tara k hamro samanko sanyukta taul 90 kilo huna sakcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तर के हाम्रो सामानको संयुक्त तौल ९० किलो हुन सक्छ?

English: Certainly! Because you are all travelling as a family this is possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani! Tapai eutai pariwarko rupma yatra garnu hune bhaeko le yo sambhav cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): पक्कै पनि! तपाईं एउटै परिवारको रूपमा यात्रा गर्नु हुने भएकोले यो सम्भव छ।

English: Also I want to remind you that everyone is allowed to carry 7 kg as hand luggage on top of 30 kg.
Nepali (Romanized): Sathai ma tapailai yo kura samjhauna chahanchu ki 30 kilo ko saathai sabailai 7 kilo haate jhola bokna anumati cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): साथै म तपाईंलाई यो कुरा सम्झाउन चाहन्छु कि ३० किलोको साथै सबैलाई ७ किलो हाते झोला बोक्न अनुमति छ।

English: Yes we were told about this while buying the ticket.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho ticket kinda hamilai yes bisayama bataiyeko thiyo.
column5: टिकट किन्दा हामीलाई यस विषयमा बताइएको थियो।

Nepali (Romanized): Yo ta mero lagi khusiko kura ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो त मेरो लागि खुसीको कुरा हो।

English: Hello ma'am How can I help you?
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste mahodaya Ma tapailai kasari maddat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते महोदया। म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hi I would like to make a plane reservation.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste Ma bimaan aarakshan garna chaahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते। म विमान आरक्षण गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: Could you please tell me about the flight availability and the price.
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai udaan upalabhdata ra mulyako barema batauna saknu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई उडान उपलब्धता र मूल्यको बारेमा बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Sure ma'am I can help you make your reservation.
Nepali (Romanized): Nischit rupma mahodaya Ma tapailai aarakshyan garna maddat garna sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): निश्चित रूपमा महोदया। म तपाईंलाई आरक्षण गर्न मद्दत गर्न सक्छु।

English: Also do you have a preference for any airline?
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai k tapaiko kunai bayusewa lai liyera prathamikta chha?
column5: के तपाईंको कुनै वायुसेवालाई लिएर प्राथमिकता छ?

English: And would you like to purchase a one way ticket or a round trip?
Nepali (Romanized): Ra k tapai ek tarfi ticket lina chaahanu hunchha wa duitarfi lina chahanu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): र के तपाईं एकतर्फी टिकट लिन चाहनुहुन्छ वा दुईतर्फी लिन चाहनुहुन्छ?

English: One-way ticket to Kathmandu Nepal please.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya ek tarfi ticket Kathmandu Nepalko lagi.
column5: नेपालको लागि।

English: My father is on his deathbed.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero buwa unko mrityushaiya ma hunuhunchha.

English: I need to get there as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sakesamma tyaha chaadai pugnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म सकेसम्म त्यहाँ चाँडै पुग्नु पर्छ।

English: I don't have any preferences at this stage just look for the earliest flight available and the one with shorter transits.
Nepali (Romanized): Yes charanma mero kunai prathamikta chhaina kebal sab bhanda chhito upalabhda bhaeko udaan ra chhoto adaan bhaeko hernu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस चरणमा मेरो कुनै प्राथमिकता छैन
column5: केवल सबभन्दा छिटो उपलब्ध भएको उडान र छोटो अडान भएको हेर्नुहोस्।

English: I hope you get to see your father soon in good health.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aasha gardachhu ki tapailey afno buwa lai chaadai ramro swasthya ma bhetnu hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आशा गर्दछु कि तपाईंले आफ्नो बुवालाई चाँडै राम्रो स्वास्थ्यमा भेट्नुहुनेछ।

English: Ma'am when would you like to leave?
Nepali (Romanized): Mahodaya tapai kahile jana chaahanu hunchha?
column5: तपाईं कहिले जान चाहनुहुन्छ?

English: The earliest flight departing for Kathmandu is tomorrow at 4am.
Nepali (Romanized): Sabai bhanda chaado Kathmanduko lagi udne udaan bholi bihana 4 baje ko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सबैभन्दा चाँडो काठमाडौंको लागि उड्ने उडान भोलि बिहान ४ बजेको छ।

English: Do you want me to reserve a seat for you in that flight?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai tes udaanma tapaiko aasan arakshan garauna chaahanu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं त्यस उडानमा तपाईंको आसन आरक्षण गराउन चाहनुहुन्छ?

English: Yes please Kindly select that flight.
Nepali (Romanized): Huncha Kripaya tehi udaan chayan garidinu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): हुन्छ। कृपया त्यही उडान चयन गरिदिनुहोस्।

English: If possible reserve the exit row seat for me because I need to frequently go to the lavatory during the flight.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi sambhav bhayema mero lagi nikaas dwarko pangtiko aasan arakshyan garnuhos kinabhane malai udaan ko samayama baarambaar sauchalaya janu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि सम्भव भएमा मेरो लागि निकास द्वारको पङ्क्तिको आसन आरक्षण गर्नुहोस् किनभने मलाई उडानको समयमा बारम्बार शौचालय जानुपर्छ।

English: I am sorry ma'am but those seats are reserved for the mothers with infants only.
Nepali (Romanized): Maaf garnuhos mahodaya tara ti seatharu matra shishuharu bhayeka aamaharuka lagi aarakshit chhan.
Nepali (Devanagari): माफ गर्नुहोस् महोदया तर ती सिटहरू मात्र शिशुहरू भएका आमाहरूका लागि आरक्षित छन्।

English: I can search for the aisle seat close to the front row.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aghadiko paktiko najikai galliko / aisle seat khojna sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म अगाडिको पङ्क्तिको नजिकै गल्लीको / aisle सिट खोज्न सक्छु।

English: Umm.. yes there is one do you want me to reserve that for you?
Nepali (Romanized): Umm.. ho euta rahechha K tapai chahanu huncha ki ma tyo tapaiko lagi arakshyan garidiu?
Nepali (Devanagari): उम्.. हो एउटा रहेछ। के तपाईं चाहनुहुन्छ कि म त्यो तपाईंको लागि आरक्षण गरिदिउँ?

English: Ok no worries It should be fine.
Nepali (Romanized): Huncha kehi chhaina Tyo thikai hunu pardachha.
column5: केही छैन। त्यो ठिकै हुनुपर्दछ।

English: What would be the cost of the flight?
Nepali (Romanized): Udaan ko mulya kati huncha hola?

English: I don't have excess luggage so even if I am allowed to carry a handbag only it should be fine.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga badhi saman chhaina tesaile malai yadi hatte jhola matra bokna anumati diyinchha bhane pani thikcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग बढी सामान छैन त्यसैले मलाई यदि हाते झोला मात्र बोक्न अनुमति दिइन्छ भने पनि ठीक छ।

English: Sure ma'am The flight will cost you $720.
Nepali (Romanized): Nischit mahodaya Maile pahilei ullekh gareko ko mulya $720 ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): निश्चित महोदया। मैले पहिले नै उल्लेख गरेको को मूल्य $७२० हो।

English: It will leave Sydney at 4 am which arrives in Dubai at 1.30 pm local time.
Nepali (Romanized): Tyo Sydney bata bihana 4 baje udcha jun Dubaima sthaniya samaya diuso 1:30 baje pugchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यो सिड्नीबाट बिहान ४ बजे उड्छ जुन दुबईमा स्थानीय समय दिउँसो १:३० बजे पुग्छ।

English: At 3:30 pm local time it will depart for Kathmandu and will arrive Kathmandu at 6 pm NPT.
Nepali (Romanized): Sthaniya samaya aparahna 3:30 ma Kathmandu ko lagi prasthan hunechha ra NPT 6 baje Kathmandu pugnechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): स्थानीय समय अपराह्न ३:३० मा काठमाडौंको लागि प्रस्थान हुनेछ र NPT ६ बजे काठमाडौं पुग्नेछ।

English: Just one more thing does the price include the airport tax?
Nepali (Romanized): Kebal arko euta cheez k mulya ma bimansthal kar samawesh bhayeko chha?
column5: के मूल्यमा विमानस्थल कर समावेश भएको छ?

English: Yes the airport tax is also included in this cost.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho bimansthal kar pani yehi mulyama samawesh cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हो विमानस्थल कर पनि यही मूल्यमा समावेश छ।

English: Please arrive at Emirates Air Terminal before 02.30 am.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya tapai Emirates Air Terminal ma bihana 2:30 bhanda aghi pugnu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया तपाईं इमिरेट्स एयर टर्मिनलमा बिहान २:३० भन्दा अघि पुग्नुहोला।

English: You can collect your boarding pass at the airport booking-office number 4.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile afno boarding patra bimansthal booking karyalaya number 4 ma sankalan garna saknu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले आफ्नो बोर्डिङ पत्र विमानस्थल बुकिङ कार्यालय नम्बर ४ मा संकलन गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Tapaiko sahayog ko lagi dhanyabaad.

English: Here's your passport for the flight confirmation.
Nepali (Romanized): Udaan pustikaran ko lagi mero rahadani yeha cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): उडान पुष्टिकरणको लागि मेरो राहदानी यहाँ छ।

English: And I want to pay through my card.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra ma card bata bhuktani garna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): र म कार्डबाट भुक्तानी गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: Hello! Welcome to Jetstar Airlines! How can I assist you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste! Jetstar Airlines ma swagat chha Ma tapailai aja kasari maddat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते! जेटस्टार एयरलाइन्समा स्वागत छ। म तपाईंलाई आज कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I think I have arrived too early for the flight.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha ma udaanko lagi dherai chadai aipugeko chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ म उडानको लागि धेरै चाँडै आइपुगेको छु।

English: Can I have your ticket and passport please?
Nepali (Romanized): K ma tapaiko ticket ra rahadani pauna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के म तपाईंको टिकट र राहदानी पाउन सक्छु?

English: Also do you have any luggage you'd like to check-in?
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai k tapaisanga kunai saman chha jun tapai check-in garauna chaahanu hunchha?
column5: के तपाईंसँग कुनै सामान छ जुन तपाईं चेक-इन गराउन चाहनुहुन्छ?

English: I think I left the ticket on my kitchen's table but I've got the passport.
Nepali (Romanized): malai lagcha ki maile ticket mero bhanshako tabulma chhodidiye tara ma sanga rahadani chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कि मैले टिकट मेरो भान्साको टेबलमा छोडिदिएँ
column5: तर मसँग राहदानी छ।

English: I am so sorry I have become so forgetful these days.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai maaf garnuhola ma ajkal dherai bhullakad bhairaheki chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई माफ गर्नुहोला म आजकल धेरै भुल्लकड भइरहेकी छु।

English: And I have one bag and a kid's stroller to check-in.
Nepali (Romanized): Ani ma sanga check-in garna euta jhola ra bachha rakhne upakaran cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि मसँग चेक-इन गर्न एउटा झोला र बच्चा राख्ने उपकरण छ।

English: I can print another one for you by putting your details in our system.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pranalima tapaiko bibaran rakhera tapaiko lagi arko mudran garna sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म प्रणालीमा तपाईंको विवरण राखेर तपाईंको लागि अर्को मुद्रण गर्न सक्छु।

English: In the meantime could you please put your suitcase here on the scale.
Nepali (Romanized): Yes antaralma k kripaya tapaiko suitcase yes maap yantrama rakhna saknuhunchha.
column5: के कृपया तपाईंको सुटकेस यस माप यन्त्रमा राख्न सक्नुहुन्छ?
किन नहुनु।

English: I just hope the weight of my luggage is within the permissible weight limit.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai asha chha mero samanko taul anumatiyogya taul sima bhitra chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई आशा छ मेरो सामानको तौल अनुमति योग्य तौल सीमा भित्र छ।

English: It took me quite some time to pack all the necessary items and manage the weight of my bag according to your airline’s guidelines.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai tapaiko bimanko dishanirdeshan anusaar sabai abashek samaan pack garna ra mero jholako wajan prabandha garna kehi samaya lageko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई तपाईंको विमानको दिशानिर्देशन अनुसार सबै आवश्यक सामान प्याक गर्न र मेरो झोलाको वजन प्रबन्ध गर्न केही समय लागेको थियो।

English: I know it’s hard to pack things within the weight limit especially when travelling with a child.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thaha chha ki taul sima bhitra samaanharu pack garna garo hunchha bishesh gari jaba bachcha sanga yatra garincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थाहा छ कि तौल सीमा भित्र सामानहरू प्याक गर्न गाह्रो हुन्छ विशेष गरी जब बच्चासँग यात्रा गरिन्छ।

English: Okay so as you’re travelling with an infant today I will need to see your daughter’s birth certificate to prove that she’s under two years of age.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha teso bhaye tapai aaja shishu sanga yatra garirahanu bhaeko cha tapaiko chhori dui barsa bhanda kam umer ko ho bhanera pramanit garna tapaiko chhori ko janma praman patra hernu parne huncha.
column5: त्यसो भए तपाईं आज शिशुसँग यात्रा गरिरहनु भएको छ
column6: तपाईंको छोरी दुई वर्ष भन्दा कम उमेरको हो भनेर प्रमाणित गर्न तपाईंको छोरीको जन्म प्रमाण पत्र हेर्नु पर्ने हुन्छ।

column5: यहाँ छ।

English: Also would we be able to get an aisle seat?
Nepali (Romanized): Sathai k hami galliko aasan prapta garna sakchau?
column5: के हामी गल्लीको आसन प्राप्त गर्न सक्छौं?

English: I may have to walk her around if she gets fussy or cries.
Nepali (Romanized): Uni asantust huda wa runda maile unlai waripari hidaunu parne hunasakchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनी असन्तुष्ट हुँदा वा रुँदा मैले उनलाई वरिपरि हिँडाउनु पर्ने हुनसक्छ।

English: Sure I'll put you near the washroom too.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Ma tapailai sauchalya ko najik pani rakhidinchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य। म तपाईंलाई शौचालयको नजिक पनि राखिदिन्छु।

English: Ok everything appears to be in order now.
Nepali (Romanized): Thikcha sabai cheez krambaddha bhaeko dekhincha.
column5: सबै चीज क्रमबद्ध भएको देखिन्छ।

English: Weight of your baggage is also within the limit.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko samanko taul pani sima bhitra cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको सामानको तौल पनि सीमा भित्र छ।

English: Here is your passport and boarding pass.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko rahadhaani ra prasthaan patra yeha cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको राहदानी र प्रस्थान पत्र यहाँ छ।

English: Please check-in the stroller in the oversized luggage department.
Nepali (Romanized): Sathai tapaile afno bacha rakhne upakaran thulo saman pathaune bibhag ma check-in garnu hola.
column5: तपाईंले आफ्नो बच्चा राख्ने उपकरण ठूलो सामान पठाउने विभागमा चेक-इन गर्नुहोला।

English: Now where do I have to go? Could you please assist as this is the first time I am travelling alone.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba ma kaha janu parchha? K tapai malai maddat garna saknu hunchha kinaki ma eklai yatra gareko pahilo patak ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): अब म कहाँ जानु पर्छ? के तपाईं मलाई मद्दत गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ किनकि म एक्लै यात्रा गरेको पहिलो पटक हो?

English: Also I have a stopover in Sydney. Do I need to pick up my luggage there?
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai mero Sydneyma adaan cha K maile tyaha mero saman nikalnu parchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): साथै मेरो सिड्नीमा अडान छ। के मैले त्यहाँ मेरो सामान निकाल्नु पर्छ?

English: No it’ll go straight to Bangkok.
column5: त्यो सिधै बैंकक जान्छ।

English: Your flight departs from gate no 32.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko udaan dhoka no 32 bata prasthan huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको उडान ढोका न ३२ बाट प्रस्थान हुन्छ।

English: You just have to keep walking down this way and you’ll see a big orange number-32 sign.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kebal yes margma hiddai janus ra tapaile thulo suntala rang ko anka 32 chinha dekhnu hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं केवल यस मार्गमा हिड्दै जानुस् र तपाईंले ठूलो सुन्तला रंगको अंक ३२ चिन्ह देख्नु हुनेछ।

English: Please wait there for the boarding which will commence at 03:20pm.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya tyaha boarding ko lagi kurnuhos jun diuso 3:20 minute ma suru hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया त्यहाँ बोर्डिङको लागि कुर्नुहोस् जुन दिउँसो ३:२० मिनेटमा सुरु हुन्छ।

English: Thank you so much for your help.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko maddat ko lagi dherai dherai dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको मद्दतको लागि धेरै धेरै धन्यवाद।

English: I’ll ask the staff members of the airline in case I need further assistance.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thap sahayog chaahiyeko khandamaa ma bimaan sanstha ka karmachariharu lai sodhnechhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थप सहयोग चाहिएको खण्डमा म विमान संस्थाका कर्मचारीहरूलाई सोध्नेछु।

English: Take care and enjoy your flight.
Nepali (Romanized): Afno khyaal rakhnu hos ra udaan ko ananda linu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): आफ्नो ख्याल राख्नुहोस् र उडानको आनन्द लिनुहोस्।

English: Why are you ringing the doorbell so early in the morning?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kina yeti bihana ghanti bajairakhnu bhayeko chha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं किन यति बिहान घण्टी बजाइराख्नु भएको छ?

English: It’s nothing serious but I would like to discuss something regarding building a fence between our houses.
Nepali (Romanized): Kunai gambhir kura ta haina tara hami duijanako ghar bich baar banaune sambandhi kehi chalfal garna chahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): कुनै गम्भीर कुरा त होइन तर हामी दुईजनाको घर बीच बार बनाउने सम्बन्धी केही छलफल गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: what’s wrong with the one which is already there?
Nepali (Romanized): pahile nai tyaha bhayeko baarma k kharabi cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): पहिले नै त्यहाँ भएको बारमा के खराबी छ?

English: If I remember correctly this fence was built when you built your house around 5 years ago.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi malai sahi samjhana chha bhane yo baar taba nirman gariyeko thiyo jaba tapaile tapaiko ghar banaunu bhayeko thiyo 5 barsa agadi.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि मलाई सही सम्झना छ भने
column5: यो बार तब निर्माण गरिएको थियो जब तपाईंले तपाईंको घर बनाउनु भएको थियो ५ वर्ष अगाडि।

English: You can see that we just renovated our house and built a double storey house.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai dekhna saknu huncha hamile bharkhar hamro ghar marammat garera dui talle ghar banayau.
column5: हामीले भर्खर हाम्रो घर मर्मत गरेर दुई तल्ले घर बनायौं।

English: I feel our main bedroom and swimming pool can be seen from your house which is a privacy concern.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagchha hamro mukhya shayan kakshya ra paudi khelne pokhari tapaiko ghar bata dekhna sakinchha jun gopaniyetako bishaya ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ हाम्रो मुख्य शयन कक्ष र पौडी खेल्ने पोखरी तपाईंको घरबाट देख्न सकिन्छ जुन गोपनीयताको विषय हो।

English: Your house is quite visible from our house.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko ghar hamro ghar bata majjale dekhinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको घर हाम्रो घरबाट मज्जाले देखिन्छ।

English: However Mr. Rikesh we are a retired couple and we do not have good savings.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhyapi Rikesh ji hami sewanibrit jodi / dampati hau ra hami sanga ramro bachat chhaina.
column5: रिकेश जी
column6: हामी सेवानिवृत्त जोडी / दम्पती हौं र हामीसँग राम्रो बचत छैन।

English: Support pension from centrelink is the only medium of income we have.
