Nepali (Romanized): Centrelink bata aune samarthan nibritbharan nai hamro ek matra aaya ko madhyam ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): सेन्टरलिंक बाट आउने समर्थन निवृत्तिभरण नै हाम्रो एक मात्र आयको माध्यम हो।

English: But I need your permission after which I can go to our local council with valid reasons to build the fence.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara malai tapaiko anumati chahincha jaspaschat ma baarko nirmaanko lagi vaidh karanharu liyera hamro sthaniya parishad ma jana sakchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मलाई तपाईंको अनुमति चाहिन्छ जसपश्चात म बारको निर्माणको लागि वैध कारणहरू लिएर हाम्रो स्थानीय परिषदमा जान सक्छु।

English: Well we do not have any issue with replacing or building a new boundary between our houses because we value your privacy.
Nepali (Romanized): Kher hamro gharharu bich simana badalnu wa naya simana nirman garna hamilai kehi apatti chhaina kina bhane hami tapaiko gopaniyata lai kadar garchhau.
column5: हाम्रो घरहरू बीच सिमाना बदल्नु वा नयाँ सिमाना निर्माण गर्न हामीलाई केही आपत्ति छैन किनभने हामी तपाईंको गोपनीयतालाई कदर गर्छौं।

English: How would we manage the money though?
Nepali (Romanized): Tathapi hami kasari paisa prabandha garnechhau?
Nepali (Devanagari): तथापि हामी कसरी पैसा प्रबन्ध गर्नेछौं?

English: Hmmm… Firstly let me call a builder and get an estimated price for building the fence.
Nepali (Romanized): Hmmm… Pahile malai nirman karmi lai samparka garna dinu hos ra baar banauna lagne anumanit mulya lina dinus.
Nepali (Devanagari): हम्... पहिले मलाई निर्माण कर्मीलाई सम्पर्क गर्न दिनुहोस् र बार बनाउन लाग्ने अनुमानित मूल्य लिन दिनुस्।

English: I would discuss with my wife too regarding this matter.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero shrimati sanga pani yes bishaya ma chalfal garchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो श्रीमतीसँग पनि यस विषयमा छलफल गर्छु।

English: Please let me know what the builder says.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya malai nirman karmi le k bhancha bataunu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया मलाई निर्माण कर्मीले के भन्छ बताउनु होला।

English: I think I would be able to only pay one fourth of the total amount due to our financial condition.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha ma kebal kul rakam ko ek chauthai matra bhuktani garna sakchau hamro arthik awastha ko karan
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ म केवल कुल रकमको एक चौथाई मात्र भुक्तानी गर्न सक्छौं हाम्रो आर्थिक अवस्थाको कारण।

English: Ms. Ann we also have so many expenses and bills to pay.
Nepali (Romanized): Ann ji hami sanga pani dherai kharchaharu ra bhuktani garnu parne bill haru chhan.
column5: हामीसँग पनि धेरै खर्चहरू र भुक्तानी गर्नुपर्ने बिलहरू छन्।

English: We have just spent our savings on this renovation and we have to pay $3552.90 monthly for a house loan as well.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile bharkhar hamro bachat yas marmat ma kharchha gareka chhau ra hamile gharko rinko lagi masik $3552.90 bhuktani pani garnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले भर्खर हाम्रो बचत यस मर्मतमा खर्च गरेका छौं र हामीले घरको ऋणको लागि मासिक $३५५२.९० भुक्तानी पनि गर्नुपर्छ।

English: You are both young and working.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiharu dubai jawan ra kaam gardai hunu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंहरू दुवै जवान र काम गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ।

English: We are dependent on the government for income and we have to make both our ends meet in that amount.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami aaya ka lagi sarkar ma nirbhar chhau ra hamile sabai kharcha tehi rakam bata pura garnu parchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी आयका लागि सरकारमा निर्भर छौं र हामीले सबै खर्च त्यही रकमबाट पूरा गर्नुपर्छ।

English: I will call the fencemaker and I will give you a receipt of the bill.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma baar banaune manis lai samparka garchhu ra ma tapailai bill ko ek rashid dinchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म बार बनाउने मानिसलाई सम्पर्क गर्छु र म तपाईंलाई बिलको एक रसिद दिन्छु।

English: You can pay 1/4th of the total amount.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kul rakam ko ek chauthai bhaag tirna saknu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं कुल रकमको एक चौथाई भाग तिर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Thank you for cooperating with us.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamilai sahayog garnu bhaeko ma dhanyabaad.

English: I will sign the required documents and help you as much as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma awashyak kagajatharu ma hastaksher gari dinchu ra tapaiko sakdo maddat garchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आवश्यक कागजातहरूमा हस्ताक्षर गरिदिन्छु र तपाईंको सक्दो मद्दत गर्छु।

English: I understand that you have an issue with your neighbour.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma bujhna sakchu ki tapailai afno chimeki sanga samasya cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म बुझ्न सक्छु कि तपाईंलाई आफ्नो छिमेकीसँग समस्या छ।

English: Could you please tell me what the problem is?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai malai batauna saknu huncha samasya k ho bhanera.
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं मलाई बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ समस्या के हो भनेर।

English: Yesterday my gardener was transporting some gardening materials using the laneway behind my house.
Nepali (Romanized): Hijo mero maali le mero ghar paxadi ko bato bata kehi bagaicha ko samaan osaardai thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): हिजो मेरो मालीले मेरो घर पछाडिको बाटोबाट केही बगैंचाको सामान ओसार्दै थियो।

English: But my neighbour stopped him from doing so and told him that he’s not allowed to use that lane for any kind of work that belongs to me.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara mero chimeki le uslai testo garna bata rokyo ani bhanyo ki uslai mero kaam ko lagi tyo bato prayog garne anumati chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मेरो छिमेकीले उसलाई त्यस्तो गर्नबाट रोक्यो अनि भन्यो कि उसलाई मेरो कामको लागि त्यो बाटो प्रयोग गर्ने अनुमति छैन।

Nepali (Romanized): Yo to dherai ascharyajanak kura ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो त धेरै आश्चर्यजनक कुरा हो।

English: According to our records the local council owns the lane and no one has the right to stop other people from using that lane.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro abhilekh anusar tyo bato sthaniye parishad ko ho ra aru byakti haru lai tyo bato prayog garna rokne kasaiko adhikar chaina.
column5: त्यो बाटो स्थानीय परिषदको हो र अरु व्यक्तिहरूलाई त्यो बाटो प्रयोग गर्न रोक्ने कसैको अधिकार छैन।

English: Actually I bought my house from the same neighbour last year.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma maile mero ghar tehi chimeki bata gata barsa kineko thiye.
column5: मैले मेरो घर त्यही छिमेकीबाट गत वर्ष किनेको थिएँ।

English: And after talking to him yesterday I came to know that he has put a special condition in the contract of sale which says “the buyer has agreed to abandon the right of laneway attached to the property’’.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra uha sanga hijo kura garepaxi maile thaha paye ki unle bikri samjhauta ma euta khaas sarta rakheko cha jasle bhancha “khariddarle sampatti sanga judeko bato prayog garne adhikar tyagna maneko cha”.
column5: मैले थाहा पाएँ कि उनले बिक्री सम्झौतामा एउटा खास शर्त राखेको छ जसले भन्छ
column6: "खरिददारले सम्पत्तिसँग जुडेको बाटो प्रयोग गर्ने अधिकार त्याग्न मानेको छ"।

Nepali (Romanized): Arey yo ta anautho sarta ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): अरे यो त अनौठो शर्त हो।

English: And how come you didn’t know about it?
Nepali (Romanized): Ra tapailai yesko barema kasari thaha bhaena?
Nepali (Devanagari): र तपाईंलाई यसको बारेमा कसरी थाहा भएन?

English: Didn’t you get any legal advice before signing the contract?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile samjhautama hastacher garna agi kunai kanuni paramarsha linu bhayeko thiyena?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले सम्झौतामा हस्ताक्षर गर्न अघि कुनै कानुनी परामर्श लिनु भएको थिएन?

English: I did ask a solicitor to go through the contract and handle the paperwork for me.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile mero wakil lai samjhauta padhna ra mero lagi kagajaat ka kaam milauna bhaneko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले मेरो वकिललाई सम्झौता पढ्न र मेरो लागि कागजातका काम मिलाउन भनेको थिएँ।

English: He didn’t tell me anything about any such condition in the contract.
Nepali (Romanized): Unle malai samjhauta ma bhaeko yesto sarta ko barema kehi bhannu bhayena.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनले मलाई सम्झौतामा भएको यस्तो शर्तको बारेमा केही भन्नु भएन।

English: Then I would suggest that you talk to your solicitor again and tell him to go through the paperwork again.
Nepali (Romanized): Teso bhae ma tapailai afno wakil sanga feri ekchoti kura garna sujhav dinchu ra uhalai feri kagajat herna bhannu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसो भए म तपाईंलाई आफ्नो वकिलसँग फेरि एकचोटी कुरा गर्न सुझाव दिन्छु र उहाँलाई फेरि कागजात हेर्न भन्नुहोस्।

English: And then see what he says about the situation.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra tespaxi unle yo awastha ko bare k bhannu huncha hernu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): र त्यसपछि उनले यो अवस्थाको बारे के भन्नुहुन्छ हेर्नुहोस्।

Nepali (Romanized): Maile uhalai aja samparka gareko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले उहाँलाई आज सम्पर्क गरेको थिएँ।

English: He said that he was not alarmed by anything in the contract.
Nepali (Romanized): Uhale bhannu bhayo ki uha samjhautako kunai chizbata bhayesuchit bhaenan.
Nepali (Devanagari): उहाँले भन्नुभयो कि उहाँ सम्झौताको कुनै चीजबाट भयसूचित भएनन्।

English: But given the current scenario it looks like he didn’t even bother to look into the contract at all.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara bartaman awastha herda yesto dekhincha ki uha le samjhauta herne kasta samet garnu bhaena.
column5: यस्तो देखिन्छ कि उहाँले सम्झौता हेर्ने कष्ट समेत गर्नु भएन।

English: Look we will try to speak to your neighbour.
Nepali (Romanized): Hernuhos hami tapaiko chimeki sanga kura garna prayas garnechau.
column5: हामी तपाईंको छिमेकीसँग कुरा गर्न प्रयास गर्नेछौं।

English: But regarding your property’s contract of sale and that peculiar condition in it you should talk to your solicitor as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara tapaiko sampatti ko bikri samjhauta ra tyo anautho sarta ko bare tapaile chado bhanda chado tapaiko wakil sanga kura garnu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर तपाईंको सम्पत्तिको बिक्री सम्झौता र त्यो अनौठो शर्तको बारे
column5: तपाईंले चाँडो भन्दा चाँडो तपाईंको वकिलसँग कुरा गर्नुपर्छ।

English: I will definitely talk to him again at the earliest.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pakkai pani chittai uha sanga kura garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म पक्कै पनि छिट्टै उहाँसँग कुरा गर्नेछु।

English: I strongly believe it is because of his negligence that there have been so many issues.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai dridh biswas cha yo uha ko laparwahi ko karan yeti dherai samasya aipareko ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई दृढ विश्वास छ यो उहाँको लापरवाहीको कारण यति धेरै समस्या आइपरेको हो।

English: Please contact us for any further issues you might face.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya tapaile kunai thap muddaharuko samana garnu parema hamilai samparka garnu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया तपाईंले कुनै थप मुद्दाहरूको सामना गर्नु परेमा हामीलाई सम्पर्क गर्नु होला।

Nepali (Romanized): Hami yeha maddat kai lagi baseka hau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी यहाँ मद्दतकै लागि बसेका हौं।

English: Hope the problem will be solved soon.
Nepali (Romanized): Asha cha yo samasya chadai samadhan hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): आशा छ यो समस्या चाँडै समाधान हुनेछ।

Nepali (Romanized): Maali / Bagaicha ma Kaam Garne Manche

column5: पुष्प विक्रेता

English: My name is Claudia and I am the investigating officer of this case.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero naam Claudia ho ra ma yes muddako anusandhan adhikari / adhikrit hoon.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो नाम क्लाउडिया हो र म यस मुद्दाको अनुसन्धान अधिकारी / अधिकृत हुँ।

English: Please have a seat so that we can get started.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya basnuhos taki hami shuru garna sakau.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया बस्नुहोस् ताकि हामी सुरु गर्न सकौं।

English: I don’t know where I should start from.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thaha chhaina ma kaha bata shuru garu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थाहा छैन म कहाँबाट सुरु गरूँ।

English: I have never done anything bad to anyone so why these neighbours have done this to me.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile kasailai kahile pani kharab gareko chhaina tara kina yi chimekiharu ley malai yesto gare.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले कसैलाई कहिले पनि खराब गरेको छैन तर किन यी छिमेकीहरूले मलाई यस्तो गरे।

English: Would you like to have some water?
Don’t stress and tell me from the beginning what exactly happened.
Nepali (Romanized): Tanaab nalinuhos ra thyakkai ke bhayo malai shurubata nai bhannuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): तनाव नलिनुहोस् र ठ्याक्कै के भयो मलाई सुरुबाट नै भन्नुहोस्।

English: Actually there was a Eucalyptus tree between my and my neighbor’s house.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma mero ra mero chimeki ko ghar ko bichma nilgiriko rukh thiyo.
column5: मेरो र मेरो छिमेकीको घरको बीचमा नीलगिरिको रुख थियो।

English: I planted this tree with my own hands but my neighbor Xen has cut it down with a chainsaw without our permission.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yes rukh lai aafnai haat ley ropeko thiye tara mero chimeki Xen ley mero anumati bina karauti ley tyo katidiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यस रुखलाई आफ्नै हातले रोपेको थिएँ तर मेरो छिमेकी जेनले मेरो अनुमति बिना करौंतीले त्यो काटिदिए।

English: But we’ve heard a different side of this story.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara hamile ta yes katha ko bhinna patto suneka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर हामीले त यस कथाको भिन्न पाटो सुनेका छौं।

English: Mr. Xen said that he informed you about the roots of the tree which were breaking the sewage pipe on his side.
Nepali (Romanized): Shriman Xen ley bhane ki unle tapailai tes rukhko jarako bare suchit garnu bhayeka thiye jasle uhapatti ko dhalko pipe futairaheko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): श्रीमान् जेनले भने कि उनले तपाईंलाई त्यस रुखको जराको बारे सूचित गर्नुभएका थिए जसले उहाँपट्टिको ढलको पाइप फुटाइरहेको थियो।

English: And you are saying that he didn’t inform you at all.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra tapai bhandai hunuhuncha ki uhale yes bare tapailai kehi pani suchit garnu bhayena.
Nepali (Devanagari): र तपाईं भन्दै हुनुहुन्छ कि उहाँले यस बारे तपाईंलाई केही पनि सूचित गर्नुभएन।

English: Yes he said he was doubtful and he would talk to the plumber and tell me.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho unle bhannu bhayeko thiyo ki uha sankaspad chhan ra nalkaar sanga kura garera malai bhanchhu bhane.
column5: उनले भन्नुभएको थियो कि उहाँ शंकास्पद छन् र नलकारसँग कुरा गरेर मलाई भन्छु भनेर।

English: However he didn’t even inform me before cutting it down.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhapi tyo katnu aghi unle malai suchit pani garnu bhayena.
column5: त्यो काट्नु अघि उनले मलाई सूचित पनि गर्नुभएन।

English: Do you have any idea why he would do such a thing?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko bichar ma uhale yesto kina garnu bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको विचारमा उहाँले यस्तो किन गर्नुभयो?

English: Did you have any disputes with him before?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaiko uni sanga pahile jhagada bhayeko thiyo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंको उनीसँग पहिले झगडा भएको थियो?

English: No I never had any dispute with him in the past.
Nepali (Romanized): Hoina maile bigat ma uha sanga kunai bibaad gareko chhuina.
column5: मैले विगतमा उहाँसँग कुनै विवाद गरेको छैन।

English: However I have heard from other neighbours that he is a very insensitive and heartless human.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhapi maile aru chimekiharu bata suneko chhu ki uni ekdumai asambedanshil ra hridayabihin manis hun.
column5: मैले अरु छिमेकीहरूबाट सुनेको छु कि उनी एकदमै असंवेदनशील र हृदयविहीन मानिस हुन्।

English: He accused one of the neighbours for parking their car in front of his house.
Nepali (Romanized): Uhale ek chimekilai uhako ghar agadi gaadi adaan gareko aarop lagaye.
Nepali (Devanagari): उहाँले एक छिमेकीलाई उहाँको घर अगाडि गाडी अडान गरेको आरोप लगाए।

English: Now coming back to your concern was your communication with him verbal or written?
Nepali (Romanized): Aba tapaiko chintako bishaya ma au K uha sanga tapaiko bartalaab maukhik thiyo wa likhit?
column5: के उहाँसँग तपाईंको वार्तालाप मौखिक थियो वा लिखित?

English: If verbal do you have any witness who witnessed your conversation?
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi maukhik thiyo bhane tapaisanga koi sakshi chan jasle tapaiko kurakani suneko thiyo?
column5: तपाईंसँग कोही साक्षी छन् जसले तपाईंको कुराकानी सुनेको थियो?

English: I don’t think there was anyone around when we had this conversation.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai laagdaina ki hami yo kurakani garda kohi warapara thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्दैन कि हामी यो कुराकानी गर्दा कोही वरपर थियो।

English: As I don’t have his contact number or email I tried communicating verbally but because of the language barrier he might have not understood my point.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga uhako samparka number wa email nabhayeko karan ley maile maukhik rupma bartalaab garne prayas gare tara bhasa awarodh kaa karan uhale mero kura bujhnu bhayena hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग उहाँको सम्पर्क नम्बर वा ईमेल नभएको कारणले मैले मौखिक रूपमा वार्तालाप गर्ने प्रयास गरें तर भाषा अवरोधका कारण उहाँले मेरो कुरा बुझ्नु भएन होला।

English: Tell me what kind of solution you are after?
Nepali (Romanized): Malai bhannu hos tapai kasto prakar ko samadhanko paxi hunuhunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई भन्नुहोस् तपाईं कस्तो प्रकारको समाधानको पछि हुनुहुन्छ?

English: As you don’t have any proof it would be hard for us to take any action against him.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai sanga kunai praman nabhaeko le hamilai uha birudhha kunai pani karawahi garna kathin hunechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंसँग कुनै प्रमाण नभएकोले हामीलाई उहाँ विरुद्ध कुनै पनि कारवाही गर्न कठिन हुनेछ।

English: I want him to apologize to me so that he learns a lesson.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma chaahanchhu ki uha ma sanga maafi magun taki uhale paath sikos.
Nepali (Devanagari): म चाहन्छु कि उहाँ मसँग माफी मागून् ताकि उहाँले पाठ सिकून्।

English: Furthermore he should buy me a new Eucalyptus tree.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesbahek uhale malai naya nilgiriko rukh kinidinu parchha.
column5: उहाँले मलाई नयाँ नीलगिरिको रुख किनिदिनु पर्छ।

English: I will plant it somewhere else.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma teslai aru kunai thau ma ropchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त्यसलाई अरु कुनै ठाउँमा रोप्छु।

English: Well let me tell you a bit about the mediation process alright.
Nepali (Romanized): Kher ma tapailai madhyasthata prakriya ko barema thorai batauchhu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): खैर म तपाईंलाई मध्यस्थता प्रक्रियाको बारेमा थोरै बताउँछु
column5: हुन्छ।

English: We can set up a meeting between you along with a mediator who is trained and nationally accredited to help parties resolve their problems.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami tapaiharubich euta baithak bolauna sakchhau jasma ek madhyasthakarta hunecha jo samasya samadhan garna pakshyaharu lai maddat garna prasikshit ra rashtriya maanyata prapta chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी तपाईंहरूबीच एउटा बैठक बोलाउन सक्छौं जसमा एक मध्यस्थकर्ता हुनेछ जो समस्या समाधान गर्न पक्षहरूलाई मद्दत गर्न प्रशिक्षित र राष्ट्रिय मान्यता प्राप्त छन्।

English: Ok! Can you manage this quickly as I am going to Nepal next month for my brother-in-law’s wedding?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha! K tapaile yesko chhitai prabandha garna saknu hunchha kinabhane ma arko mahina mero dewar ko biwaha ko lagi Nepal jaadaichhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ! के तपाईंले यसको छिट्टै प्रबन्ध गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ किनभने म अर्को महिना मेरो देवरको विवाहको लागि नेपाल जाँदैछु।

English: I want everything to be sorted before that.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma jana agadi nai sabai mileko herna chaahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म जान अगाडि नै सबै मिलेको हेर्न चाहन्छु।

English: Ma’am what happened to your car?
column5: तपाईंको गाडीलाई के भयो?

English: It looks like someone has smashed into your car from the right side.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesto dekhinchha ki kasaile tapaiko gaadi daya patti bata chaknachur pari diyechha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस्तो देखिन्छ कि कसैले तपाईंको गाडी दायाँ पट्टीबाट चकनाचुर पारिदिएछ।

Nepali (Romanized): Aasa chha tapai ghaite hunu bhayeko chhaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): आशा छ तपाईं घाइते हुनुभएको छैन।

English: I was just approaching my car after dropping my son off to his school.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero chhoralai usko bidhyala chodera ma mero gaadi tarfa aairaheko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो छोरालाई उसको विद्यालय छोडेर म मेरो गाडी तर्फ आइरहेको थिएँ।

English: And this car came around the corner and hit the back of my car.
Nepali (Romanized): Ani tyo gaadi kuna tira aayo ra mero gaadi ko pachaadi ko bhag hidkayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि त्यो गाडी कुना तिर आयो र मेरो गाडीको पछाडिको भाग हिर्कायो।

English: Did you take a picture of the car’s registration number?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile gaadiko darta number ko tasbir linu bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले गाडीको दर्ता नम्बरको तस्बिर लिनुभयो?

English: No he smashed into my car and ran away.
Nepali (Romanized): Hoina usle mero gaadi futaera bhagyo.
column5: उसले मेरो गाडी फुटाएर भाग्यो।

English: He was driving like a bat out of hell.
Nepali (Romanized): Oo narak bata bahira niskeko chamero jastai gaadi chalaudai thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): ऊ नर्कबाट बाहिर निस्केको चमेरो जस्तै गाडी चलाउँदै थियो।

English: I couldn’t take a picture but I remember it was a red Corolla.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tasbir lina sakina tara malai yaad chha ki tyo raato Corolla thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तस्बिर लिन सकिन तर मलाई याद छ कि त्यो रातो कोरोला थियो।

English: Hmm.. It looks like he has ruined your car.
Nepali (Romanized): Hmm.. yesto dekhinchha ki uhale tapaiko gaadi nasta gareko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हम्.. यस्तो देखिन्छ कि उहाँले तपाईंको गाडी नष्ट गरेको छ।

English: The wind screen and the side window are badly damaged.
Nepali (Romanized): Agadi ko sisa ra sangai ko jhyaal naramrari bigreko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अगाडिको सिसा र सँगैको झ्याल नराम्ररी बिग्रेको छ।

English: I hope whoever it was gets his license revoked.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aasa gardachhu ki tyo jo kohi pani ho usko anumati patra kharej hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आशा गर्दछु कि त्यो जो कोही पनि हो
column5: उसको अनुमति पत्र खारेज होस्।

English: I bought this one just a few months ago.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yo kehi mahina agadi matrai kineko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यो केही महिना अगाडि मात्रै किनेको थिएँ।

English: We’ll check the cameras around and will figure him out.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami warapara ko bhaachitran yantra jaanch garne chhau ra usko patta lagaune chhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी वरपरको भाचित्रण यन्त्र जाँच गर्नेछौं र उसको पत्ता लगाउनेछौं।

English: Looks like the person is inexperienced and just learning how to drive and that too without insurance.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesto dekhinchha ki byakti anubhavhin chha ra bharkharai gaadi chalauna sikdaichha ra tyo pani bima bina.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस्तो देखिन्छ कि व्यक्ति अनुभवहीन छ र भर्खरै गाडी चलाउन सिक्दैछ र त्यो पनि बिमा बिना।

English: To me it looks like he was drunk.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagchha ki oo matiyeko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कि ऊ मातिएको थियो।

English: Otherwise he would have stopped and apologised for what he did.
Nepali (Romanized): Anyathaa usle rokthiyo ra usle gareko kaam ko lagi maafi magthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): अन्यथा उसले रोक्थ्यो र उसले गरेको कामको लागि माफी माग्थ्यो।

English: Is your car insured? If so is it comprehensive or third party insurance?
Nepali (Romanized): Ke tapaiko gaadi bima gariyeko chha? Yadi ho bhane ke tyo bistrit / brihat ho wa tesro pakshya bima ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंको गाडी बिमा गरिएको छ? यदि हो भने
column5: के त्यो विस्तृत / बृहत् हो वा तेस्रो पक्ष बिमा हो?

English: I have only purchased the third party plan as I couldn’t afford the comprehensive one.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tesro pakshya yojana matra kharid gareko chhu kinaki ma bistrit bima kinna sakdina thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तेस्रो पक्ष योजना मात्र खरिद गरेको छु किनकि म विस्तृत बिमा किन्न सक्दिनथिएँ।

English: So I can’t claim for the damage to this car.
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhaera yes gadiko kshyati maile dawi garna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यही भएर यस गाडीको क्षति मैले दावी गर्न सक्दिन।

English: Now I don’t know where I would bring the money from to repair my car.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba malai thaha chhaina mero gaadi marammat garna ma kaha bata paisa lyaunechhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): अब मलाई थाहा छैन मेरो गाडी मर्मत गर्न म कहाँबाट पैसा ल्याउनेछु।

English: You may be able to sue him for the cost of fixing the damage to your car.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai afno gaadima bhaeko kshyati ko marammat garda lageko paisako lagi uha mathi mudda halna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं आफ्नो गाडीमा भएको क्षतिको मर्मत गर्दा लागेको पैसाको लागि उहाँ माथि मुद्दा हाल्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: But for that we need to find him by accessing the CCTV cameras around this area.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara tesko lagi hamile yes chhetra wariparika CCTV yantra haru marfat uhako khoji garnuparcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर त्यसको लागि हामीले यस क्षेत्र वरिपरिका CCTV यन्त्रहरू मार्फत उहाँको खोजी गर्नुपर्छ।

English: I hope we find him soon and charge him against the hit and run case.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aasa garchhu ki hami uslai chadai nai bhetauchhau ra durghatana gari bhageko mudda ma abhiyog lagaunechhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आशा गर्छु कि हामी उसलाई चाँडै नै भेटाउँछौं र दुर्घटना गरी भागेको मुद्दामा अभियोग लगाउनेछौं।

English: Okay now that we have got the interpreter sorted we can continue with this interview Mr. Jiten.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha aba jaba hamile dobhase krambadha gareka chau hami antarbarta jari rakhna sakchan Srimaan Jiten.
column5: अब जब हामीले दोभाषे क्रमबद्ध गरेका छौं
column6: हामी अन्तर्वार्ता जारी राख्न सक्छौं श्रीमान् जितेन।

English: Do you fully understand the severity of offences your son Roshan has been charged with?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai purna rupma bujhnu huncha tapaiko chora Roshan mathi lageko aparadhko gambhirta lai?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं पूर्ण रूपमा बुझ्नुहुन्छ तपाईंको छोरा रोशन माथि लागेको अपराधको गम्भीरतालाई?

English: I understand that what my son has commited is a very serious crime.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma bujhchu ki mero chorale gareko gambhir aparadh ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): म बुझ्छु कि मेरो छोराले गरेको गम्भीर अपराध हो।

English: The interpreter told me that he stole a liquor bottle from a liquor shop.
Nepali (Romanized): Dobhasele malai bhanyo ki usle ek raksi pasal bata ek bottle raksi chori gareko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): दोभाषेले मलाई भन्यो कि उसले एक रक्सी पसलबाट एक बोतल रक्सी चोरी गरेको छ।

English: Not only that there is a second charge as well.
Nepali (Romanized): Tyo matra hoina dosro abhiyog pani cha.
column5: दोस्रो अभियोग पनि छ।

English: When my colleague attempted to put handcuffs on him Roshan continued using offensive language.
Nepali (Romanized): Jaba mero sahakarmile oomathi hathkadi lagauna koshish gare Roshanle apamanjanak bhasa prayog gardai thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): जब मेरो सहकर्मीले उ माथि हतकडी लगाउन कोशिश गरे
column5: रोशनले अपमानजनक भाषा प्रयोग गर्दै थियो।

English: It was hard for us to put him into the police car.
Nepali (Romanized): Uslai prahari gadima halna pani hamilai garho bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसलाई प्रहरी गाडीमा हाल्न पनि हामीलाई गाह्रो भयो।

English: I feel very bad knowing this.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai yo thaha pauda sarai naramro lagyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई यो थाहा पाउँदा साह्रै नराम्रो लाग्यो।

English: I am ashamed that I gave birth to a useless son.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma lajjit chu ki maile euta bekarko choralai janma diye.
Nepali (Devanagari): म लज्जित छु कि मैले एउटा बेकारको छोरालाई जन्म दिएँ।

English: Recently his behaviour has gone out of our hands.
Nepali (Romanized): Haalsaalai usko bebahar hamro haatbata bahira gayisakeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हालसालै उसको व्यवहार हाम्रो हातबाट बाहिर गइसकेको छ।

English: When we ran a check we found that your son was arrested in November 2018 for shoplifting in Epping.
Nepali (Romanized): Jaba hamile euta jach chalayau hamile pataa lagayu ki tapaiko chora November 2018 ma Epping ma pasalma chori gardai gareko awasthama pakrau pareko thiyo.
column5: हामीले पत्ता लगायौं कि तपाईंको छोरा नोभेम्बर २०१८ मा एपिङमा पसलमा चोरी गर्दै गरेको अवस्थामा पक्राउ परेको थियो।

English: He got off with a caution last time though.
Nepali (Romanized): Oo pachilo patak chetawanika sath chutyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): ऊ पछिल्लो पटक चेतावनीका साथ छुट्यो।

English: At that time the environment of our home was very disturbed.
Nepali (Romanized): Jiten Tesbela hamro gharko batabaran atyantai kharab thyo.
column5: त्यसबेला हाम्रो घरको वातावरण अत्यन्तै खराब थियो।

English: We were in a financial crisis because of which there were a lot of fights between me and my wife.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami arthik sankatma thiyau jasko karanle garda ma ra mero srimati bich dherai jhagada hunthyo.
column5: जसको कारणले गर्दा म र मेरो श्रीमती बीच धेरै झगडा हुन्थ्यो।

English: We weren’t able to keep a check on his company.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami usko sangatma dhyan rakhna asamartha vayau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी उसको संगतमा ध्यान राख्न असमर्थ भयौं।

English: How are things now at your place?
Nepali (Romanized): Ahiley tapaiko ghar ma kasto awastha cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): अहिले तपाईंको घरमा कस्तो अवस्था छ?

English: Now our financial situation has improved a lot.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba hamro arthik awastha dherai sudhar vayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अब हाम्रो आर्थिक अवस्था धेरै सुधार भएको छ।

English: His mother and I work full time now.
Nepali (Romanized): Usko aama ra ma purna-kaalin kaam gardaichau.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसको आमा र म पूर्ण-कालीन काम गर्दैछौं।

English: But it seems in our race to earn money our son has gotten out of control.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara yesto dekhincha ki hamro paisa kamaune daudma hamro choro niyantaran bahira gaisakyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर यस्तो देखिन्छ कि हाम्रो पैसा कमाउने दौडमा हाम्रो छोरो नियन्त्रण बाहिर गइसक्यो।

English: When we caught Roshan shoplifting this evening he was not by himself.
Nepali (Romanized): Jaba hamile aja sajha Roshanle pasalma chori gardai garda samatyau oo afu matra thiyena.
Nepali (Devanagari): जब हामीले आज साँझ रोशनले पसलमा चोरी गर्दै गर्दा समात्यौं
column5: ऊ आफू मात्र थिएन।

English: We arrested three of his mates.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile unka tin jana sathiharu pani pakrau gareu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले उनका तीन जना साथीहरू पनि पक्राउ गर्यौं।

English: He has surely fallen in the wrong crowd.
Nepali (Romanized): U pakkai pani galat sangat ma pareko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ऊ पक्कै पनि गलत संगतमा परेको छ।

English: Constable I don’t understand how I should deal with all this.
Nepali (Romanized): Hawaldaarsaab ma bujhdina ma yi sabai kura kasari samhalu.
column5: म बुझ्दिन म यी सबै कुरा कसरी सम्हालूँ।

English: What will happen now to my son?
As per your opinion what will he be sentenced for these crimes?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko dharana anushar uslai yi aparadhko sajaya k hunecha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको धारणा अनुसार उसलाई यी अपराधको सजाय के हुनेछ?

English: Mr. Baibhav now that you’ve had your rights explained to you and we’ve got an interpreter sorted we can continue this interview.
Nepali (Romanized): Shriman Baibhav aba jaba tapailai tapaiko adhikar bare bujhaisakeko cha ra hamile dobhaseko badobasta sakeka chau hami hamro antarbarta jaari rakhna sakchau.
column5: अब जब तपाईंलाई तपाईंको अधिकार बारे बुझाइसकेको छ र हामीले दोभाषेको बन्दोबस्त सकेका छौं
column6: हामी हाम्रो अन्तर्वार्ता जारी राख्न सक्छौं।

English: So do you understand that you have been arrested under the suspicion of committing the murder of Ms. Kamal?
Nepali (Romanized): Teso bhae Kamal ji ko hatyako aashanka ma tapailai pakrau gariyeko ho bhanera tapai bujhnu huncha?
column5: कमल जीको हत्याको आशंकामा तपाईंलाई पक्राउ गरिएको हो भनेर तपाईं बुझ्नुहुन्छ?
मलाई थाहा छ।

English: But believe me you have arrested the wrong person.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara mero biswas garnuhos tapaile galat byakti lai pakranu bhayeko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मेरो विश्वास गर्नुहोस् तपाईंले गलत व्यक्तिलाई पक्रनु भएको छ।

English: I don’t even understand why you have arrested me.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma bujhna pani sakdina ki tapaile malai kina pakranu bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म बुझ्न पनि सक्दिन कि तपाईंले मलाई किन पक्रनु भएको छ।

English: Well you have the opportunity to give us your version of events in this interview.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha tapai sanga yo antarbarta ma ghatanakram ko tapaiko saskaran hamilai dine awsar cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ तपाईंसँग यो अन्तर्वार्तामा घटनाक्रमको तपाईंको संस्करण हामीलाई दिने अवसर छ।

English: First of all can you tell us what your relationship was to the deceased?
Nepali (Romanized): Sabaibhanda pahile tapai hamilai batauna saknu hunchha ki mritak sanga tapaiko sambandaha k thiyo?
column5: तपाईं हामीलाई बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ कि मृतक सँग तपाईंको सम्बन्ध के थियो?

English: I don’t know any Kamal who is dead.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma kunai Kamal lai chindina jasko mrityu bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म कुनै कमललाई चिन्दिन जसको मृत्यु भएको छ।

English: Probably someone has given you the wrong information.
Nepali (Romanized): Sambhavata: kasaile tapailai galat jankari diyeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सम्भवतः कसैले तपाईंलाई गलत जानकारी दिएको छ।

English: Mr. Baibhav let me remind you that we have a witness who saw you speaking to the deceased on the day she was murdered at a bottle shop.
Nepali (Romanized): Shriman Baibhav tapailai smaran garauna dinu hos ki hamisanga ekjana sakshi cha jasle hatyako din tapailai raksi pasalma mritak sanga boleko dekheko thiyo.
column5: तपाईंलाई स्मरण गराउन दिनुहोस् कि हामीसँग एकजना साक्षी छ जसले हत्याको दिन तपाईंलाई रक्सी पसलमा मृतक सँग बोलेको देखेको थियो।

English: What do you have to say on that ?

Nepali (Romanized): Sakshi? Malai biswas garnu adhikari jiu.
Nepali (Devanagari): साक्षी? मलाई विश्वास गर्नु अधिकारी ज्यू।

English: I think someone is trying to conspire against me.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha kasaile mero biruddha sadyantra rachdaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कसैले मेरो विरुद्ध षड्यन्त्र रच्दैछ।

English: Tell me why I would go to a bottle shop.
Nepali (Romanized): Bhannuhos ma raksi pasal kina jaula?
Nepali (Devanagari): भन्नुहोस् म रक्सी पसल किन जाउँला?

English: So you deny being at Federation Square on September 30 this year?
Nepali (Romanized): Teso bhaye tapai yes barsa september mahina ko 30 tarik ma Federation Squarema hunu aswikar garnuhuncha?
column5: तपाईं यस वर्ष सेप्टेम्बर महिनाको ३० तारिखमा फेडेरेसन स्क्वायरमा हुनु अस्वीकार गर्नुहुन्छ?

English: What are you talking about officer?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai k kura gardai hunu huncha adhikari jiu?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं के कुरा गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ अधिकारी ज्यू?

English: I was at my neighbour’s house for his house warming party on that day.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tes din mero chimeki ko grihapravesh ko bhoj ma thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त्यस दिन मेरो छिमेकीको गृहप्रवेशको भोजमा थिएँ।

English: The witness we spoke to identified the birthmark on your face and the tattoo of a skull on your arm.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile kurakani gareko sakshi le tapaiko anuhar ko janma chinha ra tapaiko pakhurama khopiyeko khappar ko chinha pahichaan gareko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले कुराकानी गरेको साक्षीले तपाईंको अनुहारको जन्म चिन्ह र तपाईंको पाखुरामा खोपिएको खप्परको चिन्ह पहिचान गरेको छ।
ए तपाईंको मतलब यो जन्म चिन्ह?

English: It can be easily made or removed with makeup and this tattoo is very common among Nepali community.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo makeup ko saath sajilai banauna ra hatauna sakincha ra yo khopiyeko chinha Nepali Samudaya ma dherai samanya cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो मेकअपको साथ सजिलै बनाउन र हटाउन सकिन्छ र यो खोपिएको चिन्ह नेपाली समुदायमा धेरै सामान्य छ।

English: Mr. Baibhav I think the likelihood of that is very remote.
Nepali (Romanized): Shriman Baibhav malai lagcha ki yesko sambhavana dherai kum cha.
column5: मलाई लाग्छ कि यसको सम्भावना धेरै कम छ।

English: Besides we have turned up a restraining order in your records made by Kamal Singh.
Nepali (Romanized): Yes atirikt hamile tapaiko abhilekhma Kamal Singh dwara gariyeko rokne adesh pani payeka chhau.
column5: हामीले तपाईंको अभिलेखमा कमल सिंहद्वारा गरिएको रोक्ने आदेश पनि पाएका छौं।

English: She had complained that you were harassing her for the money she owed you.
Nepali (Romanized): Uhale gunaso gareka chan ki uha lai tapaile sapati diyeko paisa ko lagi yatana dinu hunthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): उहाँले गुनासो गर्नुभएको छ कि उहाँलाई तपाईंले सापटी दिएको पैसाको लागि यातना दिनुहुन्थ्यो।

English: Ah yes I remember having those restraining orders.
Nepali (Romanized): Ahh ho malai tyo rokka garaiyeka aadeshharu yaad chhan.
column5: मलाई त्यो रोक्का गराइएका आदेशहरू याद छन्।

English: Undoubtedly she paid the money and everything is done and dusted.
Nepali (Romanized): Nisandeha uhale paisa tirnu bhaisakyo ra sabai kura milisakyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): निसन्देह उहाँले पैसा तिर्नु भइसक्यो र सबै कुरा मिलिसक्यो।

English: Why would I kill someone for just $3500?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma kasailai $3500 ko lagi kina marthiye?
Nepali (Devanagari): म कसैलाई $३५०० को लागि किन मार्थें?

English: Why would I believe you when the evidence suggests otherwise..
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai kina biswas garu jaba praman le aru kura bhandaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई किन विश्वास गरूँ जब प्रमाणले अरु कुरा भन्दैछ।

English: The forensic team has found your DNA on these ropes from the crime scene.
Nepali (Romanized): Saathai hamile yo doriharu ma tapaiko DNA bhetayau jun forensic tolile ghatanasthal ma fela paare.
column5: हामीले यो डोरीहरूमा तपाईंको DNA भेट्टायौं जुन फोरेन्सिक टोलीले घटनास्थलमा फेला पारे।

English: What do you have to say about it?
Nepali (Romanized): Yesko bare ke bhanna chaahanu huncha?

English: Please believe what I say officer.
I don’t have any evidence now but this is a big conspiracy.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga ahile pramaan chaina tara yo euta thulo sadyantra ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग अहिले प्रमाण छैन तर यो एउटा ठूलो षड्यन्त्र हो।

English: I will not speak till my solicitor comes in.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba ma mero wakil na aaye samma kehi boldina
Nepali (Devanagari): अब म मेरो वकिल नआए सम्म केही बोल्दिन।

English: OK! We will wait until your lawyer is here.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha Tapaiko wakil na aaye samma hami parkhane chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ। तपाईंको वकिल नआए सम्म हामी पर्खने छौं।

English: I received your call and you sounded a bit worried.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tapaiko call prapta garethiye ra tapai alik chintit suninu vayeko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तपाईंको कल प्राप्त गरेको थिएँ र तपाईं अलिक चिन्तित सुनिनु भएको थियो।

Nepali (Romanized): K vayo? K sabai thik cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के भयो? के सबै ठिक छ?

English: Hello doctor! This is my mother Mrs Sunita Chapagain and she has this strange kind of pain in her knees while standing walking or doing any kind of physical activity.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste dactor sahab oohaa meri ama Sunita Chapagain hunuhuncha ra uhalai uthda hidda wa kunai pani saririk kriyakalap garda ghudama anoutho khaal ko dukhai huncha.
column5: उहाँ मेरी आमा सुनिता चापागाईं हुनुहुन्छ र उहाँलाई उठ्दा
column6: हिड्दा वा कुनै पनि शारीरिक क्रियाकलाप गर्दा घुँडामा अनौठो खालको दुखाइ हुन्छ।

English: Hello Mrs. Sunita. That’s sad to hear.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste srimati Sunita Yo sunera dukha lagyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते श्रीमती सुनिता। यो सुनेर दुख लाग्यो।

English: Let me check your knees. Please lie down on this stretcher.
Nepali (Romanized): Khai tapaiko ghuda jach garau Kripaya es bistaarak ma paltinu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): खै तपाईंको घुँडा जाँच गरौं। कृपया यस बिस्तारकमा पल्टिनु होस्।

column5: म पल्टिन्छु।

English: The pain is excruciating and it doesn’t stop even if I take painkillers.
Nepali (Romanized): Dukhai atyadhik cha ra painkillerle pani dukhai rokeko chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): दुखाइ अत्यधिक छ र पेनकिलरले पनि दुखाइ रोकेको छैन।

English: I have tried every possible remedy.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile harek sambhawit upaye prayog garisake taipani niko bhayena.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले हरेक सम्भावित उपाय प्रयोग गरिसकें तैपनि निको भएन।

English: Could you please tell how long you’ve been suffering from this pain?
Nepali (Romanized): Yo dukhai bata pidit hunu vako kati vayo kripaya tapai batauna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): यो दुखाइबाट पीडित हुनु भएको कति भयो कृपया तपाईं बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: How often do you feel the pain in a day?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai ekdin ma kati patak pida mahasus garnu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं एकदिनमा कति पटक पीडा महसुस गर्नुहुन्छ?

English: Is it only while doing any physical activity or while resting too?
Nepali (Romanized): K yo kunai saririk kriyakalap garda matra huncha wa aram gardapani?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यो कुनै शारीरिक क्रियाकलाप गर्दा मात्र हुन्छ वा आराम गर्दा पनि?

English: I do not remember how many times it pains during a day but it happens only when I am doing any physical activity.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai samjhana chaina ki din ma kati choti dukhcha tara yo kunai pani saririk gatibidhi gariraheko belama matrai huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई सम्झना छैन कि दिनमा कति चोटी दुख्छ
column5: तर यो कुनै पनि शारीरिक गतिविधि गरिरहेको बेलामा मात्रै हुन्छ।

English: Okay let me have a look.
column5: मलाई हेर्न दिनुहोस्।

English: Hmm I reckon this is arthritis.
Nepali (Romanized): Hmm mero bichar ma tapailai gathiya rog bhayeko cha.
column5: मेरो विचारमा तपाईंलाई गठिया रोग भएको छ।

English: But to know in detail I have to refer you to do an X-ray.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara bistrit rupma jannako lagi maile tapailai X-ray garna bhannu parcha.
column5: मैले तपाईंलाई एक्स-रे गर्न भन्नुपर्छ।

English: I have never heard of this disease.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yo rog ko barema kahile suneko thiyena.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यो रोगको बारेमा कहिले सुनेको थिइनँ।

English: Is it a very severe disease? Will I be fine doctor?
Nepali (Romanized): K yo atyanta gambhir rog ho? K ma thik hunechu dactar?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यो अत्यन्त गम्भीर रोग हो? के म ठिक हुनेछु डाक्टर?

English: I understand your concern Mrs. Chapagain.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapaiko chinta bujhdachu shrimati Chapagain.
column5: श्रीमती चापागाईं।

English: Don’t worry It is very common at your age.
Nepali (Romanized): Chinta nalinuhos Tapaiko umerma yo dherai samanya ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): चिन्ता नलिनुहोस्। तपाईंको उमेरमा यो धेरै सामान्य हो।

English: It happens because of the inflammation of the joints.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo jorniharu sunniyeka karan hune gardacha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो जोर्नीहरू सुन्निएका कारण हुने गर्दछ।

English: Inflammation? I exercise a lot and additionally I have been very active physically since I was young.
Nepali (Romanized): Sunniyeko? Ma dherai byayam gardachu ra tes atirikta ma jawan huda dekhi nai ma saririk roopma sakriya chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): सुन्निएको? म धेरै व्यायाम गर्दछु र त्यस अतिरिक्त
column5: म जवान हुँदा देखि नै म शारीरिक रूपमा सक्रिय छु।

English: I recommend you to get your X-Ray done to get the clear picture and visit a physiotherapist to reduce swelling and pain.
Nepali (Romanized): Spastikaran ka lagi ma tapailai chchya rashmi chikitsa garna sallaha garchu ra sunneko ra dukheko kam garnaka lagi sharirik chikitsak lai vetnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): स्पष्टीकरणका लागि म तपाईंलाई छाया रश्मि चिकित्सा गर्न सल्लाह गर्छु र सुन्निएको र दुखेको कम गर्नका लागि शारीरिक चिकित्सकलाई भेट्नुहोस्।

English: How long will it take to stop the pain?
Nepali (Romanized): Dukhai rokinako lagi kati samaya lagla?
Nepali (Devanagari): दुखाइ रोकिनको लागि कति समय लाग्ला?

English: And will I have to do anything else?
Nepali (Romanized): Ani k maile aru kehi garnu parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि के मैले अरु केही गर्नुपर्छ?

English: It will take a few weeks.
Please take the prescribed medicine and I’ll give you a call after your X-Ray reports.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya tokiyeko ausadhi linuhos ra ma tapailai tapaiko chchya rashmi chikitsako pratibedan aaye pachi samparka garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया तोकिएको औषधि लिनुहोस् र म तपाईंलाई तपाईंको छाया रश्मि चिकित्साको प्रतिवेदन आएपछि सम्पर्क गर्नेछु।

English: Next waiting please! Hi there ! I am Elena! How can I help you today ?
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya arko aunus! Namaste! Ma Elena hoon! Ma aaja tapailai kasari maddat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया अर्को आउनुस्! नमस्ते! म एलेना हुँ! म आज तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Actually last week I bought a hose which is used to water the garden.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma gata hapta maile bagaichha lai pani dina prayog garine euta paeep kineko thiye.
column5: गत हप्ता मैले बगैंचालाई पानी दिन प्रयोग गरिने एउटा पाइप किनेको थिएँ।

English: I want to return it and want a new one in exchange.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tyo firta garna chaahanchhu ra tesko badala ma naya chaahanchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त्यो फिर्ता गर्न चाहन्छु र त्यसको बदलामा नयाँ चाहन्छु।

English: Do you have the receipt so we can have a look and adjust.
Nepali (Romanized): Ke tapai sanga rashid chha taki hami herera samayojan garna sakau.
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंसँग रसिद छ ताकि हामी हेरेर समायोजन गर्न सकौं।

English: Did you bring the garden hose along with you?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile bagaichhako paeep tapai sanga liyera aaunu bhayeko cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले बगैंचाको पाइप तपाईंसँग लिएर आउनु भएको छ?

English: Receipt? Who keeps the receipts safely?
Nepali (Romanized): Rasid? Kasle rashidharu surakshit rupma rakhcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): रसिद? कसले रसिदहरू सुरक्षित रूपमा राख्छ?

English: I had no idea that I might need to return it.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thaha thiyena maile yeslai firta garnu parchha bhanera.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थाहा थिएन मैले यसलाई फिर्ता गर्नुपर्छ भनेर।

English: And yes it is in this carry bag. I have brought it along with me.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra ho tyo jholamaa chha Maile tyo ma sangai liyera aayeki chhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): र हो त्यो झोलामा छ। मैले त्यो म सँगै लिएर आएकी छु।

English: But in order to refund or replace I’ll need a proof of purchase.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara paisa firta garna athawa samaan saatnako lagi malai kharid pramaan chaincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर पैसा फिर्ता गर्न अथवा सामान साट्नको लागि
column5: मलाई खरिद प्रमाण चाहिन्छ।

English: You can show the bank transaction as well.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile bankma bhaeko lenden pani dekhauna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले बैंकमा भएको लेनदेन पनि देखाउन सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Let me see if there are any visible cuts or if it is broken.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai herna dinus tesma kunai drishyatmak chira cha wa tyo bhachiyeko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई हेर्न दिनुस् त्यसमा कुनै दृश्यात्मक चिरा छ वा त्यो भाँचिएको छ।

English: If it is a manufacturing error we will replace it for free.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi yo nirmaan truti ho bhane hami yo nishulka saati dinechhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि यो निर्माण त्रुटि हो भने हामी यो निःशुल्क साटी दिनेछौं।

English: Sure. Here is my bank statement.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Yeha cha mero bank bibaran.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य। यहाँ छ मेरो बैंक विवरण।

English: I decorated this new garden outside my house with so much excitement.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yo naya bagaicha dherai utsaha ka saath sajayeko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यो नयाँ बगैंचा धेरै उत्साहका साथ सजाएको थिएँ।

English: Now I can’t even water my plants.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba ma mero botma paani samet dina sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): अब म मेरो बोटमा पानी समेत दिन सक्दिन।

English: You either exchange it or return my money.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai ki ta yo satidinuhos ki mero paisa firta garnu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं कि त यो साटिदिनुहोस् कि मेरो पैसा फिर्ता गर्नुहोस्।

English: There! I see a crack in the inner layer of this pipe and it is a very big one !
Nepali (Romanized): Yi yeta! Maile yes pipeko bhitri taha ma chira pareko dekhe ra yo ekdum thulo cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यी यता! मैले यस पाइपको भित्री तहमा चिरा परेको देखें र यो एकदम ठूलो छ।

English: No wonder why it was leaking.
Nepali (Romanized): Kunai ascharya chhaina kina yo chuhiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): कुनै आश्चर्य छैन किन यो चुहियो।

Nepali (Romanized): Spasta rupma yo nirmaan karta ko galti ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): स्पष्ट रूपमा यो निर्माण कर्ताको गल्ती हो।

English: Do you want a replacement or your money back?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile arko samaan chahincha wa tapaiko paisa firta garidiu?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंलाई अर्को सामान चाहिन्छ वा तपाईंको पैसा फिर्ता गरिदिउँ?

column5: त्यसोभए ठिक छ।

English: I had already told you so in the beginning .
Nepali (Romanized): Maile shuruwat mai tapailai bhaneko thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले सुरुवात मै तपाईंलाई भनेको थिएँ।

English: Now give me hose from a different brand because I don’t want it to happen again.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba malai farak brand ko paaep dinuhos kinabhane ma pheri esto bhayeko herna chahanna.
Nepali (Devanagari): अब मलाई फरक ब्रान्डको पाइप दिनुहोस् किनभने म फेरि यस्तो भएको हेर्न चाहन्न।

English: Sure! I can do that too but you need to be aware that if the price exceeds you may have to bridge the gap after which we can adjust.
Nepali (Romanized): Nischit rupma! Ma tyo pani garnu sakchhu tara tapai sachet hunupardachha ki yadi mulya badi bhayo bhane tapaile mulya antar tirnu parcha jaspaschat hami samayojit garna sakdachhau.
Nepali (Devanagari): निश्चित रूपमा! म त्यो पनि गर्न सक्छु तर तपाईं सचेत हुनुपर्दछ कि यदि मूल्य बढी भयो भने तपाईंले मूल्य अन्तर तिर्नुपर्छ जसपश्चात हामी समायोजित गर्न सक्दछौं।

column5: त्यो समस्या भएन।

English: According to you which brand should I buy? Which one is the best quality hose?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko anusar maile kun brand kinnu parchha? Sabai bhanda gunastariya paaep kun ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको अनुसार मैले कुन ब्रान्ड किन्नु पर्छ? सबै भन्दा गुणस्तरीय पाइप कुन हो?

English: I suggest buying the Greenacre hose.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai Greenacre paaep kinna sujhav dinchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई ग्रीनएकर पाइप किन्न सुझाव दिन्छु।

English: The product is very durable and has a retractable & non-tangling cord.
Nepali (Romanized): Saaman dherai tikau chha ra yesma swata: bhitra tanine ra na-aljhine dori cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सामान धेरै टिकाउ छ र यसमा स्वतः भित्र तानिने र नअल्झिने डोरी छ।

English: It's just a few more dollars extra.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo kebal kehi dollar badi parna jancha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो केवल केही डलर बढी पर्न जान्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): Bhitra tanna Milne / Firta lina yogya
Nepali (Devanagari): भित्र तान्न मिल्ने / फिर्ता लिन योग्य

English: Good Morning! How are you today and how can I help you?
Nepali (Romanized): Subha-prabhat! Tapailai aaja kasto chha ani ma tapailai kasari madat garna sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ-प्रभात! तपाईंलाई आज कस्तो छ अनि म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hello doctor! My name is Priya.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste dactar! Mero naam Priya ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते डाक्टर! मेरो नाम प्रिया हो।

English: I just delivered my baby and I am here to know about the vaccination process for my baby.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile mero bacchaa lai bharkharai janma diyeki hoon ra ma yaha mero bacchaa lai khop dine prakriyako bare ma jaana aayeki hoon.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले मेरो बच्चालाई भर्खरै जन्म दिएकी हुँ र म यहाँ मेरो बच्चालाई खोप दिने प्रक्रियाको बारेमा जान्न आएकी हुँ।

English: Congratulations! How is your baby? Is it a boy or a girl?
Nepali (Romanized): Badhai chha Tapaiko bacchaa lai kasto chha? Chhora bhayo ki chhori bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): बधाई छ। तपाईंको बच्चालाई कस्तो छ? छोरा भयो कि छोरी भयो?

English: Thank you. She is a girl and she is 1 week old.
Nepali (Romanized): Dhanyabaad Chhori ho ra oo 1 hapta ko bhayi.
Nepali (Devanagari): धन्यवाद। छोरी हो र उ १ हप्ताको भई।

English: I have heard from my friend that every child has to undergo an immunisation process. Is that right?
Nepali (Romanized): Maile mero mitra bata suneko thiye ki harek bachale pratirakshya prakriya pura garnu parcha K tyo sahi ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले मेरो मित्रबाट सुनेको थिएँ कि हरेक बच्चाले प्रतिरक्षा प्रक्रिया पूरा गर्नुपर्छ। के त्यो सही हो?

column5: त्यो सही हो।

English: In Australia babies are immunised to build a stronger immune system against serious health diseases like chickenpox hepatitis B measles and meningococcal disease.
Nepali (Romanized): Australia maa bacchaaharulai pratirakshit garinchha taaki uniharuko theula hepatitis B dadura meningococcal jasta gambhir rog biruddha pratirakchyya pranali baliyo hos.
column5: बच्चाहरूलाई प्रतिरक्षित गरिन्छ ताकि उनीहरूको ठेउला
column6: हेपाटाइटिस बी
column8: मेनिन्गोकोकल जस्ता गम्भीर रोग विरुद्ध प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली बलियो होस्।

English: Alright I didn’t have any idea about it. Thank you for the information.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha malai ta esko baremaa kehi thaha nai thiyena Jankariko lagi dhanyabaad.
column5: मलाई त यसको बारेमा केही थाहा नै थिएन। जानकारीको लागि धन्यवाद।

English: How much do I need to pay for the vaccines? And can I go to any place near my house?
Nepali (Romanized): Maile khopharuko lagi kati tirnu parchha? Ra K ma mero ghar najikko kunai thaumaa jaana sakchhu?
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले खोपहरूको लागि कति तिर्नुपर्छ? र के म मेरो घर नजिकको कुनै ठाउँमा जान सक्छु?

English: Vaccines are funded by the government under the Department of Health’s National Immunisation Program.
Nepali (Romanized): Swasthya Bibhagko Rashtriya Pratirakshya Karyakram antargat sarkar dwara khopharu bitta poshit gariyeko chha.
Nepali (Devanagari): स्वास्थ्य विभागको राष्ट्रिय प्रतिरक्षा कार्यक्रम अन्तर्गत सरकारद्वारा खोपहरू वित्त पोषित गरिएको छ।

English: Immunisations are provided by your doctor immunisation clinics local councils community health nurses and some hospitals.
Nepali (Romanized): Khop tapaiko dactar / chikitsak khop dine rugnachikitshalaya sthaniya parishad samudayik swasthya parichaarika ra kehi chikitshalayaharu ley pradan gardacha.
column5: खोप दिने रुग्णचिकित्सालय
column6: स्थानीय परिषद
column7: सामुदायिक स्वास्थ्य परिचारिका र केही चिकित्सालयहरूले प्रदान गर्दछ।

English: That’s great! The Australian government takes good care of its citizens and their health.
Nepali (Romanized): Dherai ramro! Australiyali sarkar le afno nagarik ra uniharuko swasthya ko ramrari herchaahaa gardacha.
Nepali (Devanagari): धेरै राम्रो! अष्ट्रेलियाली सरकारले आफ्नो नागरिक र उनीहरूको स्वास्थ्यको राम्ररी हेरचाह गर्दछ।

English: I was stressed about how to pay for it as I am unemployed and my husband is a part-time worker in a bakery.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma berojgaar ra mero shrimaan bakeryma amsikkalin karmachari hunale yesko paisa kasari tirne hola bhanne bishayama chintit thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): म बेरोजगार र मेरो श्रीमान् बेकरीमा आंशिककालीन कर्मचारी हुनाले यसको पैसा कसरी तिर्ने होला भन्ने विषयमा चिन्तित थिएँ।

English: Hmm. I recommend going with the immunisation process soon to immune your kid against infectious diseases.
Nepali (Romanized): Hmm Ma tapailai pratirakhshya prakriya chittai garauna sallah dinchu afno bachha lai sankramak rogharu bata bachaauna.
Nepali (Devanagari): हम्। म तपाईंलाई प्रतिरक्षा प्रक्रिया छिट्टै गराउन सल्लाह दिन्छु आफ्नो बच्चालाई संक्रामक रोगहरूबाट बचाउन।

English: Bear in mind that it generally takes about 2 weeks after the vaccination for the immune system to respond fully.
Nepali (Romanized): Dhyan dinuhos ki samaanyataya pratirakhshya pranali le purna pratikriya dinako lagi lagbhag 2 hapta lagchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ध्यान दिनुहोस् कि सामान्यतया प्रतिरक्षा प्रणालीले पूर्ण प्रतिक्रिया दिनको लागि लगभग २ हप्ता लाग्छ।

column5: म त्यो गर्छु।

English: How would I know when to give her the shots/vaccines?
Nepali (Romanized): Uslai kahile khop dinu parchha bhanera malai kasari thahahunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): उसलाई कहिले खोप दिनुपर्छ भनेर मलाई कसरी थाहा हुन्छ?

English: Either you can ask your doctor or you can find the immunisation schedule at the Department of Health’s website under the name National Immunisation Program Schedule.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile tapaiko dactarlai sodhna saknu hunchha athawa Swasthya Bibhagko websitemaa gayi Rashtriya Pratirakhshya Karyakram Talika antargat raheko pratirakhsya taalika prapta garna saknu hunchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले तपाईंको डाक्टरलाई सोध्न सक्नुहुन्छ अथवा स्वास्थ्य विभागको वेबसाइटमा गई राष्ट्रिय प्रतिरक्षा कार्यक्रम तालिका अन्तर्गत रहेको प्रतिरक्षा तालिका प्राप्त गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Thank you so much doctor. I’ll check it myself.
Nepali (Romanized): Dherai dherai dhanyabaad dactar Ma afai herchhu.
Nepali (Devanagari): धेरै धेरै धन्यवाद डाक्टर। म आफै हेर्छु।

English: Alright have a nice day! See you again..
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha tapaiko din shubha rahos Feri bhetaula.
column5: तपाईंको दिन शुभ रहोस्। फेरि भेटौंला।

English: Department of Health’s National Immunisation Program
Hello doctor! My name is Nitisha.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste Doctor sahab Mero naam Nitisha ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते डाक्टर साब। मेरो नाम नितिशा हो।

English: This is my dog German. He is not well.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo mero Kukkur German ho Uslai sanchho chhaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो मेरो कुकुर जर्मन हो। उसलाई सञ्चो छैन।

English: Alright Let me check what has happened.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha Malai k bhayeko raicha herna dinuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ। मलाई के भएको रहेछ हेर्न दिनुहोस्।

English: He seems very dull and lazy.
Nepali (Romanized): Oo ekdum susht ra alchhi dekhinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ऊ एकदम सुस्त र अल्छी देखिन्छ।

English: Is he behaving like this all the time?
Nepali (Romanized): K oo sadhai estai byawahar gari rahanchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के ऊ सधैं यस्तै व्यवहार गरिरहन्छ?

English: He also seems to struggle for breath.
Nepali (Romanized): Uslai saas pherna pani apthyaro bhairaheko dekhinchha.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसलाई सास फेर्न पनि अप्ठ्यारो भइरहेको देखिन्छ।

English: It has been almost a month that he has been like this.
Nepali (Romanized): Uslai esto bhayeko karib ek mahina bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसलाई यस्तो भएको करिब एक महिना भयो।

English: He is not eating anything I serve him with his favorite meals but he does not eat anything.
Nepali (Romanized): Usle kehi pani khairaheko chhaina Maile usko mannparne bhojan paskinchhu tara usle kehi pani khandaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसले केही पनि खाइरहेको छैन। मैले उसको मनपर्ने भोजन पस्किन्छु तर उसले केही पनि खाँदैन।

English: He used to love food before.
Nepali (Romanized): Pahile pahile uslai khana bhanepaxi asaadhai manparthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): पहिले पहिले उसलाई खाना भनेपछि असाध्यै मनपर्थ्यो।

English: Okay Ms. Nitisha you are saying that he doesn’t eat properly but he is overweight.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik chha Sushri Nitisha tapai bhandai hunuhuncha ki usle ramrari khadaina tara usko taul dherai chha.
column5: तपाईं भन्दै हुनुहुन्छ कि उसले राम्ररी खाँदैन तर उसको तौल धेरै छ।

English: That’s why he is lazy and dull.
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhayera oo alchhi ra susht bhayeko ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यही भएर ऊ अल्छी र सुस्त भएको हो।

English: What type of food are you feeding him?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile uslai kasto kisim ko bhojan khwaudai hunu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले उसलाई कस्तो किसिमको भोजन खुवाउँदै हुनुहुन्छ?

English: Doctor I love my dog and he is the only family I have.
Nepali (Romanized): Dactor ma mero kukur lai maya garchu ra u mero ek matra pariwar ho.
column5: म मेरो कुकुरलाई माया गर्छु र ऊ मेरो एक मात्र परिवार हो।

English: He liked sweet and sugary food and I couldn’t resist but buying him whatever he wants.
Nepali (Romanized): Usle mitho ra guliyo khanekura mann parauthyo ra usko lagi mann parne khana kinna bata ma afulai rokna sakdinathiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसले मिठो र गुलियो खानेकुरा मन पराउँथ्यो र उसको लागि मन पर्ने खाना किन्नबाट म आफूलाई रोक्न सक्दिनथिएँ।

English: Ms. Nitisha if you keep treating him with sugary foods he will end up having a lot of health issues such as obesity stomach infection behavioural problems heart disease and gastric problems.
Nepali (Romanized): Shusri Nitisha yedi tapai uslai esai gari guliyo khana dirakhnu bhayo vane uslai motopan petma sankraman beybahaarma samasyaharu mutuko rog gastrikko samasya jasta dherai gambhir swastha sambandhi samasyaharu huna sakchan.
column5: यदि तपाईं उसलाई यसै गरी गुलियो खाना दिइराख्नु भयो भने
column6: उसलाई मोटोपन
column10: ग्यास्ट्रिकको समस्या जस्ता धेरै गम्भीर स्वास्थ्य सम्बन्धी समस्याहरू हुन सक्छन्।

English: I cannot say No to my dog but I have to take care of him.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero kukurlai naai vanna sakdina tara maile usko dhyan rakhnu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो कुकुरलाई नाई भन्न सक्दिन तर मैले उसको ध्यान राख्नुपर्छ।

English: I want him to be physically active and fit like before.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma uslai pahile jastai saririk rupma sakriya ra tandarust hos vanne chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म उसलाई पहिले जस्तै शारीरिक रूपमा सक्रिय र तन्दुरुस्त होस् भन्ने चाहन्छु।

Nepali (Romanized): K tapai uslai sahayog garna saknu hunchha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं उसलाई सहयोग गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Yes I can certainly help you with that.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya ma tapailai nischit rupma sahayog garna sakchu.
column5: म तपाईंलाई निश्चित रूपमा सहयोग गर्न सक्छु।

English: I became a veterinary doctor because of my love and attachment towards animals.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pasu chikitshak bannu ko karan nai mero janawarharu pratiko maya ra lagav ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): म पशु चिकित्सक बन्नुको कारण नै मेरो जनावरहरूप्रतिको माया र लगाव हो।

English: Leave him at my center and come back after two weeks.
Nepali (Romanized): Uslai mero kendra ma chodera januhos ra dui hapta pachi farkera aunu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसलाई मेरो केन्द्रमा छोडेर जानुहोस् र दुई हप्ता पछि फर्केर आउनुहोस्।

English: At your center! Are you kidding me?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko kendra ma? K tapai majak gardai hunuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको केन्द्रमा? के तपाईं मजाक गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ?

English: I cannot stay away from my dog for even a minute.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ek minute pani mero kukur bata tadha basna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): म एक मिनेट पनि मेरो कुकुरबाट टाढा बस्न सक्दिन।

English: This is the reason I have started working from home.
Nepali (Romanized): Yehi karan ho jasle garda maile gharbata kaam garna thaleki hu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यही कारण हो जसले गर्दा मैले घरबाट काम गर्न थालेकी हुँ।

English: I understand your attachment towards your dog.
However if you want to see him healthy and happy again you need to be emotionally strong.
Nepali (Romanized): Tathapi tapaile uslai feri swastha ra khusi vayeko herna chahanu huncha vane tapai bhawanaatmak rupma baliyo hunu aabasek cha.
column5: तपाईंले उसलाई फेरि स्वस्थ र खुसी भएको हेर्न चाहनुहुन्छ भने तपाईं भावनात्मक रूपमा बलियो हुनु आवश्यक छ।

English: It is hard but I am leaving him with love.
Nepali (Romanized): Garo cha tara ma uslai prempurbak choddai chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): गाह्रो छ तर म उसलाई प्रेमपूर्वक छोड्दै छु।

Nepali (Romanized): Pakkai pani yo mero kaam ho.
column5: यो मेरो काम हो।

English: Come and see him after two weeks He will be fine.
Nepali (Romanized): Uslai dui hapta pachi ayera hernu hos Oo thik hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): उसलाई दुई हप्ता पछि आएर हेर्नुहोस्। ऊ ठिक हुनेछ।

English: Hi there! My name is Simone! Please take a seat.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste! Mero naam Simone ho Kripaya basnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते! मेरो नाम सिमोन हो। कृपया बस्नुहोस्।

English: So what seems to be the problem today ?
Actually doctor yesterday I went to a restaurant with my friend.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma daactar hijo ma mero saathi sanga euta bhojanalaya gaye.
column5: हिजो म मेरो साथीसँग एउटा भोजनालय गएँ।

English: I ate a lot as I couldn’t resist such delicious food.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile dherai khaye kinaki maile testo swadista khana ko pratirodh garna sakina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले धेरै खाएँ किनकि मैले त्यस्तो स्वादिष्ट खानाको प्रतिरोध गर्न सकिन।

Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha tes khana ma kehi gadbadi thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ त्यस खानामा केही गडबडी थियो।

English: Since I came home I have not been feeling well.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai ghar farkedekhi sancho bhaeko chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई घर फर्केदेखि सन्चो भएको छैन।

English: Did you experience any symptoms such as stomach ache fever or vomiting?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile pet dukhne jwaro wa banta jasta kunai lakshyan haru anubhav garnu bhayo?
column5: ज्वरो वा बान्ता जस्ता कुनै लक्षणहरू अनुभव गर्नुभयो?

English: I didn’t vomit but I couldn’t sleep.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile banta garina tara ma sutna sakina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले बान्ता गरिन तर म सुत्न सकिन।

English: I kept tossing and turning in my bed.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ochyaan ma paltine ra farkine matrai gardai thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): म ओछ्यानमा पल्टिने र फर्किने मात्रै गर्दै थिएँ।

English: In the morning my body felt really weak.
Nepali (Romanized): Bihana mero sharir nikai kamjor mahasoos bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): बिहान मेरो शरीर निकै कमजोर महसुस भयो।

English: The whole body was in pain.
I suspect it could be food poisoning or it could just be because you haven't had your bowel movement properly.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai sanka cha ki yo khana bishaaktataa huna sakcha wa yo disha ramrari nabhaeko le pani huna sakcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई शंका छ कि यो खाना विषाक्तता हुन सक्छ वा यो दिशा राम्ररी नभएकोले पनि हुन सक्छ।

English: You are right doctor since last week I have been struggling with constipation.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai sahi hunu huncha daactar Gata hapta dekhi ma kabjet ko saath sangharsha gardai chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं सही हुनुहुन्छ डाक्टर। गत हप्ता देखि म कब्जियतको साथ संघर्ष गर्दैछु।

English: I didn’t know that even these things could happen because of constipation.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai thaha thiyena kabjet ko karan yesto pani huna sakcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई थाहा थिएन कब्जियतको कारण यस्तो पनि हुन सक्छ।

English: Yes! Not many people are aware of the consequences of constipation.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho! Kabjetka parinamharuka bare dherai maanishlai thaha chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): हो! कब्जियतका परिणामहरूका बारे धेरै मानिसलाई थाहा छैन।

English: Now tell me in the last 3 days how often have you been going to the toilet?
Nepali (Romanized): Aba bhannuhos bigat 3 dinma tapai kati choti sauchalaya janu bhayo?
column5: विगत ३ दिनमा तपाईं कति चोटी शौचालय जानुभयो?

English: I do go to the toilet a number of times but it seems as if bowels are not getting empty.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma dherai patak sauchalaya janchu tara yesto dekhincha maanau pet khali nai hudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): म धेरै पटक शौचालय जान्छु तर यस्तो देखिन्छ मानौं पेट खाली नै हुँदैन।

English: Have you tried taking any over the counter medicines to deal with it?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile yeslai samadhan garna kunai pasalbata samanya aushadhi line prayas garnu bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले यसलाई समाधान गर्न कुनै पसलबाट सामान्य औषधि लिने प्रयास गर्नुभयो?

English: Yes actually I took medicine for loose motions from a chemist store.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho vastavma maile aushadhi pasal bata pakhaalako lagi ausadhi liyeko thiye.
column5: वास्तवमा मैले औषधि पसलबाट पखालाको लागि औषधि लिएको थिएँ।

English: I don’t know the name but the bottle had a green sticker on it and although it had chocolate flavour it tasted really bitter.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai naam thaha chaina tara bottal ma hariyo sticker thiyo ani tyesko swad chaklet ko bhaye pani tyo atti tito thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई नाम थाहा छैन तर बोतलमा हरियो स्टिकर थियो अनि त्यसको स्वाद चकलेटको भए पनि
column5: त्यो अति तितो थियो।

English: I think I know the brand you're talking about.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha ki malai thaha cha tapai kun brandko bare kura gardai hunu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कि मलाई थाहा छ तपाईं कुन ब्रान्डको बारे कुरा गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ।

English: I may have to prescribe something stronger to help you with this problem.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yes samasya sanga tapailai maddat garna ko lagi kehi kada aushadi tokidinu parne huna sakcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यस समस्या सँग तपाईंलाई मद्दत गर्नको लागि केही कडा औषधि तोकिदिनु पर्ने हुन सक्छ।

English: I just have a request doctor please give me something that will heal me quickly because I have already taken a week off from my work.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero kebal euta anurodh cha daactar kripaya malai kehi dinuhos jasle ma chadai niko hunasaku kinaki maile mero kaambata pahile nai ek hapta chutti lisakekichu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो केवल एउटा अनुरोध छ डाक्टर
column5: कृपया मलाई केही दिनुहोस् जसले म चाँडै निको हुन सकूँ किनकि मैले मेरो कामबाट पहिले नै एक हप्ता बिदा लिइसकेकी छु।

English: Alright! The one that I've written is very strong and normally people feel fine after the 1st dose but you can take another one if need be.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha! Jun maile tokidiyeko chu tyo dherai kada cha ra samanyataya ma manis haru le pahilo dose pachi nai ramro mahasoos garchan tara yadi awashyak parema tapaile arko euta lina saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ! जुन मैले तोकिदिएको छु त्यो धेरै कडा छ र सामान्यतया मानिसहरूले पहिलो डोज पछि नै राम्रो महसुस गर्छन् तर यदि आवश्यक परेमा तपाईंले अर्को एउटा लिन सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: I am from the Australian Fire and Emergency Services Authority.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Australiyali Aaglagi ra Aakasmik Sewa Praadhikaran bata hu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म अष्ट्रेलियाली आगलागी र आकस्मिक सेवा प्राधिकरणबाट हुँ।

English: Actually I wanted to talk about ‘Fire Ed’ for your school.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma tapaiko bidhyalayako lagi ma tapaisanga ‘Fire Ed’ ko bare kura garna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): वास्तवमा तपाईंको विद्यालयको लागि म तपाईंसँग ‘फायर एड’ को बारेमा कुरा गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: Good morning! Thank you for taking this initiative forward.
Nepali (Romanized): Subha Prabhat! Yesko pahal garnu bhayeko ma dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ प्रभात! यसको पहल गर्नु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: I am proud that our school students will have a strong foundation and they will be able to contribute to the society.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma garba garchu ki hamro bidhyalayaka bidhyarthiharule euta baliyo aadhar paunechan ra samaaj ma yogdaan dina sakshyam hunechan.
Nepali (Devanagari): म गर्व गर्छु कि हाम्रो विद्यालयका विद्यार्थीहरूले एउटा बलियो आधार पाउनेछन् र समाजमा योगदान दिन सक्षम हुनेछन्।

English: Glad to know that! Basically this program prepares Primary School Children for fire safety guidelines meaning they will learn what to do in case of an emergency.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo thaha payera khusi lagyo Aba mulata: yo karyakram le Prathamik Bidhyalaya ka bachaharulai aaglaagi bata bachne nirdeshan ka lagi tayari garaudacha matlab uniharule aapatkaalin awasthama k garnu parcha bhanera sikdacha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो थाहा पाएर खुसी लाग्यो। अब मूलतः यो कार्यक्रमले प्राथमिक विद्यालयका बच्चाहरूलाई आगलागीबाट बच्ने निर्देशनका लागि तयारी गराउँदछ मतलब उनीहरूले आपतकालीन अवस्थामा के गर्नुपर्छ भनेर सिक्दछ।

English: How can we help you with this? I mean do you need any equipment from us?
Nepali (Romanized): Hami tapailai yesma kasari maddat garna sakchau? Mero matlab tapailai hami bata kehi upakaranharu chaincha ki?
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी तपाईंलाई यसमा कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छौं? मेरो मतलब तपाईंलाई हामीबाट केही उपकरणहरू चाहिन्छ कि?

English: And how long is this course?
Nepali (Romanized): Ra yo pathyakram kati lamo huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): र यो पाठ्यक्रम कति लामो हुन्छ?

English: Thanks but you don’t have to provide us anything.
Nepali (Romanized): Dhanyabad Haina tapaile hamilai kehi pradaan garnu pardaina.
column5: तपाईंले हामीलाई केही प्रदान गर्नु पर्दैन।

English: We will arrange whatever is needed and this will be conducted over two school visits along with a take-home work for families.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami chahine sabai byawastha garnechau ra yo duiwota bidhyalaya bhramanharu bhitra sanchalan huncha pariwarharuka lagi euta grihakarya sahit.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी चाहिने सबै व्यवस्था गर्नेछौं र यो दुईवटा विद्यालय भ्रमणहरू भित्र सञ्चालन हुन्छ परिवारहरूका लागि एउटा गृहकार्य सहित।

English: Ok! I will get the notice sent to the children’s homes today itself.
Nepali (Romanized): Huncha Ma bachaharuka gharharuma aja nai suchana pathauna lagauchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हुन्छ। म बच्चाहरूका घरहरूमा आज नै सूचना पठाउन लगाउँछु।

English: One more thing some of our children are mentally challenged.
Nepali (Romanized): Arko euta kura hamra kehi bachaharu manasik rupma asakta chan.
column5: हाम्रा केही बच्चाहरू मानसिक रूपमा अशक्त छन्।

English: Can there be some special arrangements for them?
Nepali (Romanized): K uniharuka lagi kei bishesh byawasthapan garna sakincha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के उनीहरूका लागि केही विशेष व्यवस्थापन गर्न सकिन्छ?

English: Sure! Variations of two programs are delivered to children with special needs and children who are new to Australia.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Dui kisim ka bhinna karyakramharu pani pradan garincha bishesh awashyakta bhaeka bachaharu ka lagi ani ti bachaharuka lagi jo Australia ma naya chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य। दुई किसिमका भिन्न कार्यक्रमहरू पनि प्रदान गरिन्छ विशेष आवश्यकता भएका बच्चाहरूका लागि अनि ती बच्चाहरूका लागि जो अष्ट्रेलियामा नयाँ छन्।

English: Will this training be provided only verbally or will there be a practical aspect too?
Nepali (Romanized): K yo prashikshan maukhik rupma pradaan garincha wa yesma byawaharik pakshya pani hunecha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के यो प्रशिक्षण मौखिक रूपमा प्रदान गरिन्छ वा यसमा व्यावहारिक पक्ष पनि हुनेछ?

English: Will they need to plan a trip? We will have to arrange accordingly.
Nepali (Romanized): K uniharule yatra ko yojana banaunu parnecha? Hamile tesai anusar prabanda garnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): के उनीहरूले यात्राको योजना बनाउनुपर्नेछ? हामीले त्यसै अनुसार प्रबन्ध गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

English: No they won’t have to step out of the school.
Nepali (Romanized): Haina uniharu bidhyalaya bahira janu pardaina.
column5: उनीहरू विद्यालय बाहिर जानुपर्दैन।

English: We use a variety of resources including DVDs and posters and we believe they learn better when they see something.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami bibid shrotharu prayog gardachau jasma DVD ra bigyapan patra samawesh garincha ra hami biswas garchau ki jaba uniharule kehi dekhchan uniharule ajha badi sikdachan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी विविध स्रोतहरू प्रयोग गर्दछौं जसमा डीभीडी र विज्ञापन पत्र समावेश गरिन्छ
column5: र हामी विश्वास गर्छौं कि जब उनीहरूले केही देख्छन्
column6: उनीहरूले अझ बढी सिक्दछन्।

English: Will we need to pay something for this?
Nepali (Romanized): K hamile yesko lagi kehi sulka tirnu parcha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के हामीले यसको लागि केही शुल्क तिर्नुपर्छ?

English: No as this is sponsored by the government we do not charge for this program.
Nepali (Romanized): Pardaina Yo sarkardwara prayojit bhaekole hamile yes karyakramko lagi kehi sulka lidainau.
Nepali (Devanagari): पर्दैन। यो सरकारद्वारा प्रायोजित भएकोले हामीले यस कार्यक्रमको लागि केही शुल्क लिँदैनौं।

English: This is issued in public interest.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo janahit ka lagi jaari gariyeko ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो जनहितका लागि जारी गरिएको हो।

English: For further information please contact Community Resilience Department on 02 9665 4463.
Nepali (Romanized): Thap jankarika lagi kripaya samudayik lachilopan bibhag 02 9665 4463 ma samparka garnu hola.
column5: कृपया सामुदायिक लचिलोपन विभाग ०२ ९६६५ ४४६३ मा सम्पर्क गर्नु होला।

English: Births Deaths and Marriages New South Wales.
Nepali (Romanized): Janma Mirtyu ra Bibhaha New South Wales.
column5: मृत्यु र विवाह न्यू साउथ वेल्स।

English: I am Caroline! How can I help you?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Caroline hu! Ma tapailai kasari madat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म क्यारोलिन हुँ! म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: I want to ask you that if I want to register my marriage in NSW what would be the procedure for that?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai sodhna chahanchu ki yedi maile NSWma mero bibaha darta garna chahema tesko prakriya k huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई सोध्न चाहन्छु कि यदि मैले NSW मा मेरो विवाह दर्ता गर्न चाहेमा त्यसको प्रक्रिया के हुन्छ?

English: To get married and register your marriage you need to meet the eligibility requirements lodge a legal notice of intended marriage and also have 2 witnesses attend your ceremony.
Nepali (Romanized): Bibaha garna ra afno bibaha darta garna tapaile yogyata abashektaharu pura garnu pardacha icchyayiyeko bibhahako kanuni suchana darta garnupardacha ra 2jana sakchiharu pani tapaiko samharoma upastit hunu parnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): विवाह गर्न र आफ्नो विवाह दर्ता गर्न
column5: तपाईंले योग्यता आवश्यकताहरू पूरा गर्नु पर्दछ
column6: इच्छाइएको विवाहको कानुनी सूचना दर्ता गर्नुपर्दछ र २ जना साक्षीहरू पनि तपाईंको समारोहमा उपस्थित हुनु पर्नेछ।

Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha yo dherai jatil dekincha.
column5: यो धेरै जटिल देखिन्छ।

English: What do you mean by eligibility requirements?
It basically means you should be 18 years old or above.
Nepali (Romanized): Adharbhut rupma yesko matlab tapai 18 barsha wa mathiko hunu parcha.
column5: यसको मतलब तपाईं १८ वर्ष वा माथिको हुनुपर्छ।

English: You can’t be married to someone already or can’t marry a close relative like father mother or siblings.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko pahile nai kasaisanga bibaha bhaeko hunu hunna wa buwa ama wa bhaibhainiharu jasta najikka naatedaarsanga bibaha garna saknuhunna.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको पहिले नै कसैसँग विवाह भएको हुनुहुन्न वा बुवा
column5: आमा वा भाइबहिनीहरू जस्ता नजिकका नातेदारसँग विवाह गर्न सक्नुहुन्न।

English: You were talking about lodging a notice of intended marriage.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile icchyayiyeko bibaha ko suchana darta garne bisaya ma bhandai hunu hunthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले इच्छाइएको विवाहको सूचना दर्ता गर्ने विषयमा भन्दै हुनुहुन्थ्यो।

Nepali (Romanized): K ma tyo jati bela pani garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): के म त्यो जति बेला पनि गर्न सक्छु?

English: It has to be lodged at least one month before your wedding date.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo tapaiko bibahako miti vanda kamtima ek mahina pahile darta hunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो तपाईंको विवाहको मिति भन्दा कम्तिमा एक महिना पहिले दर्ता हुनुपर्छ।

English: Can we have a grand celebration during the wedding or not?
Nepali (Romanized): K hami yo bibaha dhumdhaam sanga garna sakchau wa sakdainau?
Nepali (Devanagari): के हामी यो विवाह धूमधाम सँग गर्न सक्छौं वा सक्दैनौं?

English: Because in Nepal a marriage is considered incomplete without the boisterous environment.
Nepali (Romanized): Kinavane Nepalma jaba samma dhumdham sanga bibaha garidaina tyo bibaha nai manindaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): किनभने नेपालमा जबसम्म धूमधाम सँग विवाह गरिँदैन त्यो विवाह नै मानिँदैन।

English: The style and length of the ceremony are entirely up to you.
Nepali (Romanized): Samarohako shaili ra lambai purai tapaima nirvar gardacha.
Nepali (Devanagari): समारोहको शैली र लम्बाई पूरै तपाईंमा निर्भर गर्दछ।

English: It could be a simple ceremony that includes only the legal requirements or if you want you can have a longer ceremony.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo sadharan samaroha huna sakcha jasma kanuni abashektahru matra samabesh gariyeko huncha wa yedi tapai chahanchu huncha vane tapai ek lamo samaroha garna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो साधारण समारोह हुन सक्छ जसमा कानुनी आवश्यकताहरू मात्र समावेश गरिएको हुन्छ वा यदि तपाईं चाहनुहुन्छ भने तपाईं एक लामो समारोह गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Okay how much would be the total cost of this?
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha yesko kul rakam kati hunecha?
column5: यसको कुल रकम कति हुनेछ?

English: And the witnesses that will come for the ceremony can they only be the family members or someone else can also be a witness?
Nepali (Romanized): Ra samharoko lagi aune sakshiharu kewal pariwarka sadasyaharu hunu parcha wa aru kohi pani huna sakchan?
Nepali (Devanagari): र समारोहको लागि आउने साक्षीहरू केवल परिवारका सदस्यहरू हुनुपर्छ वा अरु कोही पनि हुन सक्छन्?

English: It will be about $33 excluding postage.
Your witnesses will sign the marriage certificates and witness the ceremony.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko sakshiharule bibaha pramanpatrama hastacher garnechan ra samrohako sakshi hunechan.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंका साक्षीहरूले विवाह प्रमाणपत्रमा हस्ताक्षर गर्नेछन् र समारोहको साक्षी हुनेछन्।

English: They can be either a family member or a friend who is at least 18 years old.
Nepali (Romanized): Uniharu pariwarka sadasya wa sathi huna sakchan jo kamtima 18 barsha pugeko hunu pardacha.
