Nepali (Devanagari): उनीहरू परिवारका सदस्य वा साथी हुन सक्छन् जो कम्तिमा १८ वर्ष पुगेको हुनुपर्दछ।

English: What will happen after the formalities of the wedding ceremony are over?
Nepali (Romanized): Bibaha samharoko aupacharikta samapta vayepachi k huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): विवाह समारोहको औपचारिकता समाप्त भएपछि के हुन्छ?

English: How can I get the certificate?
Once it is registered you can apply for a standard marriage certificate which takes about 4 weeks.
Nepali (Romanized): Ek patak yo darta vaisakepachi tapaile maanak bibaha parman-patrako lagi abedan dina saknuhuncha jasko lagi lagvag 4 hafta lagcha.
column5: तपाईंले मानक विवाह प्रमाण-पत्रको लागि आवेदन दिन सक्नुहुन्छ
column6: जसको लागि लगभग ४ हप्ता लाग्छ।

English: Good Morning! Thank you for calling Anusha’s marriage bureau.
Nepali (Romanized): Subha Prabhat! Anusha ko Marriage Bureau ma samparka garnu bhaeko ma dhanyabad.
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ प्रभात! अनुषाको म्यारिज ब्यूरोमा सम्पर्क गर्नु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: This is Rachael here. How can I help you?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Rachael hoon Ma tapailai kasari maddat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): म रचेल हुँ। म तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hello! Actually I have heard a lot about your marriage bureau.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste! Vastavma maile tapaiko bibaha karkayala ko barema dherai suneko chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते! वास्तवमा मैले तपाईंको विवाह कार्यालयको बारेमा धेरै सुनेको छु।

English: I am looking for a competent groom for my sister.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma meri bahiniko lagi ekjana yogya barko khojima chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरी बहिनीको लागि एकजना योग्य वरको खोजीमा छु।

English: We tried looking on our own and gave advertisements in the newspaper too but weren’t successful.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile afai khojne prayas garyau ra samachar patra ma bigyapanharu pani diyau tara safal bhayenau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले आफै खोज्ने प्रयास गर्यौं र समाचार पत्रमा विज्ञापनहरू पनि दियौं तर सफल भएनौं।

English: We will help you with that.
Our expert Ms. Merina will guide you and help you with all the possible options.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamra Bishesagya Sushri Merina le tapai margdarshan dinechan ra sabai sambhawit bikalpaharuka saath maddat garnechan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रा विशेषज्ञ सुश्री मेरिनाले तपाईंलाई मार्गदर्शन दिनेछन् र सबै सम्भावित विकल्पहरूका साथ मद्दत गर्नेछन्।

English: Let me forward your call to her.
Sure. I will stay on the call.
Ms. Merina you must already know that these are deceiving people.
Nepali (Romanized): Sushri Merina ji tapailai pahile nai thaha hunuparcha ki yiniharu chalkapat garne manishharu hun.
column5: तपाईंलाई पहिले नै थाहा हुनुपर्छ कि यिनीहरू छलकपट गर्ने मानिसहरू हुन्।

English: We couldn’t find someone trustworthy or heart-touching and now I am worried as she is getting older.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile kohi pani biswashilo wa mutu chune bhetayenau ani aba ma chintit chu kinaki meri bahini budi hudaiche.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले कोही पनि विश्वासिलो वा मुटु छुने भेटाएनौं अनि अब म चिन्तित छु किनकि मेरी बहिनी बुढी हुँदैछे।

English: There’s always a certain age to get married both for boys as well as girls.
Nepali (Romanized): Bibaha garnako lagi jahile pani euta nischit umer huncha dubai keta ani ketiko lagi.
Nepali (Devanagari): विवाह गर्नको लागि जहिले पनि एउटा निश्चित उमेर हुन्छ दुबै केटा अनि केटीको लागि।

English: Now how old is your sister and is she here in Australia or back in Nepal?
Nepali (Romanized): Aba tapaiko bahiniko umer kati ho ra k uha yeha Australia ma chin wa Nepal ma?
column5: तपाईंको बहिनीको उमेर कति हो र के उहाँ यहाँ अष्ट्रेलियामा छिन् वा नेपालमा?

English: My sister is 28 years old and she has a Master degree from Nepal.
Nepali (Romanized): Meri bahini 28 barsa bhayi ra unle Nepalbata Snatakotar garekichin.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरी बहिनी २८ वर्ष भई र उनले नेपालबाट स्नातकोत्तर गरेकीछिन्।

English: She is not only pretty but also well-educated and standing on her feet.
Nepali (Romanized): Uni sundar matra hainan sikshit ra afno khutta ma afai ubhiraheki chin.
column5: शिक्षित र आफ्नो खुट्टामा आफै उभिरहेकी छिन्।

English: We don’t have any problem with caste but the boy must be well-educated and also must have some property under his name.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamilai junai jaat hayepani aapati chaina tara keta sikshit ra usko naamma kehi sampatti hunuparcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीलाई जुनै जात भएपनि आपत्ति छैन तर केटा शिक्षित र उसको नाममा केही सम्पत्ति हुनुपर्छ।

English: I anticipate there won't be any problem at all to find a match.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile asha garei chu ki jodi vetna kunai samasya hunechaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले आशा गरेकी छु कि जोडी भेट्न कुनै समस्या हुनेछैन।

English: I have a few back in my mind already.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero dimagma pahile nai kehi mancheharu chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो दिमागमा पहिले नै केही मान्छेहरू छन्।

English: But one of them hasn’t got many acres of immovable property in Nepal.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara ti madhya ek jana sanga Nepalma achal sampatiko naamma dherai aekad sampatti chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर ती मध्ये एक जनासँग नेपालमा अचल सम्पत्तिको नाममा धेरै एकड सम्पत्ति छैन।

English: Please send me a list of potential candidates.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya malai sambhavit ummedvarharuko suchi pathaidinu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया मलाई सम्भावित उम्मेदवारहरूको सूची पठाइदिनुहोला।

English: And if possible please find one as early as possible because her visa is about to expire.
Nepali (Romanized): Ani yedi sambhav bhaye kripaya sakesamma ekjana chito fela parnuhos kinaki unko visako samayabadhi sakina lageko cha.
column5: कृपया सकेसम्म एकजना छिटो फेला पार्नुहोस् किनकि उनको भिसाको समयावधि सकिन लागेको छ।

English: Sure we can fasttrack the application.
Nepali (Romanized): Nischit hamile abedan druta marga bata agadi badhauna sakchau.
column5: हामीले आवेदन द्रुत मार्गबाट अगाडि बढाउन सक्छौं।

English: I will also need a clear photograph as well as the biodata along with her credentials.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai euta spasta tasbir chahincha sathai unka praman patraharu sahit bayaktiti bibaranko pani.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई एउटा स्पष्ट तस्बिर चाहिन्छ साथै उनका प्रमाण पत्रहरू सहित वैयक्तिक विवरणको पनि।

English: As soon as you email this the process will be started.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo email garna bitikai prakriya suru hunecha.
column5: प्रक्रिया सुरु हुनेछ।
धन्यवाद।

English: We charge $700 for a regular application which may take up to 6 months on average and $1000 for urgent matters.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami niyamit abedanko lagi $700 sulka linchau jasko lagi ausatma 6 mahinasamma lagna sakdacha ani atyawashyak kaamka lagi $1000 sulka lidachau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी नियमित आवेदनको लागि $७०० शुल्क लिन्छौं
column5: जसको लागि औसतमा ६ महिनासम्म लाग्न सक्दछ अनि अत्यावश्यक कामका लागि $१००० शुल्क लिन्छौं।

English: However we guarantee that we will create at least 6 to 7 potential options to consider within a month’s time.
Nepali (Romanized): Tadtapi hami jimma linchau ki hami ek mahina bhitrako samayama bichar garna kamtima 6 dekhi 7 sambhavit bikalpaharu dinchau.
column5: हामी जिम्मा लिन्छौं कि हामी एक महिना भित्रको समयमा विचार गर्न कम्तिमा ६ देखि ७ सम्भावित विकल्पहरू दिन्छौं।
म ज्योति हुँ।

English: I just wanted to get information about divorce.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sambandha bichhed ko bare jaankari lina chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म सम्बन्ध विच्छेदको बारे जानकारी लिन चाहन्छु।

English: What would you like to know?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapailai k thaha paunu man cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंलाई के थाहा पाउनु मन छ?

English: It would be easy for me to guide you if you elaborate your problem.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapailai margadarshan dina malai sajilo huncha yedi tapaile afno samasya bistaar garnu bhayo bhane.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंलाई मार्गदर्शन दिन मलाई सजिलो हुन्छ यदि तपाईंले आफ्नो समस्या विस्तार गर्नुभयो भने।

English: My husband and I are living together now.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ra mero sriman ahile sangai basiraheka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): म र मेरो श्रीमान् अहिले सँगै बसिरहेका छौं।

English: Both of us work as criminal lawyers.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami dubai jana aparadhik wakilko rupma kaam garchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी दुवै जना आपराधिक वकिलको रूपमा काम गर्छौं।

English: It’s become really hard to stay together.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamilai sangai basna garho bhayeko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीलाई सँगै बस्न गाह्रो भएको छ।

English: There’s not a day without a fight.
Nepali (Romanized): Jhagada nagari hamro ek din pani katdaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): झगडा नगरी हाम्रो एक दिन पनि कट्दैन।

English: This is very common in today’s world.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo ahile ko jamana ma dherai samanya cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो अहिलेको जमानामा धेरै सामान्य छ।

English: So you want to file a divorce right?
Nepali (Romanized): Teso bhae tapai sambandha biched ko lagi darta garna chahanu huncha ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसो भए तपाईं सम्बन्ध विच्छेदको लागि दर्ता गर्न चाहनुहुन्छ

English: Now I can’t stay with my husband for even a day.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aba mero shriman sanga ek din pani basna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): म अब मेरो श्रीमान् सँग एक दिन पनि बस्न सक्दिन।

English: I have to get out of this trap.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai yo daldal bata niskinu cha.

English: Because of this my other work has been affected.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesle garda mera aru kaam haru ma asar pareko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसले गर्दा मेरा अरु कामहरूमा असर परेको छ।

English: The only requirement for a divorce is the ‘irretrievable breakdown’ of the marriage.
Nepali (Romanized): Sambandha bichedko euta matrai awashyakta bhaneko biwaha najudne gari tutnu ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): सम्बन्ध विच्छेदको एउटा मात्रै आवश्यकता भनेको विवाह नजुड्ने गरी टुट्नु हो।

English: This is proved by the husband and wife having been separated for 12 months with no likelihood of getting back together.
Nepali (Romanized): Punha: saath basne sambhawana nabhai 12 mahina samma sriman ra srimati chutera basepaxi yo pramanit huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): पुनः साथ बस्ने सम्भावना नभई १२ महिना सम्म श्रीमान् र श्रीमती छुट्टिएर बसेपछि यो प्रमाणित हुन्छ।

English: But we can’t stay in a separate place because the house is under both our names.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara hami chutta chuttai basna sakdainau kinaki hamro ghar dubai jana ko naam ma cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर हामी छुट्टा छुट्टै बस्न सक्दैनौं किनकि हाम्रो घर दुबै जनाको नाममा छ।

English: Both of us invested equal amounts.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesma hami dubaile barabar lagaani gareka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसमा हामी दुबैले बराबर लगानी गरेका छौं।

English: It is possible to be separated but still live in the same house.
Nepali (Romanized): Eutai gharma basera pani chuttinu sambhav cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): एउटै घरमा बसेर पनि छुट्टिनु सम्भव छ।

English: For example you should no longer sleep in the same bed.
Nepali (Romanized): Udaharanko lagi tapai eutai khaatma sutnu hunna.
column5: तपाईं एउटै खाटमा सुत्नु हुन्न।

English: Additionally it means you cook and eat separately and clean up after yourself.
Nepali (Romanized): Thap yesko matlab tapai chuttai pakaune ra khane garnu huncha ani afai safaa garnu huncha.
column5: यसको मतलब तपाईं छुट्टै पकाउने र खाने गर्नुहुन्छ अनि आफै सफा गर्नुहुन्छ।

English: Yes it seems we are together only for the namesake.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho yesto dekhincha ki hami naamko lagi matra sangai chau.
column5: यस्तो देखिन्छ कि हामी नामको लागि मात्र सँगै छौं।

English: Our rooms and work are different.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro kotha ra kaam bhinna chan.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो कोठा र काम भिन्न छन्।

English: We even cook eat and wash separately.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami pakaune khane ra dhune pani chuttai garchau.
column5: खाने र धुने पनि छुट्टै गर्छौं।

English: Does your partner agree to the separation ?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaiko sajhedaarle chutne kura ma sahamati janaunu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंको साझेदारले छुट्टिने कुरामा सहमति जनाउनु हुन्छ?

English: Or will you file a sole application?
Nepali (Romanized): Ki tapaile ekal aabedan darta garnuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): कि तपाईंले एकल आवेदन दर्ता गर्नुहुन्छ?

English: Yes we both agree to break this relationship.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho hami dubai jana yo sambandha todne kura ma sahamat chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हो हामी दुबै जना यो सम्बन्ध तोड्ने कुरामा सहमत छौं।

English: We have to first provide the court with legal affidavits plus your friends and family will have to give an official statement stating that you are separated.
Nepali (Romanized): hamile pahile adaalat ma kanuni shapath patra pradaan garnu parcha ra tapaika sathiharu ra pariwarle tapaiharu chuttinu bhayeko cha bhanera euta aadhikarik bayan dinu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले पहिले अदालतमा कानुनी शपथ पत्र प्रदान गर्नु पर्छ र तपाईंका साथीहरू र परिवारले तपाईंहरू छुट्टिनु भएको छ भनेर एउटा आधिकारिक बयान दिनु पर्छ।

English: I will make the affidavit available to you soon.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapailai tyo shapath patra chadai nai upalabda garaune chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंलाई त्यो शपथ पत्र चाँडै नै उपलब्ध गराउने छु।

English: Remember a divorce does not sort out issues related to children or property.
Nepali (Romanized): Smaran hos sambandha biched le bacha ra sampati sambandhi samasyaharu samadhan gardaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): स्मरण होस् सम्बन्ध विच्छेदले बच्चा र सम्पत्ति सम्बन्धी समस्याहरू समाधान गर्दैन।

English: Division of property must be done within 12 months of the date of the divorce order.
Nepali (Romanized): Sampati badfad sambandha bichedko aadeshko miti bata 12 mahina bhitra nai bhaisaknu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सम्पत्ति बाँडफाँड सम्बन्ध विच्छेदको आदेशको मितिबाट १२ महिना भित्र नै भइसक्नु पर्छ।

English: I will talk about it today.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aja nai yesko bare ghar ma kura garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आज नै यसको बारे घरमा कुरा गर्नेछु।

English: By the way how much is your fee?
Nepali (Romanized): Baru tapaiko shulka chai kati hola?
Nepali (Devanagari): बरु तपाईंको शुल्क चाहिँ कति होला?

English: As I came through your friend I am expecting some discount.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tapaiko sathiko marfat ayeko bhaera kehi chutko apekshya gardaichu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म तपाईंको साथीको मार्फत आएको भएर
column5: केही छुटको अपेक्षा गर्दैछु।

English: No worries I’ll take care of it.
Nepali (Romanized): Kehi chaina maile tesko dhyan rakhnechu.
column5: मैले त्यसको ध्यान राख्नेछु।

English: Have a word with your husband and let me know.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko srimansanga kura garnuhos ani malai bhannu hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको श्रीमान् सँग कुरा गर्नुहोस् अनि मलाई भन्नु होला।

column5: मेरो नाम निशा हो।

English: I’ve heard that your company is expanding.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile suneki chu ki tapaiko sanstha bistar hudaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले सुनेकी छु कि तपाईंको संस्था विस्तार हुँदैछ।

English: So I would like to enquire about any current or future job vacancies within your company.
Nepali (Romanized): Tesaile ma tapaiko sanstha bhitra kunai pani bartaman wa vabisyaka lagi pad rikti cha vanera sodhna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसैले म तपाईंको संस्था भित्र कुनै पनि वर्तमान वा भविष्यका लागि पद रिक्ति छ भनेर सोध्न चाहन्छु।

English: Are you hiring at the moment?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai yo samayama kasailai kaamma lidai hunuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं यो समयमा कसैलाई काममा लिदै हुनुहुन्छ?

column5: तपाईंले सही सुन्नुभयो।

English: We have a position we’re currently trying to fill.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamisanga euta khali pad cha jun hami haal bharne prayasma chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीसँग एउटा खाली पद छ जुन हामी हाल भर्ने प्रयासमा छौं।

English: The position requires packing boxes of dog food.
Nepali (Romanized): Yes padma kukurko khana bakasma pack garnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस पदमा कुकुरको खाना बाकसमा प्याक गर्नु पर्ने हुन्छ।

English: I very much think that my skills and experience are a good fit for what you're looking for.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagcha ki mero kala ra anubhav tapaile khojnu vayeko kurasanga milcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कि मेरो कला र अनुभव तपाईंले खोज्नु भएको कुरासँग मिल्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): K tapaisanga afno bayaktik bibaran cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंसँग आफ्नो वैयक्तिक विवरण छ?

English: Could you give an overview in your own words about what you've been doing over the past four years or so?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile afnai shabdama bigat 4 barsa yeta tapai k gardai hunuhunthyo bhanera sanchiptama batauna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले आफ्नै शब्दमा विगत ४ वर्ष यता तपाईं के गर्दै हुनुहुन्थ्यो भनेर संक्षिप्तमा बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Yes here is the resume but it is not the updated one.
Nepali (Romanized): Huncha Mero bayaktik bibaran linuhos tara yo adhyawadhik gariyeko wala haina.
Nepali (Devanagari): हुन्छ। मेरो वैयक्तिक विवरण लिनुहोस् तर यो अद्यावधिक गरिएको वाला होइन।

English: I have 5 years experience of delivering goods for a company in my hometown which required me to pack them as well.
Nepali (Romanized): Masanga mero grihanagarma euta sansthako lagi samaan bitaran gareko 5 barsako anubhav cha jasma maile pack pani garnu parthyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग मेरो गृहनगरमा एउटा संस्थाको लागि सामान वितरण गरेको ५ वर्षको अनुभव छ
column5: जसमा मैले प्याक पनि गर्नु पर्थ्यो।

English: I’ve also worked here in the Sunshine fruit market for a few months which is not mentioned in my resume.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile yaha kehi mahinako lagi Sunshine fruit marketma kaam gare jun mero bibaran ma ullekh gariyeko chaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले यहाँ केही महिनाको लागि सनशाइन फ्रुट मार्केटमा काम गरें जुन मेरो विवरणमा उल्लेख गरिएको छैन।

English: Well it looks like you have the qualifications and experience we're looking for.
Nepali (Romanized): Thikcha yesto dekhincha ki tapaisanga hamile khojeko yogyata ra anubhav cha.
column5: यस्तो देखिन्छ कि तपाईंसँग हामीले खोजेको योग्यता र अनुभव छ।

English: But I’d suggest that you update your resume by taking help from the professional resume writing services as this one seems quite outdated.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara ma sujhab dinchu ki tapaile byawasahik biodata lekhan sewako maddat liyera afno bayaktik bibaran adhyawadik garnuhos kinaki yo dherai purano dekhincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर म सुझाव दिन्छु कि तपाईंले व्यावसायिक बायोडाटा लेखन सेवाको मद्दत लिएर आफ्नो वैयक्तिक विवरण अद्यावधिक गर्नुहोस् किनकि यो धेरै पुरानो देखिन्छ।

English: I will do that but what is the last date to apply for this position?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tyo garnechu tara yes padko lagi abedan dine antim miti kun ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): म त्यो गर्नेछु तर यस पदको लागि आवेदन दिने अन्तिम मिति कुन हो?

English: There is no last date as we haven’t advertised this post yet but you should update it as soon as possible and then email it to us on the email address provided on our visiting card.
Nepali (Romanized): Kunai antim miti chaina kinaki hamile yesh padko lagi bigyapan gareka chainau tara tapaile yo sakesamma chadai nai adhyavadhik garnuhos ra hamilai hamro visitng cardma pradan gariyeko email thegenama email garnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): कुनै अन्तिम मिति छैन किनकि हामीले यस पदको लागि विज्ञापन गरेका छैनौं
column5: तर तपाईंले यो सकेसम्म चाँडै नै अद्यावधिक गर्नुहोस् र हामीलाई हाम्रो भिजिटिङ कार्डमा प्रदान गरिएको ईमेल ठेगानामा ईमेल गर्नुहोस्।

English: I will then pass it on to the Human Resources department.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tespachi yeshlai Manab Sansadhan Bibhagma pathauchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त्यसपछि यसलाई मानव संसाधन विभागमा पठाउँछु।

English: Thank you for doing that for me.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero lagi teti garidinu vayekoma dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो लागि त्यति गरिदिनु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: I hope I’ve answered all of your questions.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai asha cha ki maile tapaika sabai prashnaharuko uttar diye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई आशा छ कि मैले तपाईंका सबै प्रश्नहरूको उत्तर दिएँ।

Nepali (Romanized): Tipnu ra poko parnu / Picking and Packing

English: Tell me Sara why were you trying to meet me?
Nepali (Romanized): Bhannuhos Sara ji malai kina bhetna khojdai hunu hunthiyo?
column5: मलाई किन भेट्न खोज्दै हुनुहुन्थ्यो?

English: You said you have something important to discuss with me.
Nepali (Romanized): Kehi mahatwopurna kura chalfal garnu cha bhannu bhaeko thiyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): केही महत्त्वपूर्ण कुरा छलफल गर्नु छ भन्नुभएको थियो।

English: Well it’s a bit difficult to say but I really feel that it’s about time that I had a pay rise.
Nepali (Romanized): Kher yo vanna ali garho cha tara vastavma ma yo mahasus garchu ki mero talab badaune samaya bhaisakyo.
column5: यो भन्न अलि गाह्रो छ
column6: तर वास्तवमा म यो महसुस गर्छु कि मेरो तलब बढाउने समय भइसक्यो।

English: Why do you feel like that?
I have been here for three years and I have made good progress.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yaha tin barshadekhi chu ra maile ramro pragati gareko chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यहाँ तीन वर्षदेखि छु र मैले राम्रो प्रगति गरेको छु।

English: I’ve grown in the job and I’ve taken on a lot more responsibility.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile kaamma agadi baddhai chu ra maile dherai jimmewari liyeko chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले काममा अगाडि बढ्दै छु र मैले धेरै जिम्मेवारी लिएको छु।

English: I think it’s time it was recognised and my efforts were rewarded.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero bicharma yesko pahichan garne ra mero prayaslai puraskrit garne samaye aaisakyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो विचारमा यसको पहिचान गर्ने र मेरो प्रयासलाई पुरस्कृत गर्ने समय आइसक्यो।

English: So you feel that you’re on a low salary for your current position and current responsibilities do you?
Nepali (Romanized): Tesobhaye tapailai lagcha ki tapai afno bartaman pad ra bartaman jimmewariharu bhanda kam talab ma hunuhuncha ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसोभए तपाईंलाई लाग्छ कि तपाईं आफ्नो वर्तमान पद र वर्तमान जिम्मेवारीहरू भन्दा कम तलबमा हुनुहुन्छ

English: I believe I should be paid more for what I’ve contributed to the department over recent months.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai biswas cha ki maile bibhaglai haalka mahinaharuma jati yogdaan diyeko chu tes hisabma maile badi paisa paunu parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई विश्वास छ कि मैले विभागलाई हालका महिनाहरूमा जति योगदान दिएको छु त्यस हिसाबमा मैले बढी पैसा पाउनुपर्छ।

English: I will certainly inform the management about it.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma nischit rupma yesko bare bebasthapanlai suchit garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म निश्चित रूपमा यसको बारेमा व्यवस्थापनलाई सूचित गर्नेछु।

English: And what kind of rise would you be looking for?
Nepali (Romanized): Ani tapai kasto prakarko briddhi kojhdai hunuhuncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): अनि तपाईं कस्तो प्रकारको वृद्धि खोज्दै हुनुहुन्छ?

English: It’ll be better for the management to decide that.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo bebasthapanle nai nirnaya liyeko ramro hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो व्यवस्थापनले नै निर्णय लिएको राम्रो हुनेछ।

English: But I think 3% on top of the usual annual rise with inflation isn’t too much to ask.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara mero bichar ma mahangaaika saath samanya barsik briddhi bhanda 3% badi magda dherai bhanna mildaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मेरो विचारमा महँगीका साथ सामान्य वार्षिक वृद्धि भन्दा ३% बढी माग्दा धेरै भन्न मिल्दैन।

English: You can imagine there aren’t unlimited funds available for things like these.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai kalpana garna saknuhuncha yeha esta chisharuka lagi asimit kosh upalabda chaina
column5: यहाँ यस्ता चिजहरूका लागि असीमित कोष उपलब्ध छैन।

English: But you might be pleased to hear that we are conducting a pay review meeting very soon and I’ll make sure we discuss your request then.
Nepali (Romanized): tara tapai sunera khusi hunuhunecha ki hami chadainai euta talab samikshya baithak basdaichau ra ma sunischit garchu ki hami tapaiko anurodh chalfal garchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर तपाईं सुनेर खुसी हुनुहुनेछ कि हामी चाँडै नै एउटा तलब समीक्षा बैठक बस्दैछौं र म सुनिश्चित गर्छु कि हामी तपाईंको अनुरोध छलफल गर्छौं।

English: Should I put this request in writing as well?
Nepali (Romanized): K maile yo anurodh likhit rupma dida pani huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के मैले यो अनुरोध लिखित रूपमा दिँदा पनि हुन्छ?

English: It’ll help us to have a record of this discussion.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesh chalfal ko abhilekh rakhna hamilai maddat hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यस छलफलको अभिलेख राख्न हामीलाई मद्दत हुनेछ।

English: Yes that’d be a good idea.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho yo euta ramro bichar ho.
column5: यो एउटा राम्रो विचार हो।

English: Email me and also copy it to the Human Resources Department.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai e-mail garnuhos ra Manab Sansadhan Bibhagma yesko pratilipi pathaunuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई इमेल गर्नुहोस् र मानव संसाधन विभागमा यसको प्रतिलिपि पठाउनुहोस्।

English: Thank you for calling Fair Work Ombudsman.
Nepali (Romanized): Fair Work Ombudsman ma samparka garnu bhayeko ma dhanyabaad.
Nepali (Devanagari): फेयर वर्क ओम्बड्सम्यानमा सम्पर्क गर्नु भएकोमा धन्यवाद।

English: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo call gunastar ra prasikshyan prayojanka lagi record huna sakcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो कल गुणस्तर र प्रशिक्षण प्रयोजनका लागि रेकर्ड हुन सक्छ।

English: This is Erik here how may I help you today?
Nepali (Romanized): Ma Erik hun ma aaja tapailai kasari maddat garna sakchu?
column5: म आज तपाईंलाई कसरी मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

English: Hello! My name is Kunti Ghimire.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste! Mero naam Kunti Ghimire ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते! मेरो नाम कुन्ती घिमिरे हो।

English: My friend told me about your institution.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero saathi le malai tapaiko sansthako barema bataye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो साथीले मलाई तपाईंको संस्थाको बारेमा बताए।

English: I think I am being discriminated at my workplace.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai laagcha ki kaam ma ma mathi bhedbhav bhairaheko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्छ कि काममा म माथि भेदभाव भइरहेको छ।

English: Is there any solution to it?
We can definitely help you with that.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami pakkai pani tapailai yesma maddat garna sakchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी पक्कै पनि तपाईंलाई यसमा मद्दत गर्न सक्छौं।

English: In countries like Australia issues like racism are very sensitive and are considered a very serious offence.
Nepali (Romanized): Australia jasta deshharuma jaatibaad jasta mudda atyanta sambedanshil chan ra yaslai gambhir aparadh manincha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अष्ट्रेलिया जस्ता देशहरूमा जातिवाद जस्ता मुद्दा अत्यन्त संवेदनशील छन् र यसलाई गम्भीर अपराध मानिन्छ।

English: Why do you think someone has been biased to you?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapailai kina lagcha ki kohi tapailai pakshyapat gardaicha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंलाई किन लाग्छ कि कोही तपाईंलाई पक्षपात गर्दैछ?

English: Thank you. I feel relieved after what you had to say.
Nepali (Romanized): Dhanyabaad Tapaile bhannu bhayeko kurale malai rahat bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): धन्यवाद। तपाईंले भन्नुभएको कुराले मलाई राहत भयो।

English: Actually my manager calls me a monkey during lunchtime in front of others.
Nepali (Romanized): Vastavma mero prabandhakle khaja khane bela malai aru ko agadi badar bhanera bolauchan.
column5: मेरो प्रबन्धकले खाजा खाने बेला मलाई अरुको अगाडि बाँदर भनेर बोलाउँछन्।

English: At the start I dismissed it as some sort of joke but facing it every day seems insulting.
Nepali (Romanized): Suruma maile yeslai thatta ko rupma bewasta gare tara harek din esko samana garda apamanjanak lagcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): सुरुमा मैले यसलाई ठट्टाको रूपमा बेवास्ता गरें तर हरेक दिन यसको सामना गर्दा अपमानजनक लाग्छ।

English: And he is a white person.
Other than commenting inappropriately in public is there anything else that he has done to you like harassing you in any way be it physical mental or social?
Nepali (Romanized): Sarwajanik sthal ma anupayukta tippani garnu bahek aru kehi cha uhale tapaimathi gareko jastai kunai prakarko saririk manasik ra samaajik utpidan.
Nepali (Devanagari): सार्वजनिक स्थलमा अनुपयुक्त टिप्पणी गर्नु बाहेक
column5: अरु केही छ उहाँले तपाईंमाथि गरेको जस्तै कुनै प्रकारको शारीरिक
column6: मानसिक र सामाजिक उत्पीडन?

column5: अरु केही छैन।

English: What if I work on a level lower than his I am also a human.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma uni bhanda tallo darja ma kaam garepani k bhayo ra ma pani ta euta manis hoon.
Nepali (Devanagari): म उनी भन्दा तल्लो दर्जामा काम गरेपनि के भयो र म पनि त एउटा मानिस हुँ।

English: Jokes are one thing and that also has a limit.
Nepali (Romanized): Majak garnu euta kura ho ra tesko pani sima huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मजाक गर्नु एउटा कुरा हो र त्यसको पनि सीमा हुन्छ।

English: Now it is affecting my self-respect.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba yesle mero atma-samman lai asar gardaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): अब यसले मेरो आत्म-सम्मानलाई असर गर्दैछ।

English: This will clearly be considered as an act of racism.
Nepali (Romanized): Ra yo spasta rupma jaatibaad ko karya maninecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): र यो स्पष्ट रूपमा जातिवादको कार्य मानिनेछ।

English: There are some harsh consequences that this might result in which possibly includes losing a job as none of the workplaces tolerates this.
Nepali (Romanized): Yeska kehi kathor parinaam chan jasma jaagir janu pani samawesh huncha kinaki kunai pani karyasthal le yeslai sahan gardaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसका केही कठोर परिणाम छन् जसमा जागिर जानु पनि समावेश हुन्छ किनकि कुनै पनि कार्यस्थलले यसलाई सहन गर्दैन।

English: Now if I may gather a couple of details so we can proceed further.
Nepali (Romanized): Aba k ma kehi bibaranharu lina sakchu taaki hami agadi badna sakau?
column5: के म केही विवरणहरू लिन सक्छु ताकि हामी अगाडि बढ्न सकौं?

English: I don’t want him to lose his job but he won’t learn any lesson without this being done.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma chahanna ki uhale afno jagir gumaos tara yesto nagari uhale paath sikne chainan.
Nepali (Devanagari): म चाहन्न कि उहाँले आफ्नो जागिर गुमाओस् तर यस्तो नगरी उहाँले पाठ सिक्ने छैनन्।

English: All my friends will start avoiding me if they know about it.
Nepali (Romanized): Mera sabai saathiharule malai bewasta garnechan yadi yesto thaha bhayo bhane.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरा सबै साथीहरूले मलाई बेवास्ता गर्नेछन्
column5: यदि यस्तो थाहा भयो भने।

English: Of course not. We won’t reveal the identity if you don’t want it.
Nepali (Romanized): Hoina bilkul hoina Tapai chahanu hunna bhane hami parichaya khulaudainau.
column5: बिल्कुल होइन। तपाईं चाहनुहुन्न भने
column6: हामी परिचय खुलाउँदैनौं।

English: The case report will first go to the company’s HR and they will have to provide us with any solid proof like CCTV footage or some evidence.
Nepali (Romanized): Mudda pratibedan pahile sansthako HRma jancha ra uniharule hamilai kehi thos praman jastai CCTV footage wa aru praman pradan garnu parnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मुद्दा प्रतिवेदन पहिले संस्थाको HR मा जान्छ र उनीहरूले हामीलाई केही ठोस प्रमाण जस्तै CCTV फुटेज वा अरु प्रमाण प्रदान गर्नुपर्नेछ।

English: They may even have to interview some people.
Nepali (Romanized): Uniharu le kehi byaktiharu sanga antarbarta pani lina sakchan.
Nepali (Devanagari): उनीहरूले केही व्यक्तिहरूसँग अन्तर्वार्ता पनि लिन सक्छन्।

column5: अवश्य।

English: Not only were my colleagues present there but everyone from the afternoon shift was also there.
Nepali (Romanized): Tyaha mera sahakarmiharu matra hoina diuso kaam garne sabai jana upasthit thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यहाँ मेरा सहकर्मीहरू मात्र होइन दिउँसो काम गर्ने सबै जना उपस्थित थिए।

English: You can ask anyone and I know for sure there were cameras there.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai jo kohilai pani sodhna saknu huncha ra malai thaha cha tyaha kehi cameraharu pani thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं जो कोहीलाई पनि सोध्न सक्नुहुन्छ र मलाई थाहा छ त्यहाँ केही क्यामराहरू पनि थिए।

English: I will make the report and forward it to your company’s Human Resources Department so it can be dealt with on an urgent basis.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma pratibedan banaunechu ra yeslai tapaiko sansthako Manav Sansadhan Bibhag ma pathaidinechu taaki turuntai yesko samadhan garna sakinecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): म प्रतिवेदन बनाउनेछु र यसलाई तपाईंको संस्थाको मानव संसाधन विभागमा पठाइदिनेछु ताकि तुरुन्तै यसको समाधान गर्न सकिनेछ।

English: Your case number is 314892513 if you need to make further enquiry.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko mudda number 314892513 ho tapaile thap sodhpuch garnu parema.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको मुद्दा नम्बर ३१४८९२५१३ हो तपाईंले थप सोधपुछ गर्नुपरेमा।

English: Thank you for coming in Mrs. Karki to make a formal statement.
Nepali (Romanized): Aupacharik bayan dina aaunu bhayeko ma dhanyabaad Shrimati Karki.
Nepali (Devanagari): औपचारिक बयान दिन आउनु भएकोमा धन्यवाद श्रीमती कार्की।

English: Before we begin the interview I just need to confirm a few details.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile antarbarta suru garnu aghi maile kehi bibaran ko pusti garna chahanchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले अन्तर्वार्ता सुरु गर्नु अघि मैले केही विवरणको पुष्टि गर्न चाहन्छु।

English: For the record could you state your name address and contact number?
Nepali (Romanized): Recordko lagi k tapai afno naam thegana ra samparka number batauna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): रेकर्डको लागि के तपाईं आफ्नो नाम
column5: ठेगाना र सम्पर्क नम्बर बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Sure Mr. Jim. My name is Kavya Karki.
Nepali (Romanized): Awasya Jim ji Mero naam Kavya Karki ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): अवश्य जिम जी। मेरो नाम काव्या कार्की हो।

English: My address is Unit 3 49 Princess Street Penshurst.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero thegana Unit 3 49 Princess Street Penshurst ho.
column5: ४९ प्रिन्सेस स्ट्रिट
column6: पेन्सहर्स्ट हो।

English: We have spoken to the teller and the manager.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile teller ra prabandhak sanga kura garyisakeka chau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले टेलर र प्रबन्धक सँग कुरा गरिसकेका छौं।

English: However we have yet to ascertain your whereabouts when the crime was committed.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadhapi aparadh huda tapai kaha hunu hunthyo bhanera hamile nischit garna baki cha.
column5: अपराध हुँदा तपाईं कहाँ हुनुहुन्थ्यो भनेर हामीले निश्चित गर्न बाँकी छ।

English: Could you please take me through what you did on that day?
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya tapaile tyo din k garnu bhayo bhanna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया तपाईंले त्यो दिन के गर्नुभयो भन्न सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: My husband and I reached the bank around 9:45 am that day.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ra mero shriman tes din bihana 9:45 bhitra bank pugeka thiyau.
Nepali (Devanagari): म र मेरो श्रीमान् त्यस दिन बिहान ९:४५ भित्र बैंक पुगेका थियौं।

English: My husband went to the ATM the one outside the bank to withdraw money.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero shriman bank bahira ko ATM janu bhayo paisa nikalna ko lagi.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो श्रीमान् बैंक बाहिरको एटीएम जानुभयो पैसा निकाल्नको लागि।

English: I started talking to George Gates the accountant in the bank.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile bank ma lekhakar George Gates sanga kura garna thale.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले बैंकमा लेखाकार जर्ज गेट्ससँग कुरा गर्न थालें।

English: Do you always go to George Gates for your work?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai sadhai afno kaam ko lagi George Gates kaha janu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं सधैं आफ्नो कामको लागि जर्ज गेट्स कहाँ जानुहुन्छ?

English: Yes he has been looking after my business matters for the last 2 years.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho uhale bigat dui barsa dekhi mero byawasaya ko herchaha gariraheka chan.
column5: उहाँले विगत दुई वर्ष देखि मेरो व्यवसायको हेरचाह गरिरहेका छन्।

English: We take all the financial advice from him be it for investment or business.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami uni sanga sabai bittiya sallaha linchau tyo lagani ko lagi hos wa byawasaya ko lagi.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी उनीसँग सबै वित्तीय सल्लाह लिन्छौं
column5: त्यो लगानीको लागि होस् वा व्यवसायको लागि।

English: Yes we’ve spoken to Mr. George already. He has already given his version of events.
Nepali (Romanized): Ho hamile sriman George sanga pahile nai kura garisakeka chau Uhale ghatanakram ko aafno sanskaran disakeka chan.
column5: हामीले श्रीमान् जर्जसँग पहिले नै कुरा गरिसकेका छौं। उहाँले घटनाक्रमको आफ्नो संस्करण दिइसकेका छन्।

English: Please go on and tell me what you witnessed.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya aghi badnu hos ra malai bataunu hos tapaile k dekhnu bhayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया अघि बढ्नुहोस् र मलाई बताउनुहोस् तपाईंले के देख्नुभयो।

English: I went to deposit $5800 to my account.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero khata ma $5800 jamma garna gaye.
Nepali (Devanagari): म मेरो खातामा $५८०० जम्मा गर्न गएँ।

English: But before I could take the money out from my bag a man came in wearing red and black striped shirt and black pants black leather boots and a mask.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara maile mero jhola bata paisa nikalnu aghi ek jana manche rato ra kalo dharko bhayeko kamiz kalo pant kalo chala ko jutta ra mask lagayera aayo.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मैले मेरो झोलाबाट पैसा निकाल्नु अघि एक जना मान्छे रातो र कालो धर्का भएको कमिज
column5: कालो पाइन्ट
column6: कालो छालाको जुत्ता र मास्क लगाएर आयो।

English: Mask? What type of mask do you mean?
Nepali (Romanized): Mask? Kasto prakarko mask bhanna khojdai hunu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): मास्क? कस्तो प्रकारको मास्क भन्न खोज्दै हुनुहुन्छ?

English: Was it like a balaclava a clown-mask or something else?
Nepali (Romanized): K tyo balaclava joker-mask was aru kunai jasto thiyo?
column5: जोकर-मास्क वा अरु कुनै जस्तो थियो?

English: Did it cover his entire head or just his face?
Nepali (Romanized): K tesle uhako purai tauko dhakeko thiyo wa anuhar matra?
Nepali (Devanagari): के त्यसले उहाँको पूरै टाउको ढाकेको थियो वा अनुहार मात्र?

English: No as long as I remember he was wearing a Batman Mask.
Nepali (Romanized): Hoina jaha samma malai yaad chha uhale batmanko mask lagayeka thiye.
column5: जहाँसम्म मलाई याद छ उहाँले ब्याटम्यानको मास्क लगाएका थिए।

English: I don’t think it will be easily available from normal shops.
Nepali (Romanized): Malai lagdaina ki tyo samanya pasal haru ma sajilai uplabdha huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मलाई लाग्दैन कि त्यो सामान्य पसलहरूमा सजिलै उपलब्ध हुन्छ।

English: Moreover he was wearing a pair of shiny black gloves.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesbahek uhale chamkilo kalo panja lagayeka thiye.
column5: उहाँले चम्किलो कालो पन्जा लगाएका थिए।

English: Did you notice any other distinguishing features about the perpetrator?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile aparadhiko barema aru kunai farak bisheshta yaad garnu bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले अपराधीको बारेमा अरु कुनै फरक विशेषता याद गर्नुभयो?

English: Any details you can recall will be of great help to investigate this robbery.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile yaad garnasakne kunai pani bibaranle yas dakaitko chanbin garna maddat garnecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले याद गर्नसक्ने कुनै पनि विवरणले यस डकैतीको छानबिन गर्न मद्दत गर्नेछ।

English: As his entire face and head was covered with the mask it was not possible for me to see his face except for his nose.
Nepali (Romanized): Uha ko purai anuhar ra tauko mask le dhakiyeko karan uhako naak bahek maile aru kehi dekhina.
Nepali (Devanagari): उहाँको पूरै अनुहार र टाउको मास्कले ढाकिएको कारण उहाँको नाक बाहेक मैले अरु केही देखिन।

English: Oh wait! I remember he has a mole on the tip of his nose and it was big.
Nepali (Romanized): Eh pakhnus malai smaran cha uhako naak ko tuppo ma euta kothi cha ra tyo thulo thiyo.
column5: मलाई स्मरण छ उहाँको नाकको टुप्पोमा एउटा कोठी छ र त्यो ठूलो थियो।

English: That can be a great piece of information. Let me make a note of this.
Nepali (Romanized): Tyo mahotwapurna jaankari huna sakcha Malai tippani garna dinu hos.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यो महत्त्वपूर्ण जानकारी हुन सक्छ। मलाई टिप्पणी गर्न दिनुहोस्।

Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile aru k yaad garnu bhayo?

English: I didn’t see anything else as I had kneeled down and my both hands were up.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile aru kehi pani dekhina kina bhane maile ghuda tekiraheko thiye ra mera dubai haat mathi thiye.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले अरु केही पनि देखिन किनभने मैले घुँडा टेकिरहेको थिएँ र मेरा दुबै हात माथि थिए।

English: I was very frightened as I had never seen anything like this before.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma dherai darayeko thiye kina bhane maile yesto pahile kahilei dekheko thiyena.
Nepali (Devanagari): म धेरै डराएको थिएँ किनभने मैले यस्तो पहिले कहिल्यै देखेको थिइन।

English: I can’t recall anything else now.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma aru kehi yaad garna sakdina aba.
Nepali (Devanagari): म अरु केही याद गर्न सक्दिन अब।

English: But if I do I will contact you.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara yaad ayo bhane ma tapailai samparka garne chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर याद आयो भने म तपाईंलाई सम्पर्क गर्नेछु।

English: It’s alright. We can pick it up later in the week.
Nepali (Romanized): Thik cha Hami saptaha ko anta tira jaari garna sakchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): ठिक छ। हामी सप्ताहको अन्त्य तिर जारी गर्न सक्छौं।

English: If you need any psychological help you can call our helpline.
Nepali (Romanized): Yadi tapai lai kunai manobaigyanik maddat chaahiyema hamro helpline ma samparka garna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि तपाईंलाई कुनै मनोवैज्ञानिक मद्दत चाहिएमा
column5: हाम्रो हेल्पलाइनमा सम्पर्क गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Good afternoon. This is Jimmy from Jimmy’s mowing services.
Nepali (Romanized): Subha Aparahna Ma Jimmy’s mowing services bata Jimmy hun.
Nepali (Devanagari): शुभ अपराह्न। म जिम्मीको मोइङ सेवाबाट जिम्मी हुँ।

English: Am I talking to Mr. Sagar?
I have called you to revert on a quotation for lawn mowing as requested.
Nepali (Romanized): Anurodh gariye anusar ghaas kaatne dar / mulya suchi ko jawaaf dina maile tapailai samparka gareko hu.
Nepali (Devanagari): अनुरोध गरिए अनुसार घाँस काट्ने दर / मूल्य सूचीको जवाफ दिन मैले तपाईंलाई सम्पर्क गरेको हुँ।

English: I’ve read a great review about your services on the Internet.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tapaika sewaharuko barema Internet ma ramro samikshya padheko chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तपाईंका सेवाहरूको बारेमा इन्टरनेटमा राम्रो समीक्षा पढेको छु।

English: The grass has grown until the knee length in our backyard.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamro paxadiko bagaicha ma ghaas ghuda samma badisakecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाम्रो पछाडिको बगैंचामा घाँस घुँडासम्म बढिसकेछ।

English: Due to time constraints both my wife and I were unable to do it.
Nepali (Romanized): Samayako abhable garda meri srimati ra maile tyo katna asamartha bhayau.
column5: मेरी श्रीमती र मैले त्यो काट्न असमर्थ भयौं।

English: We have different services available like lawn mowing garden designing and aftercare for the lawn.
Nepali (Romanized): Hami dherai sewaharu upalabda garaudachau jastai ghaas katne bagaicha sajaune ani ghaas katepaxi ko herbichar.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामी धेरै सेवाहरू उपलब्ध गराउँदछौं जस्तै घाँस काट्ने
column5: बगैंचा सजाउने
column6: अनि घाँस काटेपछिको हेरविचार।

English: I am particularly interested in mowing the lawn only at the moment.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ahileko lagi bishesta: ghaas katne ma nai icchuk chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म अहिलेको लागि विशेषता: घाँस काट्नेमा नै इच्छुक छु।

English: Can you tell me the cost of the service?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai yes sewa ko mulya batauna saknu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं यस सेवाको मूल्य बताउन सक्नुहुन्छ?

English: Considering the photos provided by you the best price we can offer is $129 including goods and services tax.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile pathaunu bhayeko tasbirharulai madhyanajar ma rakhdai hamile prastav garna sakne sarwashrestha mulya $129 ho jasma saman ra sewa kar samawesh cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले पठाउनु भएको तस्बिरहरूलाई मध्यनजरमा राख्दै
column5: हामीले प्रस्ताव गर्न सक्ने सर्वश्रेष्ठ मूल्य $१२९ हो
column6: जसमा सामान र सेवा कर समावेश छ।

English: We provide professional lawn cut including professional edging of the entire lawn area.
Nepali (Romanized): Hamile purai bagaichako kinaara milaunu ka sathai byawasayik ghat katne sewa pradan gardachau.
Nepali (Devanagari): हामीले पूरै बगैंचाको किनारा मिलाउनु का साथै व्यावसायिक घाँस काट्ने सेवा प्रदान गर्दछौं।

English: If I like your job I can hire you every month.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi malai tapaiko kaam man paryo bhane maile tapailai harek mahina kaam dina sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि मलाई तपाईंको काम मन पर्यो भने
column5: मैले तपाईंलाई हरेक महिना काम दिन सक्छु।

Nepali (Romanized): Tespaxi ma dhukka kaa saath basna sakchu.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसपछि म ढुक्कका साथ बस्न सक्छु।

English: Why not! We leave no stone unturned to impress our customers and the best part is you always get the same outcome as you would in the 1st appointment.
Nepali (Romanized): Kina nahunu Hamile hamra grahak lai prasanna parna kunai kasar baaki rakhdainau ra sabai bhanda ramro pakshya bhaneko hamile pahilo patak jasto kaam garyau jahile pani testai parinaam dinchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): किन नहुनु! हामीले हाम्रा ग्राहकलाई प्रसन्न पार्न कुनै कसर बाँकी राख्दैनौं र सबैभन्दा राम्रो पक्ष भनेको हामीले पहिलो पटक जस्तो काम गर्यौं जहिले पनि त्यस्तै परिणाम दिन्छौं।

English: What day and time would you prefer to come?
Nepali (Romanized): Kun din ra samaya tapai auna chahanu huncha?
Nepali (Devanagari): कुन दिन र समय तपाईं आउन चाहनुहुन्छ?

English: The next available appointment in your area is July the 29th or August the 2nd at 11am and 6pm respectively.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaiko kshetrama audo upalabda bhetvaarta bhaneko July 29 athawa August 2 kramasa: bihana 11 wa sajha 6 baje ko cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंको क्षेत्रमा आउँदो उपलब्ध भेटवार्ता भनेको जुलाई २९ अथवा अगस्ट २
column5: क्रमशः बिहान ११ वा साँझ ६ बजेको छ।

English: What day and time suits you the best?
Nepali (Romanized): Kun din ra samaya tapaiko lagi upayukta huncha hola?
Nepali (Devanagari): कुन दिन र समय तपाईंको लागि उपयुक्त हुन्छ होला?

English: Please arrange it for 29 July at 11 am.
Nepali (Romanized): Kripaya 29 July bihana 11 baje ko lagi prabanda garnuhos.
Nepali (Devanagari): कृपया २९ जुलाई बिहान ११ बजेको लागि प्रबन्ध गर्नुहोस्।

English: No stress. Will someone be home that day?
Nepali (Romanized): Tanaab chaina K tyo din kohi ghar ma hunecha?
Nepali (Devanagari): तनाव छैन। के त्यो दिन कोही घरमा हुनेछ?

English: Either my wife or I would be home.
Nepali (Romanized): Meri srimati wa ma ghar ma hunechau.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरी श्रीमती वा म घरमा हुनेछौं।

English: Hi good to see you again.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste Tapailai feri bhetera khusi lagyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते। तपाईंलाई फेरि भेटेर खुसी लाग्यो।

English: I haven’t seen you for a long time probably since I started community service.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tapailai nadekheko dherai bhayo shayad maile samudayik sewa suru gare dekhi hola.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले तपाईंलाई नदेखेको धेरै भयो सायद मैले सामुदायिक सेवा सुरु गरे देखि होला।

English: I haven’t been going out nowadays because I am in some financial hardship.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ajkal dherai bahira gairaheki chuina kina bhane ma kehi arthik samasya ma pareki chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म आजकल धेरै बाहिर गइरहेकी छैन किनभने म केही आर्थिक समस्यामा परेकी छु।

English: You can share your problems with me. Is there anything I can help you with?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapai afno samasya haru masanga baadna saknu huncha K yesma ma tapaiko kehi maddat garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईं आफ्नो समस्याहरू मसँग बाँड्न सक्नुहुन्छ। के यसमा म तपाईंको केही मद्दत गर्न सक्छु?

Nepali (Romanized): Chinta byakta garnu bhaeko ma dhanyabad.

English: Right now I am jobless so I came here looking for some work.
Nepali (Romanized): Haal ma berojgar bhaeki chu tehi bhaera ma yeha kehi kaam ko khoji ma ayeki hu.
Nepali (Devanagari): हाल म बेरोजगार भएकी छु त्यही भएर म यहाँ केही कामको खोजीमा आएकी हुँ।

English: I heard that there is some position available for gardening.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile suneki thiye ki yeha bagaicha ma kaam garne pad khali cha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले सुनेकी थिएँ कि यहाँ बगैंचामा काम गर्ने पद खाली छ।

English: I am interested in growing vegetables.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma tarkari ropai ma ruchi rakhdachu.

English: I will see what I can do for you.
You can join with us in our gardening service until you find another job.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile aru kaam napae samma hami sanga bagaicha ma kaam garna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले अरु काम नपाए सम्म हामी सँग बगैंचामा काम गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: Thank you so much for your help.
But you need to fulfil our eligibility criteria to gain access to the community pantry.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara tapaile saamudayik khadhyagaar ma pravesh pauna ko lagi yogyata maapdanda pura garnu parne huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर तपाईंले सामुदायिक खाद्यागारमा प्रवेश पाउनको लागि योग्यता मापदण्ड पूरा गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ।

Nepali (Romanized): Saamudayik khaadyagaar? K ho tyo bhaneko?
Nepali (Devanagari): सामुदायिक खाद्यागार? के हो त्यो भनेको?

English: And how do I meet the criteria?
Nepali (Romanized): Ra tyo maapdanda maile kasari pura garna sakchu?
Nepali (Devanagari): र त्यो मापदण्ड मैले कसरी पूरा गर्न सक्छु?

English: I do not have any money right now and until I find a job my financial situation will not change.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga ahile paisa chaina ra kaam napae samma mero aarthik awastha pariwartan hunechaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मसँग अहिले पैसा छैन र काम नपाए सम्म मेरो आर्थिक अवस्था परिवर्तन हुनेछैन।

English: You do not need any money to be eligible for the community pantry.
Nepali (Romanized): Saamudayik khaadyagaar ko lagi yogya huna paisa ko jaroorat hudaina.
Nepali (Devanagari): सामुदायिक खाद्यागारको लागि योग्य हुन पैसाको जरूरत हुँदैन।

English: I will help you with that.
In the community pantry people come and donate food.
Nepali (Romanized): Saamudayik khadyaagar ma manish haru ayera khana daan gardachan.
Nepali (Devanagari): सामुदायिक खाद्यागारमा मानिसहरू आएर खाना दान गर्दछन्।

English: Then we can take food from there free of cost.
Nepali (Romanized): Tespaxi hamile tyaha bata nisulka khana lina sakchau.
Nepali (Devanagari): त्यसपछि हामीले त्यहाँबाट निःशुल्क खाना लिन सक्छौं।

English: Good to know that people are helping through donation
Nepali (Romanized): Manishharu daan diyera maddat gardaichan bhanera sunda khusi lagyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): मानिसहरू दान दिएर मद्दत गर्दैछन् भनेर सुन्दा खुसी लाग्यो।

English: The pantry room is open twice a week.
Nepali (Romanized): Khadhyaagar kotha hapta ko duipatak khulcha.

English: You can fill your bags with whatever you need.
Nepali (Romanized): Tapailai j chaincha tesle tapaile afno jhola bharna saknu huncha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंलाई जे चाहिन्छ त्यसले तपाईंले आफ्नो झोला भर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।

English: That’s a big relief for me.
Nepali (Romanized): Yo mero lagi dherai raahat ko kura ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): यो मेरो लागि धेरै राहतको कुरा हो।

English: If I find a new job I will also help and donate for others.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi maile naya kaam paye bhane maile pani daan diyera aruko maddat garnechu.
Nepali (Devanagari): यदि मैले नयाँ काम पाएँ भने मैले पनि दान दिएर अरुको मद्दत गर्नेछु।

English: Hey Zeva Good to see you.
Nepali (Romanized): Namaste Zeva ji Tapailai dekhera khusi lagyo.
Nepali (Devanagari): नमस्ते जेभा जी। तपाईंलाई देखेर खुसी लाग्यो।

Nepali (Romanized): Tapai yeha k gardai hunu huncha?

English: I'm looking for an apartment on rent.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma yeha bhada ma basna thau khojdaichu.
Nepali (Devanagari): म यहाँ भाडामा बस्न ठाउँ खोज्दैछु।

English: Did you come here to get help with housing?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai yeha aawashko lagi maddat khojna aunu bhaeko ho?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं यहाँ आवासको लागि मद्दत खोज्न आउनु भएको हो?

English: Since my parents’ house is too far from my school I need to find an apartment closer to school.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero bidhyalaya bata mera abhibawakko ghar dherai tada bhayeko le ma bidhyalaya najikai flat khojdai chu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो विद्यालयबाट मेरा अभिभावकको घर धेरै टाढा भएकोले
column5: म विद्यालय नजिकै फ्ल्याट खोज्दै छु।

English: But I thought you were going to stay at the school dormitory.
Nepali (Romanized): Tara malai lageko thiyo ki tapaile bidhyalayakai chatrabaas ma basnu hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): तर मलाई लागेको थियो कि तपाईंले विद्यालयकै छात्रावासमा बस्नु हुनेछ।

English: I still can't decide if I want to take school accommodation or not.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile ajhai nidho garna sakeki chuina ki ma bidhyalaya aawas ma basu ki nabasu.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले अझै निधो गर्न सकेकी छैन कि म विद्यालय आवासमा बसूँ कि नबसूँ।

English: I am looking at different options to find the cheapest accommodation.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma bibhinna aru bikalpaharu herdaichu sasto aawas khojna ko lagi.
Nepali (Devanagari): म विभिन्न अरु विकल्पहरू हेर्दैछु सस्तो आवास खोज्नको लागि।

English: Are you looking for a one-bedroom unit or more?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapai ekal shayankakshya bhaeko dera khojdai hunu huncha ki dherai bhayeko?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईं एकल शयनकक्ष भएको डेरा खोज्दै हुनुहुन्छ कि धेरै भएको?

English: I would like an open space for my bed desk and TV.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma mero khaat tabul ra TV ko lagi euta khulla thau khojdai chu.
column5: टेबल र टिभीको लागि एउटा खुल्ला ठाउँ खोज्दै छु।

English: Obviously I need room for kitchen utensils as well because I like to cook my own food.
Nepali (Romanized): Spastarupma malai bhada kuda rakhna lai pani thau chahincha kinaki malai afno khana afai banauna man parcha.
column5: मलाई भाँडाकुँडा राख्नलाई पनि ठाउँ चाहिन्छ किनकि मलाई आफ्नो खाना आफै बनाउन मन पर्छ।

English: As I don't have much money I came here to help.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma sanga dherai paisa nabhaera ma yeha maddatko lagi ayeki hu.
column5: म यहाँ मद्दतको लागि आएकी हुँ।

English: I cannot work full-time like I did during the summer break.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile garmiyamko chuttima jastai purna kaalin kaam garna sakdina.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले गर्मीयामको छुट्टीमा जस्तै पूर्ण कालीन काम गर्न सक्दिन।

English: I have to cut down on my workload in order to spend more time on my studies.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile padhaima dherai samaya bitaunako lagi afno karyabhar kam garnai parcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले पढाइमा धेरै समय बिताउनको लागि
column5: आफ्नो कार्यभार कम गर्नै पर्छ।

English: So a safe and decent apartment is all I need.
Nepali (Romanized): Tehi bhaera euta surakshit ra sabhya kotha nai ho malai chahiyeko.
column5: एउटा सुरक्षित र सभ्य कोठा नै हो मलाई चाहिएको।

English: How long have you been looking for accommodation?
Nepali (Romanized): Tapaile aawas khojnu bhayeko kati bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): तपाईंले आवास खोज्नु भएको कति भयो?

English: I've been tired of seeing ads in the newspapers for the past two weeks.
Nepali (Romanized): Ma ta bigat dui hapta dekhi patrikama bigyapan herda herdai thakisake.
Nepali (Devanagari): म त विगत दुई हप्ता देखि पत्रिकामा विज्ञापन हेर्दा हेर्दै थाकिसकें।

English: Else I have to find a room which is out of my reach.
Nepali (Romanized): Ki ta mero pahuch bahirako kotha khojnu paryo.
Nepali (Devanagari): कि त मेरो पहुँच बाहिरको कोठा खोज्नु पर्यो।

English: Really? Is it that difficult to find accommodation?
Nepali (Romanized): Sachai? K aawash khojnu teti garho cha?
Nepali (Devanagari): साँच्चै? के आवास खोज्नु त्यति गाह्रो छ?

English: I just started this week since school will start next month.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile ta yehi hapta matra suru gareko hu kinabhane bidhyalay arko mahina dekhi suru hudaicha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले त यही हप्ता मात्र सुरु गरेको हुँ किनभने विद्यालय अर्को महिना देखि सुरु हुँदैछ।

English: I figured I better start the process as soon as possible.
Nepali (Romanized): Maile soche maile jati sakdo chado prakriya suru gareko ramro ho.
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले सोचें मैले जति सक्दो चाँडो प्रक्रिया सुरु गरेको राम्रो हो।

English: In my experience apartments are getting expensive.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero anubhav anusar aawashharu mahango hudaicha.
column5: आवासहरू महँगो हुँदैछ।

English: I am searching for a residential school.
The cheaper the accommodation the better it will be.
Nepali (Romanized): Jati sasto aawas bhayo teti nai ramro huncha.
column5: त्यति नै राम्रो हुन्छ।

English: Have you thought about sharing an apartment?
Nepali (Romanized): K tapaile flat milera line kura sochnu bhayo?
Nepali (Devanagari): के तपाईंले फ्ल्याट मिलेर लिने कुरा सोच्नुभयो?

English: If you want we can find a two bedroom apartment and share it.
Nepali (Romanized): Yedi tapai chahanu huncha bhane hami euta dui shayankakshya bhaeko flat liyera badhera basna sakchau.
column5: हामी एउटा दुई शयनकक्ष भएको फ्ल्याट लिएर बाँडेर बस्न सक्छौं।

English: It may be cheaper that way.
Nepali (Romanized): Teso garyo bhane sasto huncha sakcha.
column5: सस्तो हुन सक्छ।

English: Why didn’t I think about it?
Nepali (Romanized): Maile tesko barema kina sochina hola?
Nepali (Devanagari): मैले त्यसको बारेमा किन सोचिन होला?

English: This may solve both our problems.
Nepali (Romanized): Yesle hami dubai jana ko samasya samaadhan garna sakcha.
Nepali (Devanagari): यसले हामी दुबै जनाको समस्या समाधान गर्न सक्छ।

English: I think this would be the best option for both of us.
Nepali (Romanized): Mero bicharma yehi nai hami dubai jana ko lagi uttam bikalpa hunecha.
Nepali (Devanagari): मेरो विचारमा यही नै हामी दुबै जनाको लागि उत्तम विकल्प हुनेछ।
